50b5(mdo): mying khyer tsam du bzhag ste/ de ltar byas na legs so snyam mo// de nas lha mo de dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu de rgyal po byed du bcu ga ste/ pho 'ud ti mo 'ud ti bzhin tu snyan btags nas
50b6(mdo): bdag nyid kyi yul du bdag nyid kyis bud myed kyi gzugs kyis rgyal srid chen po yongs su spyod de/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i sde mdo na bar 'dul bar byed cing / 'dzam bu klong gi sa gzhi thams
50b7(mdo): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mngon mtshan can du byas nas/ bkur spyir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed de/ rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs chen po dang
50b8(mdo): ringan po che thams cad kyi ba dan rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan nams dang / spos thams cad kyis bskos pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog/ 
51a1(mdo): thams cad dang / rnga pa ta ha dang / khA dza dang ngas pa khang dang / gling bu dang / sil snyan brgya phrag thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad bskord te/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan
51a2(mdo): pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams rnams dang ldan par byas te/ pha rold tu phyind pa bcu'i pyad pa/ pyod cing / 
51a3(mdo): rtag tu bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung nas/ dbul po la batshogs pa khyim khol gyi sems can thams cad gang dang / gang la ci dang cis don tu 'gyur ba de dang de la de dang de byin nas 'du shes bcu'i bsu bas bsdus te/ smyon
51a4(mdo): par byed cing sems can bye ba phrag mang po dag rims bzhin du tul te/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin dpa ra shes nas/ sprin chen po'i mdol 'di las sogs pa de bzhin
51a5(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsrungs pa mtshungs pa myed pa'i marda 2/ rin po che'i dam pa mchos snyand pa/ 'byung bar bya ba'i phyici'i thabs kyis kyang mtshungs pa myed pa'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing
51a6(mdo): mtshungs pa myed pa'i glegs bam bris pa'i snod/ sangs rgyas kyis gang dpa gang du byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas rnams su 'jog par byed de/ de ltar mtshungs pa myed pa'i sa bon bskyed nas/ de'i 'og tu
51a7(mdo): 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe lha mo lo tog 'byor da pa/ shes rab chen mo thabs mkhas pa/ zab mo shes pa dang ldan pa 'i lha mo bud myed kyi lus las ldog par 'gyur ro// sprin chen snying pos
51a8(mdo): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myi lha mo 'di sems can thams cad kyi dad pa bskyed pa'i slad du cho 'phrul chen po bgyis nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram// bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen
51b1(mdo): snying po ma lha mo 'di cho 'phrul chen po byed myi nus shes khyod smra 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal da pa/ sprin chen snying po lha mo 'di cho 'phrul chen po/ ston myi nus so zhes de skad ma
51b2(mdo): zer cig/ 'on kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gis myi 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/ lha mo 'di las stsogs pa dge la slong ngam/ dge slong ma tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur nas/ yongs su
51b3(mdo): mya ngan las 'da' bar myi 'gyur ba'i sems can de gang yang myed de/ de ni gnas myed do// sprin chen snying po de bas na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bsod nams chung ngu thams cad kyi dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir mdol
51b4(mdo): 'di las byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstand par byed de/ zhes pa smra'o// sprini chen snying po de'i tshe lha mo 'di bud myed kyi lus las bzlog nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed kyi sangs rgyas
51b5(mdo): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba le nad par 'gyuramate/ 'jig/ rten gi khams der bde ba nyams su myong nas rims kyi sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// gsolod pa/ bcom ldan
51b6(mdo): 'das thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i lha mo 'di yun ji srid gcig na sangs rgyas su 'gyur/ 'di'i mying yang ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni mi 'dra bar 'gyur/ 
51b7(mdo): bka' stsal pa/ lha mo 'di ni bskal pa grangs myed pa phrag lnga brgya 'das pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar
51b8(mdo): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bdel bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhye nad pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na myed pa lha dang / 
52a1(mdo): myi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams 'phel bur mdzad pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'di yang 'jig rten gyi 'am
52a2(mdo): sagatsang ma sbyor ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa ni gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams shes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma spyod pa de 'byor da par 'gyur/ bde ba dang / nyams dga'
52a3(mdo): ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang rtsi mang lom gang bar 'gyur ro// 'byor da cing rgyas par gyur da pa de'i tshe/ 'jam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer gtsang ma gsung ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
52a4(mdo): gro khyer gtsang ma gsung ldan du mi bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu ba dam brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpe byed pa'i klod khyer da das dang yang thog dang zla 'tshogs dang / 'obs dpal byed pa dag
52a5(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag cing nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i rgyuklung nag po bzang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i tshe gtsang ma bzang pozhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'gram pha rol tshu rol dpe' myed pa
52a6(mdo): 'i shing ljond pa'i kun dga' ba nyams dga' ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyor ba de yang 'di lta ste dper na dgal ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lo bgyod dang yongs su spyod pa bzhin te/ 
52a7(mdo): mi dang rdo dang / bong ba dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma las stsogs pa myed par 'gyur zhing mu stegs can gyi myong yang myed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mying yang myi grag par lu
52a8(mdo): ro// skyes pa dang bud byed dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de mnyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i gtam gi mying yang myed de theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyas par
52b1(mdo): stond par 'gyur ro// bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'i sems can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag cing bzod pa chen po'i rnyed pa thob pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sa gzhi yang nor bu rin po che thams
52b2(mdo): cad las grub par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu chu bo 'a gser gi me tog dang pad ma thams cad kyis spras par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du myi rnams kyi tshe yang
52b3(mdo): tshad byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de na grong khyer gtsang ma gsung ldan du bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs mang po
52b4(mdo): dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis/ rang gi lus las shi 'phos ma zag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyor ba der/ grong khyer gtsang ma gsung ldan du skye bar 'gyur
52b5(mdo): zhes nga smra'o// ngan song bzhi yang de dag gi spyod yul gyi sar rgya 'gyur ro// sprin chen snying po de bas na/ nga ni bcom ldan// 'das de'i 'jig rten gyi khams gtsang ma sbyor ba dang / bskal
52b6(mdo): pa gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams shes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang zhing bden pa'i mtshams 'phel bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan gzung bar nga smra'o// de nas 'khor chen po lanang nas lha
52b7(mdo): dang mye'i tshogs tshad myed pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i las byas te/ kar byas glu blangs nas bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sems bskyed do// 'di ni mi 'ongs pa'i
52b8(mdo): sems can bye ba snyed dag lung ba stond pa/ sprin chen snying po'i mdol tshig par brgyad par sbyar ba'i/ lelce 'bum las lung bstand pa'i rgyud yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
53a1(mdo): nas/ sprin chen snying po las stsogs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / tri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto phyo chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin
53a2(mdo): sa bya ba rnams yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa sprin chen snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// rdzogs s+ho
53a3(mdo): rgya kar gyi mkhan po su ren da po de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhusate gtan la phab pa/ 
53a4(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya ma ha me kA su tra dag di dag bo d+hi sad dA samud tra/ sa mA ka ya/ ma hod sa pa kr-I do na ma pa ri pa ta/ bod skad tu/ 'phags
53a5(mdo): pa sprin chen po'i mdo las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus padaga' stond chen po rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le lu/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sos
53a6(mdo): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ ma ldan 'das rgyal khrol kha ba na bya rgod phung po'i ril 'od srung chen po las rdzogs pa dge slong
53a7(mdo): gi dge 'dun chen po sa pa phrag brgyad dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen po las stsogs pa dge' slong ma sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying po las rdzogs pa byang chub sems
53a8(mdo): dpalas la phrag drug dang / brgyad 'bum dang / seng ge las sogs pa li tsi byi gzhon nu sa la phrag lnga dang brgyad 'bum dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po las/ 
53b1(mdo): stsogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i bu/ 'bum phrag tshad myed grangs myed pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
53b2(mdo): tu 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon tu 'phags pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// yang de'i
53b3(mdo): tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum gi gnas nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las rtsogs pa sum bcu cha gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad myed grangs myed pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng dong ste lhags nas
53b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs dgacig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa che dan po la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par
53b5(mdo): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha staHgo// yang de'i tshe 'phrul dga'i ris nas/ lha'i rgyal porab 'phrul dga' las stsogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag tshad myed grangs
53b6(mdo): myed pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la
53b7(mdo): mngon tu 'phags pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// yang de'i tshe gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris nas/ lha'i rgyal po dbang / 
53b8(mdo): skyur las rdzogs pa lhal bu 'bum phrag rjid pa myed pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
54a1(mdo): lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// yang de'i tshe klu'i
54a2(mdo): rgyal po pad ma can las stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la klu'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor klu 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
54a3(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa zos
54a4(mdo): pasha stag go// yang de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi/ dbu las sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sa la phrag gsum dang / drug 'bum la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po re re yang 'khor
54a5(mdo): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'aras ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
54a6(mdo): do// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe dri za'i rgyal po dga' ba la stsogs pa
54a7(mdo): rje za'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la/ dri za'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor dri za bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
54a8(mdo): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dri ba'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind mtha' dad pa dag la rnam par rtse
54b1(mdo): ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs rigs las rtsogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag brgyad dang / brgyad 'buM la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po ro re ya ba 'khor lha ma yin
54b2(mdo): 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha ma yin gyi rgyal po de dag
54b3(mdo): thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tang nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dra za'i glang po las stsogs pa nam mkho'i ldang
54b4(mdo): gyi rgyal po sa ya phrag bzhi dang / dgu 'bum la/ nam mkha' do ldang gi rgyal po re re yang 'khor nam mkha' lnga 'bum 'phrag dgrangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bar dong ste/ lhag
54b5(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyog sa gcig tu 'khod do// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de dag tham sa cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting pe 'ji
54b6(mdo): tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe myi 'am ci'i rgyal po logs mthong las stsogs pa myi'am ci'i rgyal po sa sa phrag dgu dang / brgyad 'bum la myi 'am ci'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor myi
54b7(mdo): ci 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po do/ 
54b8(mdo): dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ta po 'dza nad tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe lho phyo chen po yon tan zla ba la stsogs pa lho 'phye chen po'i rgyal po
55a1(mdo): 'bum phrag mang po la lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor lho 'phye chen po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/ 
55a2(mdo): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chul sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind pa dad pa dag la rnam pa
55a3(mdo): tshe ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe srin po'i rgyal po 'brog gnas las stsogs pa srin po'i rgyal po sa a phrag brgyad dang / brgyad 'bum la srin po'i rgyal po ro re yang 'khor srin pa 'bum phrag grangs myed pa
55a4(mdo): dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ba ma ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin po'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang
55a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind pa dang padag la rnam par rtse bsha stag go// yang de'i tshe grul zumargyal po drad ldan las sogs pa/ grul bum gyi rgyal po / 
55a6(mdo): phrag bdun dang brgyad 'bum la grul bum gyi rgyal po re re yang 'khor grul bum 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ka lo ba der song ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
55a7(mdo): bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// grul bum gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de
55a8(mdo): tshe gcod byed kyi zhul rgyal po klog legs btsun las stsogs pa/ gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po sa a phrag brgyad la/ gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po re res pa 'khor gcod byed kyi bu 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag
55b1(mdo): dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gcod byed kyi bu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang
55b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rani chen 'dzind las stsogs pa rigs sngags
55b3(mdo): 'chang gi rgyal po sa ya phrag drug la rigs la tu bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sde lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
55b4(mdo): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe 'byung 'i rgyal po glang po'i snying po las stsogs pa 'byung po sa ya dag gsum dang / brgyad 'bum la 'byung po'i rgyal po re re yang
55b5(mdo): 'khor 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
55b6(mdo): yang de'i tshe drang srong mes sbyin las stsogs pa pa drang srong sa ya phrag dgu la/ drang srong de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lpags
55b7(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor 'bum phrag tu
55b8(mdo): dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dngar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
56a1(mdo): bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe yul tsam pa ka nas/ khyim bdag legs sbyin khyim bdag 'bum phrag tu ma dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der/ 
56a2(mdo): dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad nas/ 
56a3(mdo): yul bcu drug gi myi rnams bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong skye lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag thams cad kyang bya
56a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// yang de'i/ tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ btsun mo mal li ka/ las stsogs pa btsun mo wa drug stong dang / dge bsnyen ma
56a5(mdo): sa ga las stsogs pa/ dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag tu ma thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag bcom lda na 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gaN+DI
56a6(mdo): tu 'khod do// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po las stsogs pa nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag tu ma/ lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po te pi 'dzind tha dad pa dag
56a7(mdo): la rnam par che bsha stag go// tshangs pa rin chen skyong las stsogs pa tshangs pa 'bum phrag tu ma yang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
56a8(mdo): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu mo chu shing lta bu las sogs pa lnga'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma yang 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus te/ kar byed cing glu len la lha mo re res kyang de/ 
56b1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dpe' myed pa dang rad cing mngon par mar rad to// dang rad cing mngon par dang rad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
56b2(mdo): phyag 'tshal da te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud myed kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// lha'i ra si re re nas kyang lha'i
56b3(mdo): bu mo 'bum phrag tu ma gar byed cing glu le nad te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin
56b4(mdo): dag dang ngad te/ mngon par rab tu mang rad te/ dang dad cing mngon bar mang rad te mngon par rab tu dang rad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
56b5(mdo): lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud byed kyi skyon dang bral ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// 5pa de'i tshe phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na dge' slong gan
56b6(mdo): ba de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur da te/ tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogasagacig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la/ 
56b7(mdo): 'di lta ste/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po shugs dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba dang / 
56b8(mdo): rlung gi rgyal po chen po rjes su cher chags zhes bya ba me tog dang / spos thams cad dang lhan cig ldang zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sde lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgral
57a1(mdo): chos snang ba'i sgozhu bar byed do// sprin gyi rgyal po 'bum phrag tu ma yang klu dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs shing / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das
57a2(mdo): sag la ba der dong nas lpags te/ seng ge'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// yang de'i tshe seng ge dpa' po las stsogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag la ngang ba'i rgyal po
57a3(mdo): re re yang 'khor dang pa 'bum phrag tu ma dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dang pa'i skad dpe' myed pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan
57a4(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gci dag tu 'khod do// ngang pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tong nge 'dzin
57a5(mdo): tha dad pa dag la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe bya'o rgyal po legs mthong las stsogs pa rma bya'i rgyal po 'du ma phrag grangs myed pa la rma bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor
57a6(mdo): bya 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ rma bya'i sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
57a7(mdo): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rma bya'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tang nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag
57a8(mdo): go// yang de'i tshe zhu zug gi rgyal po sde las stsogs pa/ khru zug gi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa la khru byug gi rgyal po re res pa 'khor khru byug 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / 
57b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ khru zug gi sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khru byug gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / 
57b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tang nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe ka la bing ka'i rgyal po pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i myig las stsogs pa ka
57b3(mdo): bar ka'i rgyal po 'bum prA grA myed pa la/ ka la bipa ka'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka la bar ka 'bum phrag grangs myed pa da ga la/ ka la bi pe ka'i sgra skad snyand la 'byind cing / bcom ldan 'das
57b4(mdo): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa ya dedag pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ka la bing ka'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang
57b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin / tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe/ shang shang te'u'i rgyal po rgyal ba las sugos pa/ shang shar
57b6(mdo): te'u'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa la shar shar te'u'i rgyal po ro res pa 'khor shang gang te'u 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas sangs
57b7(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i sgra skad snyand pas bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ shang shar te 'u'i rgyal po de dag thams cad
57b8(mdo): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzi nad tha dad pa dag la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe bya'i rigs 'dres pa las phyogs pa tha dad pa grangs myed pa las bya
58a1(mdo): rigs 'dres pa re re la bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa yod de/ bya'i rgyal po re res pa 'khor 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ 
58a2(mdo): lhogs nas/ so so'i bya skad kyi rol mo'i sgra dpe' myed pa'i gnas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstod pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag
58a3(mdo): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe
58a4(mdo): seng ge'i rgyal po rin po che pad ma las batshogs pa/ seng ge/ 'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa la seng ge'i rgyal po re re ya pa 'khor seng ge 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom
58a5(mdo): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra skad kyi rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la sang/ sa rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas/ btso/ 
58a6(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// seng ge'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag
58a7(mdo): la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po'i rgyal por ka na phun lnga bu zhes bya ba las stsogs pa/ spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa la spos kyi glang po re re yang
58a8(mdo): 'khor/ spos kyi glang po 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ 
58b1(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// spos kyi glang po do dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
58b2(mdo): ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par che ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang stag dang ri dgas kyi rigs tha dad la 'dres pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom
58b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sprul dang stag dang / ri dogs de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang
58b4(mdo): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// na po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// / yang de'i tshe sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrang ma
58b5(mdo): dang / bi shu ka dang / nya dang / rU spal dang / chu srin byis pa gso da dang / se sa ra dang / lhag pa dang / sdig pa dang / sprin gyi myed rig grangs myed pa'i yang grangs myed pa dag dang / sdig sbrul za dad pa
58b6(mdo): 'dres pa gnas pa thams cad dang / phag dang / khyi dang / wa dang gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der deng ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis/ 
58b7(mdo): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe sprul dang / myur du gtug pa dang / sbrul gzi'i dgu dang / snu
58b8(mdo): myi bzad pa'i gtug pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grangs myed pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod
59a1(mdo): do// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / 
59a2(mdo): 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dag dang / raM gzhan dag gi lha rnams rang rang ga kheng par zhugs nas// bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi
59a3(mdo): phan tan yang dag pa dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ lhade dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' mes
59a4(mdo): dpa' chen po tang nge 'dzind za dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha/ destag go// yang de'i tshe sman dang / nags kyi lha thams cad rang rang gi khab par zhugaso nas/ bcom ldan 'das
59a5(mdo): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sa sa rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nA/ 
59a6(mdo): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' smin
59a7(mdo): chen snying po 'khor rnams dang / byang chub sems dpal kha cig 'di snyam tu sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skad cig gcig la bskal pa rgya mtsho dpag tu byed pa/ grangs byed pa/ bsam gyis kyi
59a8(mdo): khyab pa/ mtshungs pa myed pa/ gzhal du myed pa/ tshad myed pa/ brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa la 'jug pa mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par
59b1(mdo): sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba phrag ni ji snyed/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag gi/ zabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig
59b2(mdo): rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs la sbyor ba dag
59b3(mdo): gis/ sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed cig bla na myed pa yang sdug pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyind par mdzad cig gu snyam mo// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa thams
59b4(mdo): cad rnam par sel pa sangs rgyas kyi sa gnang ste/ myi 'jigs pa thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas
59b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying la 'di skad ces smras so// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo'i la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas
59b6(mdo): su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs po rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na
59b7(mdo): bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgal ldan gyi gnas nas
59b8(mdo): 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya bo'i chos snang po'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po srin chen po'i mdo' la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lces
60a1(mdo): su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha
60a2(mdo): mo sgyu 'phrul kyi lhums su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang po'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gsheg/ 
60a3(mdo): pa rnams kyi lum bi ne'i skyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs pa rnam par bzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de
60a4(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum ba ne'i skyed mos tshal du ga sung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dal sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying
60a5(mdo): po spyasprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lu3 ne'i bskyed mos tshal nas grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas suH/ shegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la
60a6(mdo): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprini chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ dbang phyug chen po'i mi 'gro byed du 'ong ba rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyis brlas
60a7(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgra yod do// sprin chen snying po spri ni chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhe
60a8(mdo): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byis pa'i ched mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sngar
60b1(mdo): pa'i sgra yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge slob ba'i kra gang tu gshegs pa rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
60b2(mdo): bya ba'i chos snang ba la sgo yod do// smra ni chen snying po smra ni/ chen po' mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge dang / bstan bcos/ dang / lag chis dang / ba ga dang / shod dgod pa bslas rnam
60b3(mdo): par bzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po/ s+pha ni chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shag kya li bu mos 'a
60b4(mdo): ma dam bcas pa 'thob par bya ba laM bslab pa rnam par gzha dag pa'i byin gi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sna ba ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po spyan chen po
60b5(mdo): sim do la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi btsun mo'ir na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa la byin kyi brlabs kyi/ stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
60b6(mdo): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skyed mos 'tshal gyi sar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
60b7(mdo): bya ba'i chos snang ba mi rga yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgan po dang / nad pa dang / ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba la gzigs pa rnam par
60b8(mdo): gzhag pa 'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang po'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po la mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba'i
61a1(mdo): phyir grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying
61a2(mdo): sapo sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi na bza' ngur smrig zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
61a3(mdo): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stog la sbyor pa zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
61a4(mdo): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po 'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa/ rnams kyi dko ba spyod pa la la bzhengs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin kyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo
61a5(mdo): yod do// sprin chen chen po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin/ sheg pa rnams kyi khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i
61a6(mdo): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang gi
61a7(mdo): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po smon chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por ga gas pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
61a8(mdo): bi'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po la khri zhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
61b1(mdo): sdang ba'i rma yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo
61b2(mdo): yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
61b3(mdo): sman chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo/ 
61b4(mdo): yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdom la de ban na gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul dpa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
61b5(mdo): zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po/ sprin chen po la mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi la/ na gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnamapa bcu
61b6(mdo): gnyis su bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo' la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me'i
61b7(mdo): 'od dang / glog gi 'od dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor bu'i 'od dpa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ka 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya
61b8(mdo): ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
62a1(mdo): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba/ 
62a2(mdo): sa/ sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi long dra gyu dang / 'phye bo dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba/ 
62a3(mdo): zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
62a4(mdo): skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la/ sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// na chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa
62a5(mdo): rnams kyi mya khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam paragazhag pa'i byani gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba 'di chos snang po'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sma ni chen po'i
62a6(mdo): mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
62a7(mdo): po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin kyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bzhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
62a8(mdo): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu ba las rdzogs pa mu stegs byed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la
62b1(mdo): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa' ma da la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dug brgyad bcu cha bzhi kun tu 'khrugs pa rnam
62b2(mdo): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i tshwa yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa ni
62b3(mdo): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sor mo'i 'phreng ba'i nad kun tu
62b4(mdo): 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snyid po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
62b5(mdo): kyi gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kun tu 'khrugs pa rnam pa/ ra gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya/ ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
62b6(mdo): zo'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i rgyal po bag ma myed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
62b7(mdo): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snyi
62b8(mdo): po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen sna
63a1(mdo): po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi myi ngas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
63a2(mdo): sa r+b+ba sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo lnga de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i kanas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bal pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
63a3(mdo): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sman chen snying po sman chen po'i mardol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu nam mkhal lding kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la spyodar
63a4(mdo): ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge 'du/ gyi dben kun tu 'azhug pa rnam par gzhag pa'o byin gyi brlabs
63a5(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgra yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa/ rnams kyi zag 'phen pa dang / 'jog pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam
63a6(mdo): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin cen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glang po che nod kyis 'dug kun tu 'khrug pa
63a7(mdo): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba mtshwa snga pa'i ska med do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tham ze'i bu mo sku byed kun tu 'jug
63a8(mdo): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun tu rgyu mdzes mas sgra
63b1(mdo): btags nas// kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo' la de bzhin gshegs
63b2(mdo): pa rnams kyi shag kya gsod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprini chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
63b3(mdo): kyi nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
63b4(mdo): kyi rang gi lus la las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgro yod do// sma ni chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes
63b5(mdo): kyi theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi sto/ bas la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin che/ na snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
63b6(mdo): kyi 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgra yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lte bar gyurd pa
63b7(mdo): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sma ni chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sgro btags pa rnam par gzhan
63b8(mdo): pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi las su bsgo ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
64a1(mdo): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po spyan chen po'i mdo' la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi blang ba dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
64a2(mdo): sagyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'deg pa dang 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
64a3(mdo): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dus byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
64a4(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// // sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlab
64a5(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sman chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi
64a6(mdo): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// srin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
64a7(mdo): zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// srin chen snying po srin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
64a8(mdo): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba
64b1(mdo): 'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po/ sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmyigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
64b2(mdo): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
64b3(mdo): po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs// 
64b4(mdo): pa rnams kyi 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen pa'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa
64b5(mdo): rnams kyi brjod du myed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs/ kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// swA na chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnas
64b6(mdo): kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang pa'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen pol mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
64b7(mdo): chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rlom sems rnam
64b8(mdo): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang po'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
65a1(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mying rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
65a2(mdo): sar+b+ba kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la/ 
65a3(mdo): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// spyan chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyend kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stob la sbyor ba zhes
65a4(mdo): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// smran chen snying po sman chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa rnam bar gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
65a5(mdo): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sman chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge rnam ra gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
65a6(mdo): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po 'i mdol la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nga rgyal myed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
65a7(mdo): chos snang po'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya
65a8(mdo): ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// / de las bsogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba'i sgo bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong phrag gang ko'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod do// 
65b1(mdo): de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod sku nas// 'od gzer chags pa myed pa/ 'jigs pa myed pa'i rigs shes bya ba 'od gcer gyi 'khor grangs byed pa dag byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
65b2(mdo): rab 'byar thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstand te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas
65b3(mdo): pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyind par byas nas/ phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpal kun tu
65b4(mdo): bzang po'i lus la phog par gyurd to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos myi 'di dgas pa thob nas/ stan las langs te/ gla gos phrag
65b5(mdo): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pa sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
65b6(mdo): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par
65b7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgal ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
65b8(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho bo 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das
66a1(mdo): kyis 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan
66a2(mdo): 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed
66a3(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dire bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su cha phra bar snang par rnam par gzhag pa'i
66a4(mdo): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub semasadapal gang dag za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chutu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
66a5(mdo): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lcam bi ni'i bskyed mos la du sku bltam pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi sto sa la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa
66a6(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal tu gom pa 'dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i
66a7(mdo): byin gyi brlabs kyi spobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsu bar gsol// bcom ldan
66a8(mdo): 'das kyis lum bai ni li bskyed mos tshal tu phyogs bcur gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa la byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
66b1(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni li skyed mos tshal tu gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi
66b2(mdo): stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol // bcom ldan 'das
66b3(mdo): kyis lumo bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal nas/ khrong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa
66b4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po rim 'gro bgyid du mtsho pa rnam pa
66b5(mdo): gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub/ sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khod
66b6(mdo): 'dir bskul bar gsol da// bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
66b7(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byis po'i rtsed mo rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
66b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol da// bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge slob pa'i
67a1(mdo): gang tu gshegs pa rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ 
67a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsolang// bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang bstand bcos dang / lag chos dang / batsho ba dang / shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
67a3(mdo): gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal ga pa dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// 
67a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis shig kya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dam bcas/ pa thob par bgyid pa'i slag na rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal
67a5(mdo): gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu kod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dor bsdu bar/ gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor na
67a6(mdo): bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
67a7(mdo): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis krob khyer chen po ser skya'o gnas nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi ser gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
67a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan po dang / nad pa
67b1(mdo): pa dang / shi ba dang / rab tu byung ba gzigs pa la rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
67b2(mdo): bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'diri bsdu bar gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung bar mngon par 'phyogs te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par
67b3(mdo): byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
67b4(mdo): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' ngur smyig pa zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi ba rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
67b5(mdo): gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bko/ da pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar ga so lad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod cing bzhugs
67b6(mdo): papa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal ga bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
67b7(mdo): 'dir bskul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa'/ gang dag bla na myed
67b8(mdo): pas bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khom 'dir bsu bar na ma yod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa la byin gi se mams
68a1(mdo): stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// 
68a2(mdo): sabacom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
68a3(mdo): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
68a4(mdo): sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di/ bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying
68a5(mdo): po la bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ste bas la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa
68a6(mdo): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad 'gug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
68a7(mdo): gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i
68a8(mdo): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// 
68b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon pa ma rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la spyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par
68b2(mdo): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa khyod kyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
68b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpal gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum
68b4(mdo): du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskodab rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bdas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang
68b5(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'angs kyis zhugs kyi 'od dang / glog gi 'od dang / zla ba dang / 
68b6(mdo): nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor bu'i 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
68b7(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i
68b8(mdo): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar
69a1(mdo): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par/ 
69a2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
69a3(mdo): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
69a4(mdo): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / tud 'gro dang / me dgas dang / gshin rje li dag rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
69a5(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang da gabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/ pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul da/ 
69a6(mdo): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu myi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs
69a7(mdo): la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das
69a8(mdo): kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlab kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de/ 
69b1(mdo): dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs
69b2(mdo): la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dge bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
69b3(mdo): kyis spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu la stsogs pa mu stegs can rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par
69b4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tug brgya bcu rtsa bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag
69b5(mdo): po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
69b6(mdo): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlab sa kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
69b7(mdo): dge/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i 'phreng ba kun tu 'khrug
69b8(mdo): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ phran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
70a1(mdo): kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'phrog gnas kun tu 'khrugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
70a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// / bcom ldan 'das kyis
70a3(mdo): klu'i rgyal po sog ma myed kun da tu 'khrugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag pur rdzogs pa'i
70a4(mdo): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ dkyi can 'dis su no// tsaldan 'ad kyi pha ge kun tu'azhug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
70a5(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu kod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho bo 'dir bskul bar/ gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa
70a6(mdo): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
70a7(mdo): 'dir bsu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis myi nges kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bran myed pa
70a8(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs
70b1(mdo): pa can dag gi klu'i gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bab pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par/ 
70b2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i gnas dag tu nam mkha' ldeng kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhan
70b3(mdo): ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dgabacom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsu
70b4(mdo): bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi dbye na kund tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal gang dag
70b5(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkodapa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol da// bcom ldan 'das kyis brag 'phen pa dang
70b6(mdo): 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ blan myed pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
70b7(mdo): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che nor gyis 'jug kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
70b8(mdo): blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo sku byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam pa
71a1(mdo): gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
71a2(mdo): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// 
71a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis shag kyi gsod pa
71a4(mdo): kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa dra dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom
71a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan// 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzha/ ga pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
71a6(mdo): sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lus la
71a7(mdo): las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
71a8(mdo): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bgrod pa ni go cig yur bas te/ gnyis sam gsum ma mchis la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / bgrod pa gcig pu
71b1(mdo): bas te/ gnyis sam gsum ma mchis pa 'di ni/ chos nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag
71b2(mdo): ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bstsal
71b3(mdo): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni 'jig pa mchis pa lags te/ 'jig pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las// gzhan ma lags pa'i slad
71b4(mdo): tu ste/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin las/ 'jog pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin nyida'adzi/ ga pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gyis
71b5(mdo): 'jig pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
71b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong
71b7(mdo): pa ste/ lta bar gyur pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lta bar gyu rad pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid
71b8(mdo): gzhan ma lags kyi/ lta bar gyur pa'i rab bzhin nyid stong po nyid lags te/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid shes pa des chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'ad
72a1(mdo): kyis lta bar gyur pa rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
72a2(mdo): dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa ma mchis pa ste/ sgro btags pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du
72a3(mdo): zhe na/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad tu ste/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin las/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ spro btags pa'i rang bzhin nyid
72a4(mdo): sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sgro btags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ 
72a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin bya// brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
72a6(mdo): chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsu la bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa ste/ las su bsgo ba rnam par dag pa lags so// 
72a7(mdo): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ las su bsgo ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ las su bsgo ba'i rang bzhin las/ las su bskol ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ las su bsgo
72a8(mdo): ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa lags te/ las su bsgo ba'i rang bzhin gyis las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 
72b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis las su bsgo ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
72b2(mdo): dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni blang ba dang / dor ba ma mchis pa ste/ blang ba dang dor ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de
72b3(mdo): ci'i slad du zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ blang ba dang
72b4(mdo): dor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ blang ba dang dor ba rnams ma mchis// pa lags te/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ blang ba dang / dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad bla ba dang
72b5(mdo): dor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis blang ba dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa
72b6(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'dag
72b7(mdo): pa dang 'jog pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhini las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las 'deg pa dang 'jog pa
72b8(mdo): ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa
73a1(mdo): shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'deg pa dang 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'deg pa dang 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la/ 
73a2(mdo): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bstsal bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos
73a3(mdo): thams cad ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 'dus/ byas rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad tu ste/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las
73a4(mdo): 'dus ma byas gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhi na nyid// 'dus ma byas lags te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ dus ma byas shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'dus ma
73a5(mdo): byas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dus byas// rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang
73a6(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams ni dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi
73a7(mdo): rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las dngos gzhi ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi
73a8(mdo): dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin nyid dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin gyis// dngos gzhi ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan
73b1(mdo): 'das kyis dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan
73b2(mdo): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa ste/ gnas rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las
73b3(mdo): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ gnas kyi rang bzhin nyid gnas ma mchis/ lags te/ gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis// gnas ma
73b4(mdo): mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad gnas ma ma chis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam pa dar gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
73b5(mdo): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa ya ba dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// 
73b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos po rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos po'i
73b7(mdo): rang bzhin las dngos po ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid// dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po rang bzhin gyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa shes pa des// chos
73b8(mdo): thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa
74a1(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su ma mchis pa lag/ 
74a2(mdo): sa te/ gnyis rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi
74a3(mdo): gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid/ gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnyis su ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan
74a4(mdo): 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
74a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsku' bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis ba lags te/ mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa lags so// 
74a6(mdo): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan mo lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid// 
74a7(mdo): mtshan nyid mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis mtshan nyid ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nyid rnam pa/ 
74a8(mdo): gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
74b1(mdo): bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dmyigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ dmyigs pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmyigs pa'i rang bzhin las
74b2(mdo): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dmyigs pa'i rang bzhin las dmyigs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dmyigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dmyigs pa mchis pa lags ste/ dmyigs
74b3(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmyigs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dmyigs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmyigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi
74b4(mdo): stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rga na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bayul bar gsol/ 
74b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni/ dbul ma'i lam la gas te/ mtha' rnam par dag pa lags so/ de ci'i slad tu/ zhe na/ mtha'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du
74b6(mdo): ste/ mtha'i rang bzhin las/ dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtha' rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu' ma'i lam shes pa des/ chos thams cad dbu'
74b7(mdo): ma'i lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
74b8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus rnam par dag pa
75a1(mdo): lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lus kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin las lus ma mchis pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/ lus kyi rang bzhin nyid/ lus
75a2(mdo): ma mchis pa nyid lags te/ lus kyi rang bzhin gyis lus ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad lus ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rnam par gzhag po'i byin gyi brlag
75a3(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das
75a4(mdo): chos thams cad ni 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ ra/ pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i srad tu zhe na/ 'khor pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'a
75a5(mdo): ba'i rang bzhin las 'khor ba gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor ba ma rang bzhin gyis/ 'khor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos
75a6(mdo): thams cad 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa
75a7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du myed pa rnam par
75a8(mdo): dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zha na/ brjod cu byed pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma legs pa'i srid tu ste/ 'arjod du byed pa'i rang bzhin las/ 'arjod du byed pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi
75b1(mdo): brjod du byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod du ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ brjod du myed pa ma mchis pa shes pa des// chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ tso// 
75b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis brjod du myed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dge bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom/ 
75b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad
75b4(mdo): du zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongs po'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ kun nas nyon mongs po'i rang bzhin las kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ kun nas nyon mongs
75b5(mdo): ba'i rang bzhin nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lag/ sa te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ kun nas// nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad
75b6(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan
