75b7(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskung bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags
75b8(mdo): te/ chags pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ chags pa'i rang bzhin las chags pa ma mchis pa gzhan sa/ 
76a1(mdo): lags kyi/ chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis tshogs pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa lags na
76a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpal gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
76a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsku bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rlom sos
76a4(mdo): kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad tu ste/ rlom das kyi rang bzhin las// rlom sems ma mchis pa gzhan sa/ lags kyi/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ rlom sems ma
76a5(mdo): mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rnamasems ma mchis pa zhes pa des/ chos thams cad rlom mas ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rlom
76a6(mdo): sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
76a7(mdo): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yod pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma
76a8(mdo): lags pa'i slad cu ste/ sod pa'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ pang pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ yod pa ma mchis pa
76b1(mdo): shes pa des/ chos thams cad yod pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag zla
76b2(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mying ma mchis pa lags te/ mying
76b3(mdo): rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad tu zhe na/ mying gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ myang gi rang bzhin las mying ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ mying gi rang bzhin
76b4(mdo): nyid mying mchis pa lags te/ mying gi rang bzhin gyis/ myidamachis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mying ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mying rnam par gzhag
76b5(mdo): po'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub se mas dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho
76b6(mdo): 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags
76b7(mdo): po'i skad du ste/ bdag gi rang bzhin las bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags kyi/ bdag gi rang bzhin nyid bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag gi rang bzhin gyis/ bdag
76b8(mdo): ma mchis pa zhes pa des/ chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
77a1(mdo): bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba
77a2(mdo): sarnam mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkye nad kyi bya ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ rgyu dang rkye nad kyi bya ba'i
77a3(mdo): rang bzhin las// rgyu dang rkye nad kyi bya ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma legs kyi/ rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba 'i rang bzhin nyid/ rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis
77a4(mdo): rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rgyu dang rgyand kyi khyab ma mchis pa lags / bcom lda na 'das kyi rgyu dang rkyend kyi bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
77a5(mdo): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
77a6(mdo): 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i
77a7(mdo): slad du ste/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa shes
77a8(mdo): pa des/ chos thams cad 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed
77b1(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ke rnam par dag pa ldan
77b2(mdo): so// de ci'i slad tu zhe na/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ yi ge ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid/ yi ge ma mchis pa lags/ 
77b3(mdo): yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis yi ge ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yi ge ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
77b4(mdo): sems dpa' gang dag/ blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni/ 
77b5(mdo): nga rgyal myed pa ma mchis pa lags te/ nga rgyal myed pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nga rgyal myed pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ nga rgyal myed pa lam
77b6(mdo): bzhin las/ nga rgyal byed pa'i ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ nga rgyal byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ nga rgyal ma mchis pa lags te/ nga rgyal myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ nga rgyal myed pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ 
77b7(mdo): chos thams nga rgyal myed pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyal byed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag/ 
77b8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsku' bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mya khyab pa lags te/ yul bsam gyis skye
78a1(mdo): khyab pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sul bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ sul bsam gyis kyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las/ yul
78a2(mdo): sa klu bsam gyis myi khyab pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yul gyis myi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis
78a3(mdo): yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa'am mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
78a4(mdo): nyon mongs pa can dag tu sul bsam gyis kyi khyab pa na dam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
78a5(mdo): chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor/ 'dir bsku' bar gsol// de bzhin tu stong pa nyid kyi sgor// 'jug pa grangs myed pa dag la/ phan tshun gnyen por gyubad pa
78a6(mdo): 'dres pa'i tshul dag gis 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kun nas nyon mongs po can tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams
78a7(mdo): sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi gyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
78a8(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor bas// sems can gang rgya mtsho ji snyed blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu spyan pa mdzad pa'i byang chub seMs dang ga bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bskul bar gsol// de skad ces
78b1(mdo): gsold nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa zugs su chud do// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyend nas/ bsam pa yongs
78b2(mdo): su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir zhabs gnyis kyi mthil nas/ 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rte nad kyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma
78b3(mdo): snyed kyi rtul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed phyur ro// de bzhin tu zhabs kyi sor mo 'chags re re dang / de bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang / de bzhin tu pus mo'i lhang gnyis dang / de
78b4(mdo): bzhin du brla'i gnyis dang / de bzhin du sta zur dang / de bzhini du chibs logs gnyis dang / de bzhin du lta khung / dang / de bzhin tu phrag pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung 'go gnyi
78b5(mdo): dang / de bzhin du dpung pa gnyis dang / de bzhin tu lag ma zil gnyis dang / de bzhin du phyag sor gi tshigs re re dang de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / de bzhin du mthod spu dang / de bzhin du dbu
78b6(mdo): Sho sgra nyag ma re re dang / de bzhin tu mtshan re re dang / de bzhin tu dpe' byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du spu'i khur bu re re nas kyang / 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ga pag
78b7(mdo): klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed phyung ste/ shar da phyogs su 'phros so// de la 'od zer gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
78b8(mdo): gang ga'i klung lnga bcu 'bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur da te// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
79a1(mdo): mchog 'od gzer gcig gis khyab pa de/ gnyis kyis khyab pa myi byed do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin tu byang sha rad kyi mtshams
79a2(mdo): dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng dang 'og gi phyogs su yang 'od gzer rgya mtsho de dag thams
79a3(mdo): cad 'bros so// de las 'od gnar gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga ka'i klung bcu'i bye la snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'byam khrig rgya la khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyad kyi 'jig
79a4(mdo): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang gcig gis khyab pa de/ gnyis kyis khyab par myi byed da do// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
79a5(mdo): mtsho 'od gzer de dag gis sdang bar byas pa gang yin pade dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye
79a6(mdo): ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab rtul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lpags so// byang chub sems dpal re re'i 'khor kyang byang chub sems dpal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
79a7(mdo): gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags na/ 'khor byang chub snyoms dpal sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tsho nya shu
79a8(mdo): lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lho mi spos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tshul phra rab kyi tshul 'bum phrag rgya
79b1(mdo): khrag khrig grangs myed pa lta ci smos/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du myed pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra
79b2(mdo): rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten
79b3(mdo): gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rtend kyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rtend gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
79b4(mdo): lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams ngagacig gi d+hu/ la phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos// 'khor 'jig rten gyims gang ga'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos// 'khor ga
79b5(mdo): ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos// 'khor gang gA 'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos// 'khor gang ga 'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lto ci smos// 'khor gang go'i klung
79b6(mdo): lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos// 'khor gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed lta ci smos// 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye mo'i bzhi cha snyed lta ci smos// 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma li brgyad cha snyed
79b7(mdo): lha ci smos// 'khor gang go'i klung bye ma'i bcu drug cha snyed lce ci spos// 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye mo'i cha nye shu snyed lta ci smos// 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga 'a
79b8(mdo): ste ci smos// 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ce smos te/ 
80a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang / nor bu rin po/ 
80a2(mdo): che'i rgyal po'i sprin bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa myed cing / bsgrib pa myed la ma 'dres pa'i nam/ 
80a3(mdo): mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin/ ye shes kyi tshogs
80a4(mdo): rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ga/ tord cing mngon par gto da to// gtor da cing mngon par gtor/ 
80a5(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan grangs myed par ba/ skor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shar phyogs/ ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su
80a6(mdo): yang de dang 'dra'o/ shar lho la mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// lho nub kyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// nub byang gi mtshams su yang do dang 'dra'o/ byang sha rad kyi mtshams su 'ang de dang 'dra'o// steng tu
80a7(mdo): 'ang de dang 'dra'o// 'og gi phyogs su 'ang de dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od gzer de dag gis snang bar byas pa de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas kyi
80a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rtend kyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags so// 
80b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpal remaya 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul bye ba khrag khrig grangs byed
80b2(mdo): pa snyed kyis bskor na/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du byed pa snyed lta ci spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams brgya
80b3(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
80b4(mdo): lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul pa rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi tshul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rtend kyi khams
80b5(mdo): gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor ba/ ra ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du lta ci smos// 'kho/ rebye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga brergya lta
80b6(mdo): ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci spos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor khyong chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag gcig lta
80b7(mdo): ci smos te byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po la bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa myed
80b8(mdo): cing / sgrib pa myed la/ ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po'i che'i rgyal po'i sprin
81a1(mdo): sa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gto da to// gtor da cing mngon par gtor da nas/ bcom// 
81a2(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal da te/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs che re reng / 'jig rten gyi khams
81a3(mdo): rgya mtsho/ gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed 'jig rtend kyi khams rgya mtsho la/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i
81a4(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rtul re re la/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs
81a5(mdo): myed pa snyed gnas par gyur da te/ 'on kyang sems can/ su la yang gnod pa 'am/ sgrib pa myed do// 'jig rten/ gyi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / 
81a6(mdo): lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / gangs chen po dang / 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po rnams dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho' chen po rnams dang / 
81a7(mdo): lha'i gnas rnams dang / krung dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshelnga rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang / gnod pa'am/ 
81a8(mdo): sgrib pa myed de/ sngon ji lta ba de bzhin tu phyis kyang / bya ba la 'jug par gyur da to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin tu de bzhin gshegs
81b1(mdo): pa mngon sum du bzhugs par mthong ngo po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'
81b2(mdo): kha cig 'di snyam tu sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor
81b3(mdo): pa'i 'jig rtend gyi pyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
81b4(mdo): kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag kas sems can gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyind dpar mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam/ 
81b5(mdo): 'on te gzhan yang gang dag ma 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byad chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa
81b6(mdo): thugs kyis mkhyend nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka' saNald pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 
81b7(mdo): mngon par shes pa la rnam par brtse ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed yod par gyur/ 
81b8(mdo): la/ nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang / se gol gtogs pa re re la sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum
82a1(mdo): phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed bskyed de// nyan thos chen po re res kyang / sems bskyed pa re res gom pa 'dor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rte nad kyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga
82a2(mdo): 'iklung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed song la/ gom pa re re bor nas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye
82a3(mdo): ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dal bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang du nyan chen po gcig 'gro/ 
82a4(mdo): ba der/ gnyis myi 'gro ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis/ bskal brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshog ka'i klung lnga pa/ cu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag
82a5(mdo): khrig grangs myed pa snyed tu 'gro bar byed de/ sha rad phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin tu/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin tu sha ra lho mtshams dang / de bzhin tu lho nub kyi mtshams dang / 
82a6(mdo): de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shard kyi mtshams phyogs su so bzhipa/ nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba dang / gnyis mye 'gro la/ de nas myi la la zhag gis
82a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i che mor thug par rabs kun nas bskor de// lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur da cing / rdo dang / gseg
82a8(mdo): ma dang / gyo mo myed par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la/ de nas mya des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas/ bye me 'bru re re nas blangs la/ grong khyer de'i nang ga byi ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod
82b1(mdo): de snyed kyi char gses te/ bachi ba'i thabs 'dis/ bye ma'i 'bru de dag thams cad char ka ses la/ de nas myi bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad shar phyogs su khyer te/ bye ma'i 'bru char kases
82b2(mdo): pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing / bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa gcig bor te/ brtsi ba'i thabs 'das bye ma'i 'bru char ga ses pa de dag thams cad bor te/ 
82b3(mdo): shar phyogs su ji lta de bzhin du/ lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i ma rnams dang / de bzhin tu lho nub mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / 
82b4(mdo): de bzhin du byang sha rad kyi mtshams su bor la/ de nas myi des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru 'char gses pa de dag bor ba dang / gang du ma bor ba'i 'jog
82b5(mdo): rtend kyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gciH/ tu byas la/ srid pa'i che mor thug par ra bas kun nas la skor da te/ lag mthil bzhin tu mnyam par gyur da cing / 
82b6(mdo): rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste/ zur bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpal 'khor 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni bye ma'i gro khyer de las/ bye ma'i 'brugan
82b7(mdo): sa du 'ad do// nga'i byang chub sems dpal 'dams 'dus pa ni/ grob khye ma de la nang gi bye ma lhag sa ji snyed pa tsam mo// de'i lag ma'i gyi ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
82b8(mdo): chen po thams cad kyang mying mthun la/ rus gcig pa sha stag yin na/ gying tha dad dang / rus pa dad pa lta ci smos// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting po 'dzin
83a1(mdo): thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'jog yongs su grub pa mtha' sas pa la bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa rgya mar sangs rgyas 'byung ba/ 
83a2(mdo): sastond pa dang / 'jig rtend kyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su smyind par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur dpa
83a3(mdo): dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpal 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpald dag gi nang nas/ kha cig gi sems can yongs su sbyin/ 
83a4(mdo): par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyurd pa mthong na tsam rung snyam so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems da de'ade dag 'khor de'i nang du bsdu ba dang / de dag gi sems
83a5(mdo): can yongs su sbyind par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa la stand pa'i phyir se gol gyi sgra mdzad do// de'i tshe shar phyogasakyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag nas/ byang
83a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mched dag gi mdab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchogang yin pa de dag gi ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga
83a7(mdo): ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yan/ 
83a8(mdo): rab tu gsol/ kun tu rab tu gsol/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'jug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ nyura'ur/ rab tu/ 
83b1(mdo): nyu nyung/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la 'jig rten gyi khams re re na/ shar da phyogs dpa' na nub phyogs mthol/ nub phyogs dmal na shar phyogs mthol/ lho phyogs/ 
83b2(mdo): dma' na byang phyogs mthol/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mthol/ byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs dmal na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mthol// lho nug mtshams kyi phyogs dmal na/ byang shar
83b3(mdo): mtshams kyi phyogs mthol/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dmal na// nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mthol// nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dmal na/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho'o// mtha'
83b4(mdo): dpal na dbus mthol/ dbus dmalan mtha' mtho'o ste/ der phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// nuphyogs kyang de dang 'a dra'o// byang phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// 
83b5(mdo): shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams kyang de dang 'dra'o// steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi
83b6(mdo): khams rgya mtsho la 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi mdapa kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa
83b7(mdo): de dag gi pha rol kyi yang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
83b8(mdo): rgya mtshol 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kund tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yol// rab tu g.yo'o// kun tu rab tu g.yo'o/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem// kun tu rab
84a1(mdo): chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ura'ung/ rab tu 'u ra'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'u ny+tsa te/ 'jig rtend kyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi
84a2(mdo): khams re re yang / shar phyogs dmal na nub phyogs mthol/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mthol// lho phyogs dmal na byang phyogs mtho'/ byang phyogs dmalan lho phyogs mthol/ byang sha
84a3(mdo): gyi mtshams kyi phyogs dmal na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho'o/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dmal na byang shard mtshams kyi phyogs mthol// shar lho mtshams kyi phyog dang ni nub byang mtshams
84a4(mdo): kyi phyogs mthol/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dmal na// shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mthol/ mtha' dma' na dbusamathol/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho' bar gyur da to// yang de
84a5(mdo): 'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun na se shon na ga rgya dog su byes byed kyi ma kyi ga rkyenan// zhig gres byed da / na gyi lam kya rjod ni 'jig rten gi khams me na rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la/ 'jig rten
84a6(mdo): kyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gnas par gyur da te/ 'dzam bu'i chu'o'i gser gyi stegs/ 
84a7(mdo): gyur na po ches spras pas ni bskor/ rin po che'i tsho bo cang kis ni mdzes par byas/ gtugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdan ni bsgreb/ trail bu ka ser ka'i dra ba ni bres/ tsa dan sbrul gyis snying pos
84a8(mdo): ni byugs/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i thabs ni bkab/ rin po che mthon khe chen po ni de myig dmangs ris su khris te/ nor bu rin po che'i tra bo 'i phyogs re re nas kyang / mu tig gi rgyan
84b1(mdo): 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog tu ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng ba kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha don du ma dang ldan
84b2(mdo): ba/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar gyi lnga ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog tu ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye pa khrag khrig grangs myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // ras
84b3(mdo): kyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog tu ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dag 'phyang po// dar gyi chun kor kha dog tu ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag grangs myed pa
84b4(mdo): dpag tu myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // trail bu g.yer ka'i tra ba kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog tu ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag/ khrig dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i
84b5(mdo): rgyan 'phreng dang mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng de dag la/ rlung gis/ phog na yang / lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang / mu teg gi rgyan 'phreng rlung gis phog
84b6(mdo): pa de dag las lha'i sgra yad du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu na/ sil snyan gyi yan lag dpel myed pa 'bum phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dpon gyis brdungs pa las kyang / de lta bu'i sgra brnyan pa myi 'byung ngo // dI
84b7(mdo): bu g.yer ka'i 'phreng ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha yul ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ kaser gi snod 'dzam bu klong gi tshad tsham brdungs pa las kyang / de lta bu/ 
84b8(mdo): lisma zab cing yid tu 'ong ba myi 'byung ngo // dmyig mangs ris re res pa rin po che'i shing ljon pa me re yod de/ rin po che'i stegs lus ni bskor/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes
85a1(mdo): par byas/ gtugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / rin po che'i rgyanang 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu myed pa/ grangs myed pas ni brgyand mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu byed/ 
85a2(mdo): sagrangs myed pas kyang brgyand te// ras kyi lnga lnga'i rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang / me tog gi lnga lnga rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba'i rkyergya nad dag tu myed grangs
85a3(mdo): myed pas kyang brgya nad to// rin po che'i shing ldand pa re re'i drung na yang rin po che seng geli khri 'phang du dpag ched lnga brgya ba yod de/ rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang mu tika dang / rin po
85a4(mdo): li 'phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgrib/ dril bu g.ye khali dra ba'i na da ni zas/ tsan dan sprul kyi snying pos ni thugs/ me tog
85a5(mdo): man rA la ra dang / man da ra chen po dang / man tu sha ka dang / ma na 'du sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / sA
85a6(mdo): ma dang / bar shi ka dang / ta r+ya ni dang / bal li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / rab tu tre zhes dang / da ni ska ri dang / lha'i snga ma dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / me to// 
85a7(mdo): chen po rnams ni bkram/ nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron ma'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po nyi zla'i sgron mo'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang / 
85a8(mdo): nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan 'breng gi rgyan dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i dbang gi rgyal po'i rgyan dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang / nor bu rin po che ye
85b1(mdo): can gyi rgyun 'breng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba can gyi rgyar 'phreng gyi rgyan dang / tsag+ho bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rgyad 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan
85b2(mdo): 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyu nad 'breng gi rkyen dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od kyi rkyen 'phreng gi rgyan dang / bu rin po che pad ma ral gyi rgyan 'phreng gyi rgyan dang / 
85b3(mdo): nor bu rin po mchu 'dang ka rkyen 'phre ga rkye nad dang / nor bu rin po che bye dUr+ya'i rgyan 'phreng gyi rgyu nad dang / nor bu rin po che an da stsol gyi rgyad 'breng kyi rgyand kyis kyang brgya na to// ron bu rin po che
85b4(mdo): po'i rgyan 'phreng gyi rgyan gyis kyang brgyand to// nor bu ra na po che dpal gyi snying po'i rgyan 'phreng kyi rgyun gyis kyang na to// nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod kyi rgyand 'breng
85b5(mdo): rgyand kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig dkar po'i rgyand 'phra dkyi rgyand kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig mthon ka'i rgyan da 'phreng gyi rgyand kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tig ser po
85b6(mdo): rgya dang 'phreng gyi rgyand kyis kyang brgya nad te/ mu tika dmar po'i rgyun 'phreng gyi rgyu nad kyis kyang brgya nad to// myo tig gser mdog go rgyan 'phreng kyi rgyand kyis kyang brgya nad to// mu tika nam ma
85b7(mdo): mdog gi rgya nad 'phreng ka rkye nad kyis kyang brgya na to/ mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos ra dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ 'od gcer rgya mtsho'i smon dpag tu
85b8(mdo): byed pa dang / grangs myed pa dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / gzhas du byed pa dang / tshad myed pa dag zung ngo // de la 'od gzer rgya mtshor spon kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs pa dang kyi
86a1(mdo): mtsho grangs pa'i khyab par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'og cing rgya mtsho'i sprin kha gcig las ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 
86a2(mdo): 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni pha rol tu phyind pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo / 'og zer rgya mtsho'i spun kha cig las ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i
86a3(mdo): khyad par bstan pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i smon kha cig las ni/ gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni// 
86a4(mdo): tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa/ dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho lnga cig/ las ni/ so so yang dag/ par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan/ 
86a5(mdo): pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig la sa ni/ mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'o// 
86a6(mdo): srin kha cig las ni/ sman lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig lus ni/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dad pa'i rgya mtsho grangs byed
86a7(mdo): pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag khyang po// 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ dbugs 'byind pa thob pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed po'i khyad par bstand pa 'arjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od ga
86a8(mdo): rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las niH/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho la grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprind kha cig las na/ de bzhin gshegs
86b1(mdo): 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od garer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho
86b2(mdo): grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las mi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa
86b3(mdo): dag byung ngo // 'od gzir rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa dag zung ngo // yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
86b4(mdo): kham rgya glang yin pa de dag 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu dab tu 'gul/ gsol/ rab tu gsol/ kun tu rab tu gsol/ 9deka/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem// rab
86b5(mdo): tu chemaches/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu zhug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ shur nyur/ rab tu 'ur zhum/ kun tu rab tu rgyamacu ro// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
86b6(mdo): de dag las// 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas kyang // byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rtul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags
86b7(mdo): so// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pore re 'i 'kho yang / byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshul 'bum phrag bye ba
86b8(mdo): zhig grangs byed pa snyed lpags so// byang chub sems dpal re res kyang / nor bu rin po me'i rgyal po'i sprin gzungs rgya mamo grangs myed pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsas gyi mar gyin
87a1(mdo): chags pa myed cing sgril pa myed la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkhal khyag par byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor dor ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpal re res kyang / lha'i nor bu rin po
87a2(mdo): che'i rgyal po la sprin ting nge 'dzin da rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi tshar gyis chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas te/ 
87a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la gtord cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor da to// gtor da cing mngon par gtor da la mngon par rab tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhadas la mgo bos
87a4(mdo): phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas nas ra pa rang gi smon lam las zung ba'i seng ge 'i khrel 'khod do// de shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang
87a5(mdo): dang / sha khri'i mtshams dang / lho tshub kyi mtshams dang / 'byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar dkyi mtshams dang / dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la gas
87a6(mdo): yin pa de dag kyang / 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu bkrus/ gsol/ rab tu gapa'o/ kun tu rab tu gas ma/ lden/ rab tu ldog/ kun tu rab tu ljin/ chem ches/ rab tu ches ches/ kunaH
87a7(mdo): rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'azhug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ nyur nyur/ rab tu 'ur nyur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur nyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpal rgya
87a8(mdo): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klub lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag khye gakhrag khrig grangs byed pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor yang byang chub sems
87b1(mdo): dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu
87b2(mdo): rin po che rgya mtsho'i sprin rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod pa/ stong gsung gi stong chen po bcu 'i ched tsam gyi tshar gyis/ chags pa myed cing / sgrib pa myed la/ ma 'dres pa yin ma sa
87b3(mdo): khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dopa ste/ lpags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rare res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i smen so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa brjod/ 
87b4(mdo): pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po lo bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing / mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtord to// gtord cing mngon par gtor/ 
87b5(mdo): la/ mngon par rab tu gtor da nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs myed pa bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge li wi
87b6(mdo): la 'khod do// yang de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan dang / dpel byad/ bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchogang ka'i klung
87b7(mdo): lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shi nad tu nyung gi de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems
87b8(mdo): dpal rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang lus 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can gzil brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa khas lhag pa/ dpal bar 'gro ba'i ting pa 'dzin
88a1(mdo): la rnam par rtse la/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzugs thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas mya bzhugs pa dag tu/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba
88a2(mdo): stond pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su skyo pa/ pad ma'i stan dal 'khod pa sha stag go// pad sa ro ro rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa sdong bu rnam pa sna tshogs
88a3(mdo): pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ze ba can gser gi 'dab ma bkod pa shi n+dad tu rgyas pa'i gzugs can/ 'dzam khu chu bo'i ka ser gi snying po dang ldan pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis/ phyogs thams cad kyi
88a4(mdo): sprin snang bar byed pa/ kun nas 'od gzer bkod pa/ sa/ ngas rgyas kyi yul mtha' mas pa'i gsung 'arjod pa la 'odag/ zer/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng pa ra
88a5(mdo): tu 'gyed pas mdzes par byas shing / gdugs dang / rgyal ma tshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba sha stag go// de nas byang chubasems dpa' de dag gis 'od gzer rgya mtsho 'bum phrag bye
88a6(mdo): ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa btang nas/ pad ma de dag las babs te/ lha'i gtugs kyi sprin dang / rgya mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi sprin dang / rin
88a7(mdo): sprin dang / rol mo'i sprin dang / rgyan gyi sprin dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sprin dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdeb pa dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed la ma 'dres pa
88a8(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ byang chub sems dpal de dag la gtor cing mngon par gtor da la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nga to// gtord cing mngon par gtor da la/ mngon par
88b1(mdo): rab tu gtor de nas/ lan grangs myed par skor pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan grangs myed par bskor ba byas te/ rang rang gi bad ma'i stan la 'khod
88b2(mdo): do// byang chub sems dpal gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang tu rnamanan gyis rgya mang tan tegyi khams dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bla na myed pa yang
88b3(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sbyind par bya ba sha stag go// de nas 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams sang
88b4(mdo): rgyas kyi mthus/ bdag cag gis mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal de dag/ gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa/ thugs kyis mkhyend nas/ 
88b5(mdo): gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang tu chud pa'i / 'jig rten gyi khams stond pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer grang / sa myed pa dag dang byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
88b6(mdo): gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ budud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang bstand te/ sos
88b7(mdo): can gyi khams mtha' yas pa/ yongs su smyind par byas nas/ yang phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ lan grangs myed pa skor
88b8(mdo): ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpal de dag gi lus la phog par gyur da to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la 'od gzer des phog ma thag tu yang de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
89a1(mdo): thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang / gtsug tor dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang gali klupa lnga bcu'i bye ma
89a2(mdo): snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba phrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shi nad tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag
89a3(mdo): na/ mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig pa dag mthong ste/ dper na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
89a4(mdo): grangs myed pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pa'i rtse mor zug par rabs bskor da te/ rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo myed cing lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur nas/ 
89a5(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rtul gyis gang ba la/ 'jig rtend kyi khams gang dag tu mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig par mthong ba de dag ni/ ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab
89a6(mdo): kyi rdul gcig lta bur blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa ni// rdul phra rab kyi rdul lhag ma ji snyed yod pa tsam du blta bar bya'o// de la
89a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lo ni/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten
89a8(mdo): khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che nyi m+bu'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po tshe snang ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten
89b1(mdo): khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu ring po che dbang gi rgyal po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che re ba can las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
89b2(mdo): la la ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i zil las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya batshol la ni nor bu rin po che'i seng ge'i rdo rje rtse mo las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
89b3(mdo): ni/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin sa pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po tshe lta mas kyi 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin
89b4(mdo): po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che pad ma ra kha las grub pan no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin
89b5(mdo): po che rtswa'adang las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshol la ni lnga nor bu rin po che las grub pa yin no// 'dzin/ rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bye tu mya
89b6(mdo): las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che an da snyil las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po las grub
89b7(mdo): pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa yin/ 
89b8(mdo): no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig dkar po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi
90a1(mdo): khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig gser mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig nam mkha'i mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi
90a2(mdo): khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che ye shes
90a3(mdo): kyi tsho gas rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che pha rold tu phyind pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand
90a4(mdo): pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho grang myed pa khyad par bya stand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi
90a5(mdo): khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che gzungs rgya mtsho la grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la la ni nor bu rin po che rnam
90a6(mdo): bar tha rad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i
90a7(mdo): khyad par bstand pa brjod pa la grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa/ 
90a8(mdo): yin no// 'jig rtegi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che smon lam rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la la ni/ 
90b1(mdo): nor bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbugs 'byind pa
90b2(mdo): 'thob pa rgya mtsho gras myed pa'i khyad par bstan pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i
90b3(mdo): khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod
90b4(mdo): pa las grug pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand
90b5(mdo): pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi kha mas rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che 'jig rten gyi kha mas la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa 'i khyad par bstan
90b6(mdo): pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i khyad par bstand pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig
90b7(mdo): rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo ro re la zhing bsam gyis kyi khyab pa zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed du sna tshogs su gnas pa dag sdang je/ zhing ro lan yang / sangs
90b8(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dag snang bar 'gyur te/ zhidi thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi kha tog tu gnas pa dag snang ngo / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dang/ 
91a1(mdo): 'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems bskyed du bcug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
91a2(mdo): de dag kyang snang bar gyur da to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gyod pa na/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de
91a3(mdo): dag kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba phyi ma'i mtha' thugs pa'i bar du bstand kyang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstand par mya nus
91a4(mdo): so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la yang 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag snangapo/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i/ 
91a5(mdo): spyod pa rgya mtsho/ rnam pa sna tshogs bstand pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub
91a6(mdo): sems dpa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo // byang chub sems dpal de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstand pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub
91a7(mdo): sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang sdang ngo / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag snang
91a8(mdo): po// de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gangapa yin pa de dag kyang snang zhing thos so// de bzhin tu ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig
91b1(mdo): nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskalang pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du bstan kyang mabar da phyind par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sku dang se/ 
91b2(mdo): shes chags pa byed pa bsnyes pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zos nas/ mos par/ 
91b3(mdo): byed cing / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'don tu 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / 
91b4(mdo): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan las stsogs pas mched pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyu ru zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
91b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rto// ga pa thugs kyis mkhyend nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur/ gyur da pa las bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten
91b6(mdo): gyi khams rgya mchogang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa snyed gi 'jig rtend gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shi nad tu
91b7(mdo): nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsas pha rol tu phyind pa lnga las byung ba/ skal pa dpag tu myed grangs myed pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang / chos
91b8(mdo): kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thon dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur da pa zan chengs gcig tsam yongs su btang bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba 'i mab pa
92a1(mdo): rol tu phyind pa lnga las byung ba de zild kyis non par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo chos bcwo lnga'i nam byed kyi dus na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mthol
92a2(mdo): ba dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil kyis non da te/ lham me/ ldan ne/ lha nger 'udug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin tu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i
92a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpal 'di ltar dgel ba'i rtsa ba mthong ba dang / mtshungs pa byed pa dang / che bas byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gri khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgel ba'i rtsa ba'i pha rol/ 
92a4(mdo): tu phyind pa lnga las byung ba rnams zilid kyis gnon te/ rnamade/ lhan ne/ lha der 'dug go// 'jam dpal/ byang chub/ sems dpa' ga la la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
92a5(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams / drug pas bsnund tam/ mtshond kyis btab ste/ dog pa thams cad phrogs pa las/ 'jam dpal byang chub sa
92a6(mdo): dpal gzhan zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpal gang zhig gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ brnyas pa'i sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang go/ 
92a7(mdo): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'as/ byang chub sems dpal la gnod sems dang / zab dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni// chos
92a8(mdo): kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzind pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gtung gcod par byed pa yin no// sangs/ 
92b1(mdo): rgyas rnams ma byung na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// sum bcu cha gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dag la ba rnams dang // 
92b2(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad
92b3(mdo): kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// mye'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag
92b4(mdo): thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las byung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir ro// de bas na sangs rgyas thams
92b5(mdo): cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpal rnams la mchod pa bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa
92b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur ste/ byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ sangs rgyas
92b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la/ lha'i zhal zas lo brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha yin bza' phul te/ sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa brgya mtshog ga krung kyi bye ma snyed kyi
92b8(mdo): 'jig rteg khams kyi tshul snyed kyi ba su yul ba zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpal la dmyigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis/ byang chub sems bskyed de/ bdug
93a1(mdo): pa las dmyigs pa 'am/ mar me lus dmyigs pa 'am/ me tog las/ dmyigs pa 'am/ spos las dmyigs pa 'am/ gzhan yang gapa yang rung ba zhig las dmyigs te/ byang chub sems
93a2(mdo): bskyed na 'di ni de las ches grangs myed par bsod nams 'phel ba mi 'gyur na/ gzhan skyed kyi 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ma smos te/ 'don de bas bsod nams ches grangs myed pa skyed pa
93a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// snga ma des ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di brgya'i char yang myi phod/ stong gi char yang myi phod/ 'bum go cher yang myi phod/ bye ba'i char yang myi phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mya
93a4(mdo): bod/ bye ba stong gi char yang rgya po dang / bye ba 'bum gyi ma/ nar yang myi bod de/ dpel dang rgyur yang myi bzod do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gapal las/ sems can thams
93a5(mdo): cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems pa la gzhan zhig no stong pa nyid la mos par gyur da na/ 'don du bas ches grangs myed par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ 
93a6(mdo): gzhan mos pa bskyed du 'jug pag pa son pa dag lta mi smom te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams chos grangs myed par skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mngon par 'du' byed pa snga ma da ni/ bsod nams
93a7(mdo): mngon par 'du byed pa 'di 'i brgya'i char yang myi phod/ stong gi char yang mya phod/ 'bum gyi cham yang myi yod/ bye ba'i char yang mya phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang myi phod/ bye ba stong gi char yang myi 'od
93a8(mdo): bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mya phod// dpe' dang rgyud yang myi bzod de// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal ga pa la las/ byang chub sems dpa'i zan gcad dam/ khros te za na byang chub sems dpal
93b1(mdo): glang po tshor skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rnam sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig bcad la/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / 
93b2(mdo): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyo 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan bcad de/ zos nas lhung bzed dang / 
93b3(mdo): chom gos myed par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas na/ myi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i myi dge ba de'i brgya'i char yang myi phod pa nas/ dpe'i bar du sa pa myi bzod do// bcom ldam
93b4(mdo): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ dge la slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
93b5(mdo): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang // 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / mye dang myi ma yin pa rnams dang / phyogs tha
93b6(mdo): dad pa nas/ lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grang sa myed/ tshad myed pa rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mdo la'i rgyal po sprin chen
93b7(mdo): le lcer re laH/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang ga'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar bya ba'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' ya
93b8(mdo): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed las/ dgal ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rtend grangs myed pa dang / mthun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bar dbang byed cog/ phyogs
94a1(mdo): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' stond chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i lel+ya ste/ suM bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma
94a2(mdo): sa/ ha me gA lad+ha man Da la~M sarba na gA hr-i da yan na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad tu/ 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lel+ya klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o/ sangs rgyas dang byang
94a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na/ nor bu rin po che'i che mo can gyi khang pa batshegs pa na/ klu stong du tshang ba'i klu'i/ 
94a4(mdo): tshogs chen po klu thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing kluli 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nyo dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po yang dag skul dang / 
94a5(mdo): klu'i rgyal po glog 'phreng can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzil can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi'i can chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyapo tung dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams
94a6(mdo): bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyis rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po ldog 'bru dang / klu'i rgyal po sdang ldan gtsug phud can dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phruld dang / klu'i rgyal po sman chen rgyas par byed dang / klu
94a7(mdo): rgyal po 'jug glags dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po skar mda' gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po chus byin spogs dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang / klu'i rgyal po glog rab tu gtor da dang / rgya rgyas
94a8(mdo): klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / kwa'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal ba 'od chen lam lam dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzil brjid dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po
94b1(mdo): mdongs bu dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzind dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra dang klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par sgrog pa'i skad dang / klu'i rgyal po bal dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal 'grin dang / 
94b2(mdo): klu'i rgyal po dpal bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po zha sho'i sgra chen dang / klu'i rgyal po dang ding sma dang / klu'i rgyal po rab 'jom dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal
94b3(mdo): rlung rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po smad dkrigs bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po kra shis dang / klu'i rgyal po spani rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chis dga' byed dang / klu'i rgyal
94b4(mdo): po sprin gyis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang / klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gye ba sa dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtse dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od bzangs dang / klu'i
94b5(mdo): rgyal po mthong dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang / klu'i rgya la po sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyis legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgya la po gzhan gyis myi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sman las chu 'byin
94b6(mdo): dang / klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po spra ni 'khrug par byed dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang / gzhan la klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang / thabs
94b7(mdo): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos nam mkhal la de r-i ri sgra sgrogs shing / rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu
94b8(mdo): ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so// kye kru chen po dang / kru dag tshur sheg/ mu lu mu lu/ tsa Ta tsa Ta/ ba Ta ba Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ sA hA// glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung shing / rdzi char chen po'i rgyun tho la char pho ba shig/ 
95a1(mdo): kye kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran por gyis shi ka/ dran par gyis shig/ kye klu chen po dag tshur sheg/ tshur sheg/ 'dzam/ 
95a2(mdo): saTu'i gling du char rab tu pho ba shig/ ku hu gu Tu/ mu nu mu chu/ hi hi/ hi hi/ tsu ru tsu Ta/ ma hA na ga rdzi da ya/ sarba nA ga na/ a kadaH/ san tso da ya/ shI kran da ra sA hA/ sprin chen po rnam par 'bru
95a3(mdo): pa'i rgyan bkod pa dag gser snam gyi mtha' rin po che thams cad can gyi lda ldi mdzes pa/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rab tu 'phyang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po la sprin dag dang / lhal rin po tshe mdzes par byas pa'i gan
95a4(mdo): myed khang me tog rab tu 'phyang ba ni rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin da dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khyabs par byin gyis rlobs la rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing / lha'i ras bcos bu mang po
95a5(mdo): dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyibarlabs kyi sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / de bzhin
95a6(mdo): gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par stond pa'i rin po che bkod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kund tu khebs par
95a7(mdo): byin gyis rlobs te/ sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'o sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla mo trail bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / bya'i tshogs
95a8(mdo): thams cad skad 'byind cing / me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i smon dag dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra chen sgrogs shing // lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/ mu tig gi lnga ldi rnam
95b1(mdo): pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba/ rgya mtsho'i spri ni dag dang / gser skud kyis brgya nad pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun tu khyeb par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs
95b2(mdo): kyi 'phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis nam mkha' kun tu khyebs par byed pa la mkhas pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / snang ba dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kund tu khebs pa'i/ rgya mtsho chen po'i
95b3(mdo): sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khyebs par gyis shig/ klu'i dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad tshur sheg/ sa'i steng 'dir 'brug smra sgrogs shig/ char po bshig/ char rab tu pho za shig/ char kun tu rab tu
95b4(mdo): tu ze za shig/ de ri rir sgrogs shig/ glog chen po sdang b.rab tu phyung shig/ 'du shing kun tu 'du la/ tog yang dar di zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byind
95b5(mdo): cing / dbyangs chen po'i rab tu s+tha sgrogs pa dag/ 'dzaHbu gling du char rab tu phob shig/ kA Ta k+ka Ta/ krI Di gI Ni/ huHhu du/ ku nu ku nu/ ga Ta ga Ta/ kai Ti gi Ti/ ma Ta ma Ta/ tsaT/ 
95b6(mdo): tsa Ta/ pa Ta pa Ta// kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag tshur tshur/ ra sheg tshur sheg/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ hA hA hA hA/ hU~M dzI d+hu hU hU~M hU~M/ 'jug sgra chen po sgrogs shig/ chung chen po rab tu gtord pa dang / sangs rgyas
95b7(mdo): kyi bden pas 'dzam bu gling 'dir char po bshig swa hA// kyo kye klu dang klu'i rgyal po dag klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul gos/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char pho ba shig/ ku Nu gu Nu/ phaT phaT/ ha ha he he/ ku/ 
95b8(mdo): chen po dag 'dus shig/ sa'i steng du char rab tu zeb shig/ ku ru ku ru/ kai ro ki ri/ tsor ts+yai / mi ri mi ri/ de rI di bi/ kaM wa ka la// zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shig/ 'thu pa ni na
96a1(mdo): ljond pa dang / rtsa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig/ byams pa'i sems kyisra tshur shegs/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang
96a2(mdo): lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad kyi bden pas/ klu chen po dag tshur sheg/ tshur sheg/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par skul lo// sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ 
96a3(mdo): char rab tu phob shig/ sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi' brjid la yang dag par skul lo// chos kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gr-I pe 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par
96a4(mdo): skul lo// dge' 'dun gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i glib 'dir ma/ ra rab tu pho ba shig/ swa hA// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la 5/ dag par skul lo// lag na rdo rje'i bden pas 'jam bu grI pa'i
96a5(mdo): char rab tu phob shig/ sA ha// klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par skul lo// tshangs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i glib 'dir char ra ba tu phob shig/ sA ha/ klu'i rgyal po dpal 'grin la yang dag
96a6(mdo): par bskul lo// dbang pol bden pas 'dzam bu li gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal pos srung kau bu la yang dag par bskul lo// khyab 'dug gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bshan
96a7(mdo): sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po 'phreng ba can la yang dag par skul lo// drag po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho ba shig/ sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par skul lo// drang srong gi bden
96a8(mdo): bas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho ba shig/ sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po skrag 'bros byed la yang dag par skul lo// lha'i bden pas 'jam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ sA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi'i can
96b1(mdo): chen po la yang dag par skul lo// klu thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu'i rgyal po rab 'jom la yang dag par skul lo// gnod sbyin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char
96b2(mdo): rab tu po bshig/ swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag par bskul lo// srin po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir cha ba rab tu po ba shig/ swa sA/ klu gong ma gongs thams cad kyi bden pas char rab tu ma
96b3(mdo): shog/ char po za shig/ ma phyi bar tshur sheg sheg/ kye kye klu chen po dag klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang dag par skul lo// kun nas drang ngo / sa ra sa ra/ ha ha/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ hA hA/ hA hA/ hi hi hi hi/ e
96b4(mdo): s+yai/ tha tha tha/ tsa tse tso/ ra ta/ zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru thams cad kyi char po ba shig/ rlung chen po rab tu thong / gra/ drum drum/ gud gud/ bum bum/ Ta Ta TaT/ ni b+ha ra na/ 
96b5(mdo): stam bA ni/ mo hA ni/ dzAd gud l-i pug ka si/ pra hA Ne/ ma tang gi dza ye/ bi dz+wa ye/ hA hA/ swa hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyi gzi brjid da nga
96b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rab 'joms dang / de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa sprin chen 'byung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kund tu 'a gebs
96b7(mdo): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgyas mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par sgrogs pI'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
96b8(mdo): chen 'jig mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen srung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnga sma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sma ni chen dpal
97a1(mdo): gyi gzil brjid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyan da / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen tshub ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin
97a2(mdo): sagashegs pa sprin chen shi nad tu brtan pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sprin brtan pas dka' bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pA sprid chen nyur nyur smra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa smin
97a3(mdo): chen 'jigs pas 'jigs pa mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thog tog rab 'babs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin chen rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin chen
97a4(mdo): kra shis kyi ched dang / sangs rgyas thams cakyi byin gyi brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'o thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i snying po thams cad la A/ 
97a5(mdo): dag par skul lo// klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cadasnying po la skul lo// dkon mchog gsum gyi bkal lung gis myu rad tu gshegs shika kye kye klu dang / klu chen po dag tshur
97a6(mdo): sheg/ tshur sheg/ hu lu hu lu/ su rba su ru/ d+ha pA d+ha pA/ kA ra kA ra/ b+hu n+ya d+hu ru/ ma phyi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas tshur sheg/ chos kyi bden pas tshur sheg/ dge 'dun gyi bden pas tshur sheg/ klu rdzas
97a7(mdo): cad dang / klu chen po gong maM dag gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling du char phob shig/ a la la zhes gar byed cing / a la la zhes kU le nad cing / a la la zhes klu'i rnam par 'phel ba chen po byad cing
97a8(mdo): yu la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs shing / klu chen po rnams kyi chos kyi sgra yid su 'ong ba stond pa dag/ gu yu gu lu/ nA kI nA ge/ tsa ta tsa ta/ nA gai nI/ ha ha/ hi hi/ na kI nA kA ni/ na ge
97b1(mdo): Than ka bi lA ma d+ha ni na ma ra Ni/ yA re/ tar ni/ trA ra ta ma ta ra ta rI/ ka pi la ke / bo kr-i ta dang / Sh+Ta/ bA ya na ke/ a kad wu/ a kad d+hA/ ma pi lam pa / bidi rud dA le/ g+ho ra bu bi Ni/ ka ye/ 
97b2(mdo): a ka la ga dzi te/ sarba pe ka bi ku thA ni/ san nA da ne/ sa rbak+Shed tran a bu ra ni/ tsaka kr-i tsag kra ba tI/ hi ri hi di/ dwe gi bI ge/ s+pha ra sma ra/ ka la ka li/ ma ha ka si/ ma hri da yam pra pi sha/ ad k+She/ mad rbe/ 
97b3(mdo): sarba na ga A rA ni/ pu ra ya pu re/ N+yai hUM/ rad na tra ya bi ku bi tA/ bad dzi ni pad dze/ pad dza pa Ne/ ka la shwo da ne/ da ga ru pa ni su ru pe/ b+ho gi b+ho ga ma hA b+ho gi/ b+ho ga ru pa ta sA pa le/ ba k+Sha Ni ka sa rba
97b4(mdo): na ka sa na tsha da ni swa ha/ chos smra bas thog ma kho ner srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ chos gos gyi gA ra lan bdun bdun bzlas brjo dad byas te/ mdud bor nas/ rlung kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thaM
97b5(mdo): cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyun ma chad par klag par bya'o// shar phyogs su ni ba lang gi lci ba sa/ klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor gsum/ 
97b6(mdo): pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor dang bcas te/ bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po sdang lnga nad gtsug
97b7(mdo): bud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po sprini skul zhes bya ba mgo mgu ba 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// bla re dang gos sngon po dang / rgyal mtshar sngon po dang / 
97b8(mdo): lba bshos thams cad kyang sngon par bya'o// klu rnams la dbab pa na medang gsum gyis bya'o// dang gsum gyi bkang lugs bdun yang klu'i snying pos sbyin sregs bya'o// smin kyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris
98a1(mdo): char gyi rgyun 'bebs la/ phan tshun zug cig mthar da klog 'gyu bar bya'o// 'dir dbab pa ni 'khu ba bkra shis ldan dang / ben tse dang / sha dang / nya sha dang / sbrang rtsi lngas byas pa'i zas/ 
98a2(mdo): mchog tu rgyas par bya'o// de nas chos smra ba gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po klog par bya'o// de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nas brtsas
98a3(mdo): te/ dir ri ri sgra sgrogs par byed cing / sma yid tu 'ong ba dag 'byind par 'gyur te/ leny+tsa 'di la the tsom dang / brnyas par myi bya'o// gal te rgya mtsho tus tshod las yolan/ 'dir yang char las yol hA
98a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po bzegs pa'i rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
98a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
98a6(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs gra thos pa dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas 'brug bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
98a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
98a8(mdo): sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sa pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin rnam par rgyas mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
98b1(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi yan lag mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spra
98b2(mdo): lta bu'i na bza' mnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bru skrand la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
98b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'phreng ba can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
98b4(mdo): sangs rgyas sprin mthor la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs de pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 
98b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya/ ba dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas sprin 'dzind la phyaga'atshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
98b6(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kyis
98b7(mdo): byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug sgra rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
98b8(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas span
99a1(mdo): skud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la
99a2(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad bde legs su gyurd cig/ 'byung po thams cad la byams par gyur da cig/ dud 'gror gyurd pa thams cad la 'jigs pa myed par gyur da cig/ ngan 'gro/ 
99a3(mdo): sa thams cad zhi bar gyur da cig/ sgrim pa thams cad nam par sel pa la phyag 'a la lo// de bzhid gaganas pa thams / ngas rgyas lams cad kyis ga gas pa 'di
99a4(mdo): gyurd cig// tad d+ya thA/ sU ta sU ta/ sU Ta s+phu Ta sU Ta/ s+phuT s+phu Ta swA hA/ Nar myi 'bab pa'i tshe/ dge' slong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma ga
99a5(mdo): lal zhig mgo bkrus te/ kos gtsang ma bsgos la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas/ gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/ ga
99a6(mdo): thor 'dun gyis nam mkha' la gyen tu bcug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams la lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la/ mdzad pa lda po byas te/ zhag bdun gyi bam rgya rgyun ma chad pa byas pa/ 
99a7(mdo): char pa bab par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lelu klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdol// rdzogs so
99a8(mdo): rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'di ring na myi tra dang / su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban da ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la lab pa// nA mo/ 5// rgya kar skad tu/ 
99b1(mdo): rgya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du / 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu
99b2(mdo): rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i gnas na nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po spyan kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la kha pa brtsegs pa na/ dge' slong gi dge la 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
99b3(mdo): 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gza' can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 
99b4(mdo): nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi yu dang / bon dza dang / dpal gyi gzi rji dang / dpal bzangs dang / glog gi 'phreng ba dang / gtsug na nor bu chen po dang / gtsug na nor bu
99b5(mdo): thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug pud can dang / gtsug pud 'jacan dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po 'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / dkra shis
99b6(mdo): ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shind
99b7(mdo): tu brta nad dang / 'gul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / char rgyu nad dang / rab 'jom dang / rnam par 'job dang / mabul sbyangs dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs za ba dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgron
99b8(mdo): dang / rnam par sgra 'byi nad dang / da pa la dang / ma la chen dang / gshol mdal 'dzind dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po oM la'i 'dab la dang / kund tu sA
100a1(mdo): rna chub dang / rung dang / dar da ra dang / klu'i rgyal po ud pa dang dar dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma myed dang /
