100a2(mdo): 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye nad pa'i 'dam bu dang / hung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen rnga dang / rnon po
100a3(mdo): dang / ser skye dang / klog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs khwa dang / chu stozas dang / klu'i rgyal po pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bye du r+ya'i 'od can dang / 
100a4(mdo): sa khasas pa'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / gnyi 'od dang / pa dang / bzang 'go / klu'i rgyal po dka po dang / dang / nan rje dang / dge' tshul dang / sprul ba dang / 
100a5(mdo): dang pa'i gzil brjid dang / su khyud 'dzid dang / sa 'dzin dang mgo sung can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal don yod mthong dang / sprin can dang / sde bzangs dang / 
100a6(mdo): sa skyong dang / byis byin dang / rnam par 'dul dang / rgab 'byung dang / rgya srin guma'i ra dang / rgya srin kum kho mo'i mdangos dang / drug 'dzind dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gtsug dang / pad
100a7(mdo): ka dang / 'dug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jig byed dang / gzil brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jug rings dang / 
100a8(mdo): mgo pa che dang / bim pi ka dang / bi Ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu ste dang / gzi' chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dag
100b1(mdo): mgo bdun pa dang / stong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri myed gzi brjid dang / myig bzangs dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phrol phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum chen dang / khro bo
100b2(mdo): trag shul can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen dang / dbar po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtshol smin dang / me tog tri chen dang / ku mu ta'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal
100b3(mdo): po rin chen myig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu' can dang / mtshan mo 'dzind dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu
100b4(mdo): 'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po/ dang / khro myed dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpal dang / chu 'jind dang / sprin gdugs dang / ing ga ra'i gdong dang / gzi
100b5(mdo): brjid can dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom bstabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus rtse na dang / spyang lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser ngan
100b6(mdo): can dang / mchog tu btson dang / drug drag dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud ci snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'khrugs sma dang / rnga sma dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyu nad dang / 
100b7(mdo): dga' byed dang / 'jug sgrogs dang / dpal sde dang / srid byed kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la btsogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya bcu
100b8(mdo): rtsa bzhi dag 'dus ste/ 'khod pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ stand las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar da te/ pus mo g.yas pa
101a1(mdo): lgapas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / pu dud chen po byed pas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba
101a2(mdo): sadang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dang gyi lnga ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i
101a3(mdo): me tog dang / rin po che'i ldi ldi dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gai tra ba mchog tu mdzes lan pa sna tshogs dpag tu byed grangs myed pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ bskor ba
101a4(mdo): byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'a ga nas/ smon lam rnams btab pa// lus rgya mtsho 'jog na gi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rtul snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas
101a5(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpal 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho/ thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsha rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang
101a6(mdo): rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snad g+ha/ thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las/ rdul phra rab kyi rtul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad
101a7(mdo): las yang dag par 'das pa grangs byed/ dpag tu myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya
101a8(mdo): mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyu nad tu mngon par phyogs pa/ dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul cha re la las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs
101b1(mdo): kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kund tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa/ 
101b2(mdo): dpag tu myed grangs myed pasam gyis myi khyab gzhal du myed tshad myed brjod du myed pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu 'khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho
101b3(mdo): sprani rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams
101b4(mdo): cad kyi 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprini rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i khang la brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shang ljon pa thams cad kyi
101b5(mdo): mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / gdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu stond pa rgya mtsho spa ni rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 
101b6(mdo): spos thams cad kyi shing ljond pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kund tu khyebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de las stsogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu myed grangs myed
101b7(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab/ gzhal tu myed/ tshad myed nga / brjod du myed pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor
101b8(mdo): bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khyebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs
102a1(mdo): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun tu snang ba'i rin po che char 'bab pa bkod pa'i
102a2(mdo): nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho spra ni rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro mkha' po dang na ldan la sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / kun tu
102a3(mdo): smras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams
102a4(mdo): dang / mtshar gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pathams cad snang ba kund tu stond pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phrol ba smon ma sangs rgyas kyi
102a5(mdo): thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtshosprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis myi khyab rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal myed khab snang ba kun
102a6(mdo): tu stond pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / napo che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba'i rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya ma/ 
102a7(mdo): sman rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khyabs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la ste steng du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// 
102a8(mdo): rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa mazegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog pa thalasas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan da pa'i 'ang/ 
102b1(mdo): pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho smon rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya
102b2(mdo): ro sun+do sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi rje ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha' 'i dkyil
102b3(mdo): ku nad tu khebasu par byin gyis brlabs nas / phyogs bcu kun da tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / rin po che thams cad
102b4(mdo): kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyand pa bkod pa tu ma kun tu stond pa 'i khang po batshegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams da cad kyis rab tu brgya nad par kund tu/ rgyas par 'gengs pa'i
102b5(mdo): khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu rme tog gi rta babs dril bu'i rdzab sbyangs pa'i rgya mtsho rnams rgyasanam mkha'i dkyil kund tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te// 
102b6(mdo): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi cong cong dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che'i
102b7(mdo): mgul gdub kyi snying portson gyi seng gel-i khri rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / mchog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi skyeb po can gyi seng ge'i khwa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mdad snyil dang / 'dzam bu chu mon ser gi pa
102b8(mdo): sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge la'i rgya mtsho sri nr-i rnams dong/ nor bu rin the tsho / sgron ma'i pad ma'i snying po can kyi seng ke'i ze rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che sna gas la
103a1(mdo): rgyal mtshan gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po chen gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnaMs dang rin po ches rgya nad pa pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / man da snyil
103a2(mdo): sangasamadzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ldan gyi pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad myi shes pa'i gzil brjid dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya
103a3(mdo): mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog/ daM las cad byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho
103a4(mdo): sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sma'i 'od zer na dang ldan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ nam mkho'i dkyil kund tu khebs par
103a5(mdo): byin gyis rlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs zhes
103a6(mdo): cad kyi shing ljond pa rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / shing ljond pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa// bkod pa
103a7(mdo): kund tu stond pa'i shing ljond pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljond pa lta bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i na
103a8(mdo): ljond pa rgya mtsho smand rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljond pa rgya mtsho la sprind rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun
103b1(mdo): tu ston pa'i shing ljond pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljond pa lha'i rin po ni gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang / 
103b2(mdo): ldan pa'i shing ljond pa rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'od pa'i dbyangs kund tu gtong pa'i shing ljond pa rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / rin po che khadog mtha' yas pa'i pad ma'i snying po
103b3(mdo): can gyi seng ge'i khwa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kund tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgya nad pa
103b4(mdo): snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phrol ba'i sgron ma li 'phreng ba'i snying po can kyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas smra rin po che'i shang
103b5(mdo): sngond pa 'byung po'o snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho smra/ rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang / pad ma thams cad kyi 'gre nga ba rnams dang / rin po che'i snying po con gyi seng ge'i khwa rgya mtsho'i sprin
103b6(mdo): rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kund tu stond pa'i nor bu rin pa mo'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge la khri rgya mtsho spron rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa'i rta babs
103b7(mdo): stebs bus rab tu brgyand pa/ rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge li zla rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can seng ge 'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rjes
103b8(mdo): byas/ nam mkhala'i dkyis kun tu khyems par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal rgya ma mo thams cad la ste steng du bya'o// tha mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par byan yod bzhin gyi nong bu'i rgyas
104a1(mdo): po thams cad kyi gzhal myed khang rgya mtsho sprin dang / an da snyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprini rnams dang / rin po
104a2(mdo): che 'od 'phro ba'i smon ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sngon rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston pa'i sdang pa'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod
104a3(mdo): pa thams cad snang ba kun tu stond pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po me'i zla le rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sbas kund tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tra ba'i
104a4(mdo): zla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad ma 'bar ba kha tog mtha' yas/ pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad ma'i dra ba'i bla ye \u0f7f/ mcho sman rnams dang / gser gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i
104a5(mdo): rgya mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis sbyi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyun daN+Dizla re rgya mtsho sprini rnaMs kyis// nam mkha'i dkyil kund tu khyebs par
104a6(mdo): byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho thams
104a7(mdo): cad kyi gcugs rgya mtsho sprini rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kund tu khyabs par byin gyis rlabs la/ rin po me bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gtugs rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / mu tig kha tog ma thalams pa'i mtsho
104a8(mdo): kyi gdugs rgya mamo smin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i brgol sna'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gtugs rgya mtshol sprin rnams dang / rin po mo sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba'i gtugs rgya
104b1(mdo): mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i gdul ku nad tu snad pas rab tu brgya nad pa'i trail bu'i tra ba sbyangs pa'i gtugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong po'i yal ga'i rgyan gi gtugs rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / 
104b2(mdo): nyi ma rnam par snang par byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gtugs rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kund tu rgyas pa 'gengs pa'i gtugs rgya mtsho spra ni rnams
104b3(mdo): dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya mtsho chen po snang bar byed pa kund tu bkod pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprini ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la
104b4(mdo): stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin dpo che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho snga ni rnams dang / na po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 9
104b5(mdo): rgya mtsho smani ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / rin po che tham/ sa cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil la/ 
104b6(mdo): dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs po rin po che'i yal gali 'od kyi
104b7(mdo): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai dUr+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer kye 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can rgya
104b8(mdo): gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kund tu ston pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba/ yid tu 'od pa'i sgra rab tu 'byind pa dang ldan
105a1(mdo): po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs
105a2(mdo): sa/ rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la ste stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho smani rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ 
105a3(mdo): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / rod pa/ reg bya'i 'od gzer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprini rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrog pa rgyas par 'gengs
105a4(mdo): pa'i 'od gzer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bko dad pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od gzer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dpa me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gzer rgya
105a5(mdo): mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi tshul gyi 'od gzer rgya ma cho sma ni rnaMs dang bskald pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du/ sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa
105a6(mdo): sgrogs pa can gyi 'od gzer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po me myi bzod pa thams cad bstand pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi che ba'i 'od gzer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu stond pa/ 'od
105a7(mdo): rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpal rgya mtsho thams cad la ste stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che'i 'od 'phro la kha dog mthal yas pa/ rgya mtsho sman
105a8(mdo): ma 'dres rnams dang / kund tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho spri rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sman rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi'o// 
105b1(mdo): 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprini rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul po'i 'od 'phro ba'i rgya mtsho spyan rnams dang // na la da ngon yon rdza su rgyal cang / ma rje ldan brgya
105b2(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams mthal mas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po la 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho spyan rnams dang / mu tig gi smon ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs
105b3(mdo): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i smon gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis
105b4(mdo): kye khyab pa nas dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad ma'i drwa brgya mtsho smani rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od/ kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi
105b5(mdo): kha tog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / raM na po che dang spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprani rna mas dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi gtugs rgya mtsho sman
105b6(mdo): rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing stug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha'
105b7(mdo): yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'o sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang bya
105b8(mdo): 'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas klu'i rgyal po de dag kas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / 
106a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan da la 'khod do// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi klu'i bdag po chen po phyir myi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can gasgo/ 
106a2(mdo): mtha' yas rgya mtsho sman bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
106a3(mdo): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so// de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i ga Di brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stand las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
106a4(mdo): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcu gas te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la bu der logs su thal mo/ desbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
106a5(mdo): gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyog/ 
106a6(mdo): 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kluli bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho smon bkod pa'i gzi'i brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka'
106a7(mdo): su lad to// klu'i bdag po ci dang rtsi 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngaso dris pa de dang de'i lupa bstand pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klul bdag po g.yog
106a8(mdo): mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa li gzo brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyu nang chad pa
106b1(mdo): 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur// rtsa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang / nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bA
106b2(mdo): 'gyur// 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i grong gi myi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
106b3(mdo): 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i smon bkod pa'i gzo' brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams
106b4(mdo): cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa legs so/ legs so// klu li bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon
106b5(mdo): la yid la zung shig dang / rangs khyod la bshad do/ klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na/ klu thams cad kyi klu'i swA/ ga bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan
106b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o// klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas po'i lha da myi rnams ni/ mes mya tshig/ mtshon gyis myi tshugs/ chus myi
106b7(mdo): khyer/ dug gis myi tshugs/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis myi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur
106b8(mdo): bsod nams chen po'i gzil brjid kyis gza'i can tu 'gyur/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs myed par
107a1(mdo): 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / myi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig po'i 'og tu tshangs po'i 'jig rten du skye bar
107a2(mdo): 'gyur te// klu'i bdag po lha dang myi'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go// klu'i bdag po de bas na/ byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yi
107a3(mdo): kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ 
107a4(mdo): bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/ des 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus chus du char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / me tog thams cad
107a5(mdo): skyed par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la med pa thams cad ts+tsha/ na ba zhes bya ba 'i gzungs de gang zhen// tad ma thANid+hA ra Ni/ mud da ra Ni/ sam pra tiSh+Tha ta/ yi mas par
107a6(mdo): sa t+ya pra tid ny+dza sA ra hA/ gan+danA pa ti/ ud pA da ni/ bau ne ma ni/ ma b+hi She tsa ni/ a b+hi s+yAt+ta pa/ ub+ta ba ti/ a dzim tu/ sa hi kum pA la ni/ baha swa ra k+She&na?/ d+hun pA pam/ kodA
107a7(mdo): ma rgan/ ni ri ga ka d+ha maH shud d+hi me ga kha ti mir mdzes/ rgya khamam na sa ma bud rnam pa lo kas oM d+hi Sha~M \u0f7f/ zad nyang ldan k+She swA hA/ 'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig gi don thams cad sgrub pa byas
107a8(mdo): pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la yid pa thams cad tshum pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o// klu'i bdag 'og zhan ya / sngon gyi rigs la
107b1(mdo): 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa/ gzi' brjod kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khom dpal dang ldan pa gser gi 'od gzer rnam par phra
107b2(mdo): par byed pa/ sgra'i rtse mo'acha shas gcig las byung ba'i dus dang / rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan bzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs
107b3(mdo): thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i tshe rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'thung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klul bu mo thams
107b4(mdo): cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams// cad kyi rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cadasgrub par byed do/ klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs
107b5(mdo): pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
107b6(mdo): gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzind la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
107b7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzil brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung
107b8(mdo): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i smon la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag tu myed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
108a1(mdo): gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'phar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu' rtsal l+ya phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
108a2(mdo): sade bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin stug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
108a3(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
108a4(mdo): pa sprin chen gtugs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprini chen pos khyebs
108a5(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las 'byung ba sdang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur mahA/ pa 'gebs kyi dza'ili sma dbyangs sha nid tu rab sgrog la phyag 'tshal
108a6(mdo): lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung myi dga' rab 'jom sgra zab sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen brdal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
108a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshal gis sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug
108a8(mdo): sla bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA ni kun tu sto dad la phyag 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de ba
108b1(mdo): gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tsha/ 
108b2(mdo): lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' bsnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
108b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ga gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin kyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dra bar mdzad
108b4(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa na rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de ban na gshegs pa sprin sud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
108b5(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'a/ la lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
108b6(mdo): gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// brtsa ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin
108b7(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal
108b8(mdo): lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chu ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tus ma yin pa'i sprin
109a1(mdo): dang / lce 'bab pa rnam par 'jom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
109a2(mdo): sa/ 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byind la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyes
109a3(mdo): po'i gzil brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro bA dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor spran
109a4(mdo): chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo// bco/ ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char myi 'bab pa na sprin gyis
109a5(mdo): kun tu 'khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
109a6(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par bsgrub pa 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi gzil brjid 'od 'dzag pa sprin gyi 'od gzer can la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
109a7(mdo): mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtsa dang shing gel pa
109a8(mdo): dang / sman dang nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi steng chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtshol sprin bkod pa lig pa'i 'arjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs/ 
109b1(mdo): lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char myi 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang dag brjod na char gi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / myi bzad pa'i
109b2(mdo): dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma
109b3(mdo): rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe sems kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
109b4(mdo): rlabs kyis byani gyis brlab tu gsol// gang dag klu thams cad la skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / budud thams cad rnam par 'jom par
109b5(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad zlog par/ 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bgyid pa
109b6(mdo): dang / rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyurab dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char ba'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad seld par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam
109b7(mdo): bu'i gling 'dir cha rad pa'i rgyund legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang gasngags gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa
109b8(mdo): zugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po
110a1(mdo): g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phar
110a2(mdo): ba dang bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsol ba 'debs pa legs so// legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba/ 'brug
110a3(mdo): chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa byin kyis brlabs pa/ rjes su
110a4(mdo): rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char myed pa'i char 'bab pa byed/ char ches na gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad bskul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ 
110a5(mdo): bdud thams cad rnam par 'jom par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do// tad / ma hA ka nyal na a ba g+ha sa ni/ shri te dzo lag smi tri Ti bi gra

110b1(mdo): rtsum du / shan ta ma te/ shan ta pa khe/ tsa tsa pa/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ri/ tsan cu ru/ pa las bud d+ha/ dra sa te/ sa ta pyad nya pa bgyi te sa hA// / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par ska mdzad ye shes

110b7(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheka/ sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon

111a1(mdo): stond pa'i bstan pa rdzun par gyis shig/ aT karba/ oM Ti shri kyi/ ku rtsa us/ drag yul can khro ba'i shugs chen po dang ldan pa cug chen po'i lce 'byind pa rnams byams

111a7(mdo): mi mi/ ku mu su mu/ sa3// klu thams cad dgug zho/ byams pa'i sems kyis byang chum gyi sems sngon tu 'gro bas/ na ra na pa/ na min li/ tsu tsu n+ya n+ya swA hA// yan pa lnga tshogs su gyur da pa/

111b7(mdo): rtsu bo bzhig swA hA/ klu chen po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'jam bu'i gling car rab tu po bshig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi medan pas 'dzas bu'i shrIg char rab tu yo bshig hA/

112a1(mdo): char rab tu phob shig/ swa hA/ klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byin gyi brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i grib 'dir char rab tu pho bshig swa hA lha thams cad kyi gyaden

112a3(mdo): cig/ swa hA/ dr-i za thams cad kyi bden pas myi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang gnod pa thams cad sol cig swa hA/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi badren pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog shig/

113b8(mdo): rA ke nage/ ma hA na ke/ go ra ya na se/ na ka rdzi da ya/ d+hu ma ku ye/ u gra she/ pra tsan da te dze/ ba~M She ge/ a khi bo gi/ a hai g+ho ra kr-iSh+To beng ga ye/ tsan tsa 9/ so la dzi hwe ma hA gaN ka re/ 
114a1(mdo): ka la bzhi mo lharna ma sa ni/ rtsa rum be swA NA gaN/ shau khai ni ka na/ kar ka na/ ma hA g+ha na ka re/ gar ba ra/ bi ri bi li/ Tu lu Tu rtsa/ ba~M s+phu lu dza na bu ma g+hu mu ma ha b+he ho// ma Ni d+ha re/

114a3(mdo): 1/ d+hu d+hu ma be/ g+ha na g+ha na/ shi khi ni/ ka na ka na/ ka na g+ha Na/ ma hA na ka ga ne/ na te myA pa/ dza rad ka ri me ha na/ ga NI da yaM/ g+hu ma gU ma/ g+hu ma pa Astai ka/ dza da gA yi Tu dzang ga me

114a7(mdo): par 'dod na/ tha gab myed payis phyogs gtsang mar zla re sngon po bras/ ba dan sngon po spyang po/ chos smra ba lus bkrus la yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar ka nas she bkos gtsang ma sngon po bgos la/ spos
114a8(mdo): dri zhim thos bsdus nas las dkar gsum zos la/ stan sngon po la steng du bcug nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol la btab nas/ sprin chen po'i dkyil 2
114b1(mdo): kyi le 'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun gyi 'chad par klag par bya'o// chu sngon pos bkapa po'i bum pa kangs pa ni ba dag par bya'o// rol dang bdug pa dang me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro// de la chos smrabs
114b2(mdo): phyogs bzhir ba'i lji ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su mu gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/ klu g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang / bcas pa'i lci bas bri bar bya'o/ lho phyog
114b3(mdo): su u lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa/ klu g.yog 'khor sna tshog/ 
114b4(mdo): dang bcas pabri bar bya'o// byab phyogs su zhu dku tsam duklu la rgyal po mgo dgu pa/ ku g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// chos smra bas rang gi lus bsrus
114b5(mdo): la/ byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la ste/ brje'i sems nye bar bzhags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub/ sems dpal thams cad la gsol ba btab la/ klu rnams
114b6(mdo): dang / dge ba'i ma pa bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni cho ga'o// gang zhig char myi 'bab pa'i tshe/ sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyin zhag cig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun
114b7(mdo): tshad gdon myi za bar char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho ni dus las yol kyang srid kyi thub pa chen po gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang yon tan la gnas/ 
114b8(mdo): te/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang sha dang / nya las phyogs pa yongs su spang par bya'o// 'o zug dang / nod pa 'o ma dang 'bras can bu ram ran las sogs pa dang / dang ra gsum bzal zhing klag par bya'o// 
115a1(mdo): de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te/ thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa bzhin du the tsom myed par bya'o// 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po la mdo' las char dbab pa rlung gya dkyil 'khor
115a2(mdo): kyi lelu zhes bya ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo che ba pa na d+he ye shes
115a3(mdo): sdes sgyurd cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya kar skad du/ pu r+Na me/ ka ma~M d+ha ra ni// bod skad du/ mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba
115a4(mdo): 'igazungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te badz+ra sa ra pra ma ra De ne ta thA ga tA yA/ a ra hA te/ sam myag sam b+hud d+ha ya/ 
115a5(mdo): tad ya tha/ au badz+re badz+re/ ma ha badz+re/ ma hA te dza badz+re/ ma hA b+hIr+ya badz+re/ ma ha bo d+hi tsi di ta badz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi man do pa sa kra ma na badz+reH/ sarba karma a ba ra ni bi sho da na batre swa hA/ 
115a6(mdo): gzungs sngags 'odi'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig tsam tran pa'i modo la phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i bye ma'i dz+wal phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur
115a7(mdo): zhing / zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / na bza' dang / spyan gzigs dang / bshos la stsogs pa dang / gtugs dang / 
115a8(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / rgyan dang / lta ba lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs
115b1(mdo): ma pa dpa lams sang drag par dathugs byin pa 'gyur ro// zhwa dang / k+Shadang / gnod srud dang/ dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal ba nga/ 
115b2(mdo): ci dang / lto 'byo chen po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje la phyogs pa gsang ba'i bdag po dang 'chas pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams phye bzhin rtsa yang dag par srung zhing / rlung
115b3(mdo): pa dang / med pas kyad de/ 'di nas ni 'thom rnas pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'dis can du skye lar 'gyur te/ yon tan kyi khyad pa 'di dag mis bsgribs pa ma lan cig dra bcas kyim thab par 'gyur / 
115b4(mdo): mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar skad du/ a byas rgya a pa a pra/ mA na sa d+har ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa thams cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyin/ 
115b5(mdo): pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos po'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ka da na/ 
115b6(mdo): yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal tu gshegs te/ byon nas/ ma ma'i chal yum papag po de'i dbang po'i khrag phug na bzhugs so/ de nas lba'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ka la bde
115b7(mdo): seng ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad/ 
115b8(mdo): ces gsold te/ bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni rab tu gnod pa 'gyed pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni bdag la yun ring por phyir dgol ba la dgra lags na/ de las bcom ldan
116a1(mdo): 'das kyis bdag la chos bstand du gsol da/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byind la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// lha'i dbang po khyod kyi
116a2(mdo): thams cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rigs sngags don thams cad byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'ji lad pa/ mtshon
116a3(mdo): cha thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang rtsed dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa thams cad rengs par byed pa/ dgra thams cad phud par byed pa/ lha dang / nam mkhal lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang
116a4(mdo): sha ba dang / brjed byed dang / masto' byed dang / bram ze ma/ srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / byal gdon dang / sprul po dang / nam gru dang / gnod po'ogadon dang / gnod
116a5(mdo): po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i kadon dang / klu'i ka/ don dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang dr-i za'i gdon dang / mya na mchi'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon
116a6(mdo): par byed pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su 'breng la za ba dang / zas su spos la ba dang / zas su me tog la ba dang / zas su 'dug pa la ba dang / zas su khrag zung pa dang / zas su dag 'thung
116a7(mdo): dang / zas su myi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su ga ce na 'thung ba rab tu phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyurd pa dang / mkhris pa las gyurd pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus
116a8(mdo): pa las gyur da pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul spyod pa rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'chang 'brub thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'di zung shig/ thams cad la mya 'ja/ 
116b1(mdo): pa sbyin pa'i rigs sngags bshad par bya'o// tad yA thA/ A de/ ma de/ pra me te/ pra me di ri/ ko lo po/ le bos se/ mod tre pad Te/ kha rad de/ kha ra ni/ ga na ga Ne/ ka na pra ga Ne/ ma naH
116b2(mdo): Ta ma ne/ ka lI pra ka li/ tsan de/ ma ha tsan de/ pad tsi tsan de/ be ke/ ma te ba ke te/ son/ ko na mo ha/ pra mo ha/ pra mo Ta/ na sha ni/ prA na sha ni/ d+ha pa ri/ za dA pa ni/ bal ka ni/ pra ba
116b3(mdo): ga ni/ nrid t+yA ni/ pa n+yid t+ya ni/ kro d+ha ni/ pra ti kro d+ha ni/ ha na ha na/ bi he na bi ha na/ sarba tuSh+ka pra tuSh+Ta na na sha yA/ sarba A pA sA pra de/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa/ 'jigs pa thams
116b4(mdo): cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig/ gnas 'dir dag gi don thams cad grub par gyur da cig/ de lta
116b5(mdo): bas na/ dai khI di khri/ tsum le/ swarbA swa ta hi ti he te/ na ma swarba yUd b+han na sA hA// lha'i dbang po thams cad lamye 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rigs sngags tshig bzhi bany+tsaH
116b6(mdo): gcig po 'di skud pa la mud+had de bcings sam/ skal me da pa khor ram/ bzlas brjod byas sam/ yungs kar dang / 'go ltu na la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ bskus sam/ cho ga
116b7(mdo): la bsngags na/ mtshon gyis kyi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin te/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur ro/ rigs sngag dpags pag sngags sbyor ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyong
116b8(mdo): ba rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed do// sbyar te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis myi tshugs par byed do// pha rold kyis bcings pa las grol bar byed do// gzhan gyi rigs sngags/ 
117a1(mdo): gcod par byed do// bdag gi rigs sngags 'phel bar byed do// gdon thams cad phung par byed do// gdon gang kyi gtong na de'i mgo bo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du/ tshal pa bdun tu 'gas so// 
117a2(mdo): sade nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mdo/ 
117a3(mdo): par bstod do// / 2phags pa thams cad la mya 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya kar skad tu/ argya ma yin cin na ma d+ha ra ni/ 
117a4(mdo): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzung / sa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bya/ ka 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na
117a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'gon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dka' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyad stong ka de ge' spong gi dge la 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
117a6(mdo): grangs myed pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la/ lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha mi'i bu la bka' stsal dpa/ sha ri li bu khyod kyis 'di
117a7(mdo): sta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i me dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gyod pa dang / bden pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpal yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di dag snyoms she/ 
117a8(mdo): stond cig/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ril bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na myi gnas/ phyogs sa
117b1(mdo): gyi gnas/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs shes bgyi ba 'di'i chog gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces gsul to// 
117b2(mdo): sha ri'i bu legs so// legs so/ sha ri'i bu khyed 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par rtson pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par byed pa dang / khyod
117b3(mdo): gzungs yul na myi gnas phyogs na mya gnas par stand pa yang legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu gzungs ni chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te// 
117b4(mdo): sha ri'i bu gzungs ni 'das pa zhes myi 'chad/ ma 'ongs pa zhes myi 'chad/ da ltar byung ba zhes myi 'chad/ dngos po ra myi 'chad/ dngos po myed par myi 'chad/ mtshan ma dang
117b5(mdo): mtshan ma myed par myi 'chad/ chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram/ 2gag po'i phyir myi 'chad mod kyi/ sha ri'i bu 'on kyang byang/ chub sems dpa'al la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir stond te/ 
117b6(mdo): gang 'di gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni/ gzugaso myed pa bya ba'i lan tu gyur da pa/ rig pa stobs kyis gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba bsgrubs pa
117b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
117b8(mdo): ldan 'das gzungs gang la gnas shing / gzungs de thob na byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bcas pa bzang ba dang / chos la
118a1(mdo): myi gnas pa dang / bdag the tsom ma mchis pa dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang / rang gis lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du
118a2(mdo): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ sha ri'i bu legs so legs so// sha ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do// sha ri'i bu gang la la
118a3(mdo): zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la sti stang byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod par byed na/ des sangs rgyas thams cad la sti steng byas par 'gyur ro// gang dag gis
118a4(mdo): gzungs 'di thob pa dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i
118a5(mdo): bu gzungs ni 'di yin te// san d+ha ri ni/ mu da tra ra na/ ma pra ta shwe tA/ su ta ma?/ su pra ti shwA ta/ bi rtsas ba la/ a b+ta pra ti dang nya/ a ro ha ta nya na ba ti/ ud pa ta ni
118a6(mdo): bini mA ni/ a kI/ Sha tsa ni/ a g+ni d+ya da ra/ shub+hA ba ti/ a ni ni tre/ a ba hu kum pa/ ma b+hi26// ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur bar bya ba'i gzungs kyi bying rnams te/ 'das pa rnams dang / 
118a7(mdo): ma 'ongs pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang / legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs pa bzung ste/ 'chang ba dang / myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
118a8(mdo): ba'i phyir bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/ de la mtshon gyis kyi tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags myi srun pa rnams kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 
118b1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sha ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo// sha ri'i 'u rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ 
118b2(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'agrengs myed pa bcu mthar chags su gang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ na bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs myed par gzung ba byas pas/ rigs
118b3(mdo): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las za na/ tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu da'ang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yum
118b4(mdo): yin pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa/ dad nas/ dge' slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dalha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
118b5(mdo): rten yi rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa ra bstod do// / 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / 
118b6(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ a byas pan ta g+ha d+ha d+ha na ma da ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
118b7(mdo): bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po 'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po la rol dge' spong brgya stong gi dge la 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / 
118b8(mdo): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gnas chang mo'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag tu mas yongs su bskord cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos stond to// de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
119a1(mdo): dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan
119a2(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par stond par 'tshal te/ gzungs de
119a3(mdo): zos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnams phyir myi ldog cing / myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang se la te/ 
119a4(mdo): longs pyod chen po phun sum 'tshogs pa yang yongs su 'jind to// lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo// ngag rnam par dag da pa dag pa yang 'thob po// sems rnam par dag pa yang thob par/ 
119a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par bgyid
119a6(mdo): do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thob ma thag tu mya skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da to// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyang thob po// rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyang thob bo// 2dra
119a7(mdo): ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyang thob bo// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting pe 'dzi nad kyang thob bo// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting pe 'ja da kyang zol bo// bya bzad pa'i tha ma tog gting nge 'dzin kyang thob// sgyu ma lta bu'i
119a8(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyang thob po/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting pa 'dzind kyang thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de las btogs pa'i ting nge 'jani dbye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag
119b1(mdo): la mngon gsum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan rtogs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dpa ldan
119b2(mdo): zhing / mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / bsnyen bskur bgyis pa don mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
119b3(mdo): gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yongs su dgod du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas
119b4(mdo): 'khor bzhi byin gyis brlabs zin no// de nas byang chub pa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyis skad cig zang cag yud tsam de nyid la/ rdo rje
119b5(mdo): 'dakyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gzungs 'don smras so// dkon mchog gsum la phyaga'/ tshal lo// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po thu
119b6(mdo): rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad yA thA/ kha ga me/ kha ka me/ tse k+ku kha be/ shro kha be/ g+ha na kha be/ ka ya kha bye/ dzi ha kha be/ ma na kha be/ ra
119b7(mdo): kha be/ sa ra khe ba/ sa ra Sha be/ shu lu na t+ya kha bi/ a nA med tA kha be/ a pra di ha ta kha She/ sa ma d+he kha bi/ ba ra mya ta kha be/ b+ho d+hi khi be/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba b+hud d+ha/ a d+hi tsI tai/ ba ra ng+ga ra d+ha ra
119b8(mdo): ma/ a d+hi shai te/ ka la ka la ka la/ sang ka/ a b+hiSh+To ta/ na mo d+ha na po te nan/ bud d+ha ko ti nan/ a na d+hun man/ tsa ta sra par sha do// a yu ma la lan/ cad nan tu/ tad yAhA/ su re b+he/ su
120a1(mdo): ma hA su ra g+hi/ mu ni mu ni/ ma ha mu ni/ mo ti ma taM/ ma ha ma ti/ na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na mo a s+ya ba lo ki li/ shA ra yA bo ta swe ta yA/ ma ha swa tA yA/ ma ha ka na ka yA/ a mri d+h+yan duma?
120a2(mdo): sa!/ sa man ta g+ha tra d+ha/ ra ni swa hwA// gzungs 'di ni thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcur mganyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting pe 'dzind thob par gyu rad to// byang chub seMs
120a3(mdo): dpa' dpag tu myed pa dag gi gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur da to// gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya cha brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
120a4(mdo): bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdang par 'gyur ro// phongs par gyurd pa'i tshe/ lan bdun bzla/ sa brjod bgyis na tha rad par 'gyur ro// rims nad thams cad
120a5(mdo): la nang par bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rlung gis zin na maradang 'bru mar la lan nyi shu cha gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ bsku bar bgyi'o// so na na so shing la lan nyi shu cha gcig/ 
120a6(mdo): yongs su bzlas te/ bcang par bgyi'o// rna ba nan ras bal gyi sa khon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol pa la lan bdun bslas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar thugs par da
120a7(mdo): 'o// klag pa na pa lA 'bru mar ro// ljon pa la khyab par bkye'o// gdon gyis btab pa la mtshon skud sna lnga la lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas te/ mgul du btags par bgyi'o// kha 'gro ma 'i
120a8(mdo): gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te/ shig shis thams cad byug go// nad thams cad la khyab par bgyi'o// 'di ni bsgrub pa ma bgyis pa'i cho ga'o// ji ste sangs rgyas dang byad
120b1(mdo): chub sems dpal pa dang // gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang // rdzu 'phrul kyis 'gro ba dang / myi snang bar bgyid pa dang / myig bsku ba dang / ldong ros las rdzogs pa bsgrub
120b2(mdo): par 'tshal nas/ des sku gtung dang / bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gyi 'khor bgyis te/ bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
120b3(mdo): ba dan bres te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis 'tshal bar bkang la/ tsan dad dang a ka ru dang / kun tu mu bcug pas bdugs te mar me brgya cha brkyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs pa/ 
120b4(mdo): spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ mar me/ brgya brtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas kos gtsang ma bgos te/ gzungs kyi
120b5(mdo): gsang sngags kazhi 'di dag gis 'tshams bcad par bya 'o// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma Ar+ya/ a ba lo ka te she ra/ ya/ bo ti sa twA yA/ ma hA swa tA yA/ ti li yA thA/ ti li ban
120b6(mdo): d+ha myi/ pyaM li ban d+ha myi/ tsi li myi li ban d+ha myi/ sI ma b+han du myi/ bdag gis mtshams las su yang 'da' bar ma gyur da cig/ swa hA/ chu la lan nyi shu cha gcig yongs su bzlas te/ 
120b7(mdo): phyogs bcur mtshams bcad par bgyi'o// gang gis 'gug par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag thog mar brjod par bgyi'o// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo a r+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra/ po
120b8(mdo): b+hi sa twa ya/ ma ha sa ta ya/ ma ha ka ts+ya ni ka/ tad yA rbA/ tsi 'i tsi li/ mye li myi li/ tsa la le/ e hi ba ga d+hA na/ ar+ya sa pa lo ki te shwa ra yA/ swa hA/ 'di ni bdag
121a1(mdo): gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag dgud par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngo tshos brgyad nas bzung ste nya'i bar du lan brgya cha brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ tus
121a2(mdo): sar+b+bagasum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du zhus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi/ de nas tshes bcwo lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ bzlas brjod dpag tu ma
121a3(mdo): mchis par bgyi'o// 'on kyang nam gyi gur thun la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpar phyag gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang pos legs
121a4(mdo): par brgya nad pa/ lus la 'od zer brgyad stong 'byin / cing mchi bar 'gyur ro// de la rigs sngags 'chang gisaskrag par myi dgyil zhing / brtan par bgyin// mthong
121a5(mdo): ma zag tu thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs dang ting nge 'dzi nad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa mthong par 'gyur ro// lho
121a6(mdo): phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang / nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong par 'gyur ro// 
121a7(mdo): de las grogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs myed pa dpag tu med pa dag rigs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas zhem yongs
121a8(mdo): su dag pa rnams su par 'gyur ro// thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
121b1(mdo): dpa' chen po 'phams pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
121b2(mdo): dang / wA dang / byi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa kun tu
121b3(mdo): bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar skad tu/ ar+ya d+h+wa dza ma kra ke yu ra na ma d+ha ra ni// zod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan
121b4(mdo): gyi rtse mo'i dpung brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangasargyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'al lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ 
121b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sum bcu cha gsum pa'i lha'i nang na/ la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo le ba la bzhugs te/ de nas / 'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las pham/ rab tu
121b6(mdo): pham nas/ de brtab cing renges pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
121b7(mdo): ches gsosad to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir lha ma yin dang / g.yul makye ba las/ l+h+wa ma yin gyi dbang po zag bzangs ris las pa ma rab tu pham ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i sgra rnams
121b8(mdo): kyang mam rab tu pha ma na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de la ji ster bsgrub par 'gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa / lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyil mo'i yung brgyan nas
122a1(mdo): ba'i gzungs khung shig/ ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyurd pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis myi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'di mnos so// mnos nas kyang gzhan la/ 
122a2(mdo): san rgya cher yang dag par 'ashad do// mngon par dran te/ de chun cad 'jigs pa 'am/ bags pa 'am/ su zing zhes byed pa 'am/ ba na skad cig ud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ba gyid pa/ 
122a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bgyi ba gzhan gyis myi thub pa'o gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ tad yA tha/ o dze yA dza ya/ 
122a4(mdo): byi dza yA byi dza ya/ dza ya bi hi ni/ shang ka ri/ shang ka ri/ prabad ka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi// sa rba sha tru 'un/ ban dza ya/ ban dza ya/ stam b+ha ya/ stam
122a5(mdo): ya/ mo ha ya/ mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti dza ya ba hi ni/ ma \u0f88\u0f90 ma za/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ gra sa kra sa/ ha sa ha sahu 'um hu 'um/ la hu ma la hum/ lam mo d+ha ri/ tre ne
122a6(mdo): rje/ tsa tu pag gre/ tsa tu dang She/ tsa tur pu tse/ a si mu sa la/ tsag kra tra/ shu ny+tsa la badz+ra/ ka pa ma d+ha ri ni// bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shi ke/ oM b+ha ga pa ti/ 
122a7(mdo): ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma za ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma \u0f7f/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi tu na bi tu na/ hu 'um hu 'u ma/ phaT phaT/ bAn dza ban dza/ pa ra se n+ya ma byid d+ha na sa ya sarba sha tru 'un na sha
122a8(mdo): ya/ d+ha dza a kra kre kau u de tri Ta triT/ bI Ta gIT/ ul ka mu Shi/ ul ka ta ri ni/ trAM log kya ma tha ni/ bIdi tra na sa ya pa ra se h+yan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig/ srungs shig/ 
122b1(mdo): mal la/ kyi la ni y-i/ cu lu cu bya/ kam pags pa/ ka la ka la/ ka yo ki li/ su su ku s+ya/ mud mamun / ad grags pa/ thaMdi rnan ma sa par/ se n+yad/ rnam pa hA ma ya/ rnam la rnam
122b2(mdo): budad+ha/ sa myad/ bram pra bye na/ sang ga sang byed/ sad byab ti dang/ sad byas/ bud d+ha zhud d+ha/ sad b+ha ma ti kra sa/ bud da/ sad t+ya ma ti krA ma/ sang ga sad myal te \u0f89\u0fa4 sa/ sad phyab sbyin na/ sad byas te
122b3(mdo): mthod 'anam po dang ni rba/ thu / sa/ hud rnam 'i/ sus nas/ rdzas tsa rtsa ya rje ldog kyas nyim nyis na me lam d+hi pa ta ma nas
122b4(mdo): ya k+ka sa kA sa/ g+han d+harma kum b+han d+ha/ ma ho ra ka ma d+hi pa ta ma na/ 5/ b+hidi dA na sa ya ba ra/ sI nan/ rang gri rang kA/ rang gA b.rang gA ba yA/ dza la dza la/ puShA ma li ni/ run d+ha dun d+ha/ 
122b5(mdo): gas pa thams cad las srung shig/ nga shin / a 'khog ta'ang // sun ma/ ma mam pang / su rba rgyas na'i sa la sa da// rdzam napa mal yang / 
122b6(mdo): bya ba'i gzhan gyis kyi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis/ khyod g.yul smod pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am/ cod pa'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ gang rgya 'gro yang rung ste/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan kyi
123a1(mdo): mo 'am ma yul tu btags pa/ bya'i rgyal po dang / skyes bus dpa' bo mams cad la srung bar byed do// bud byed kyi gzugs lta bur gyu da nas mdun tu 'dug ste/ myi lags pa sbyin
123a2(mdo): sa'ong srung bar byed dpal skyed par byed/ pha rold kyi sde spa gong par byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun tu gnas par byed do// bcom/ 
123a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dpa lba dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

123a5(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya A myi ta a yu gany+dza na na ma d+ha ra ni// bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dpag tu myed pa'o snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
123a6(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa na/ gang gdas brkos pa'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge'
123a7(mdo): slong lnga brgya'i dge' slong gi dge la 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge' slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge' slongab de dag bcom ldan 'das
123a8(mdo): kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// 'di nas nub kyi phyogs logs na// bde ba can gyi 'jig rtend khams// de na rdzogs pa'i sangs
123b1(mdo): rgyas bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed// su zhig de'i mtshan 'dzind pa// de ni de ru skye ba 'dzind// 'chi ba'i tus tshe stond pa de// dge' slong dge 'dun bcas te marga/ 
123b2(mdo): de na bud myed yong myed de// mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin// rin chen rnams kyi pad mo lwa// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// gos dang zas dang skom rnams dang // chos gos
123b3(mdo): dang ni mel cha rnams// sems bskyed byas ma zug tu yang // de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod// de ltar
123b4(mdo): sangs rgyas pas ma mya khyab// sangs rgyas chos rnams khas dam myi khyab// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam myi khyab// bsam kyis mya khyab la dad byas na// rnam par
123b5(mdo): sbyind pa yang bsam gyi khyab// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa kyis rgyas che dpag myed kyi pho grong 'khor dang bcan
123b6(mdo): zhes bya ba rgya dpag tshad khwa yod pa zhig yod de// rgyal rigs su skyes so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che dpag byed kyi
123b7(mdo): lab ni 'kho bo las sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po mchog ces bya bar gyur to// de'i yum ni gzil brjod can zhes bya bar gyurd to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi sras ni
123b8(mdo): slab zhes bya bas gyu rad to// rim 'gro ba ni snyand pa ji myed ces bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshed pag myed kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur da pa ni par rlom
124a1(mdo): tog ces bya bar gyur da to// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa ni dkon pa chen po zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi/ 
124a2(mdo): bdud ni mchod pa zhes bya bar gyurd to// lha sbyin gyi mying ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyurd to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyen thos drug khri yod do// 
124a3(mdo): dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi mtshan zung la/ zhag bcu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing / 'jig rtend kyi khams bde ba can
124a4(mdo): na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed rgyu nad tu yid la bya'o// 'chi myed rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang brjod par bya'o// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
124a5(mdo): tu yan lag lngas la gtugs nas phyag 'tshal lo// sem sa can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag byed bsams na/ zhag bcu 'das nas de bzhin gshegs/ 
124a6(mdo): pa tshe dpag myed mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong bar gyur da to// dge ba'i cha ba thams cad kyang 'jig rtend kyi khams rna bde ba
124a7(mdo): can tu yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
124a8(mdo): dge slong dag 'tsho byed ra sma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na// tad 5/ shA pa le/ a pa le/ sam pa le/ ni rdeshe/ ning dzi te/ ni chug te/ nir mu khye/ phal bar med ne/ su
124b1(mdo): ba ti/ ni de she/ a gyi ta/ a yul ba le/ ma gyi ta/ a su ga dza/ ni ra ha re/ a gyi ta a yu/ pra sA da ni/ nir bud de/ ag ke sha/ bud d+he/ a kar sha ning de she/ a ke sha ni dza te/ a!
124b2(mdo): shA ku sha le/ a ka shi ni da ngag ne/ ma ka ga sa b+hiSh+ma ne/ su Sha ba ti/ a dAm+ba ne/ runy+tsa ba ni/ re she/ tsadra ring+ga rma pra srad ne/ tsata ri a r+ya sa t+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ tsata ra me rga ba ra tha swAd ne/ 
124b3(mdo): ba la bi r+ya pra/ sA da re/ d+ham tsa d+ha ne/ ku sha lau/ kun la ne/ rde sha/ ku sha la pra ti shI ne/ bud d+ha ku sha le/ bi lud pra ba se da ma ka ra ne ni dzA te/ nair bud de/ bi ma li/ bi re dze/ radzas
124b4(mdo): ras ra gre/ sa ra gra pa le/ ra sa gra/ a r+tho na naM/ ku le za ti kuShe/ bi ku le dan ta/ sud+hAn taM tsid te su pra ti ga/ te/ su le/ su mu le/ d+ha me tsad+ha me/ ba le/ tsa ba le/ 
124b5(mdo): nu sha yA ba le/ bud da a ga sha ba le/ bud d+ha mA g+ha sha gu ne bud de A ga sha nir gu she/ A mr-i ta dud tu baM sA re/ swa hA// / dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
124b6(mdo): 'chi byed rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di/ ji skad bskrund pa bzhin du kha ton byed na/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri pa myed pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag byed
124b7(mdo): la me tog dang spos kyis mchod par bgyi'o// byang chub kyi snying po'i pad ma'i bdan dang / byang chub phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o// de la'ang 'dod pa bskyed par bya ste/ 'dod pa bskyed par
124b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad ma snang ba'i chu zhes bya ste/ me tog dang / 
125a1(mdo): 'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i// pad ma'i gdan ni dag cing bzang la bkra ba'i 'od gzer can zhes bya ste/ rin po che du mas bskord pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
125a2(mdo): myed bzhugs so// g.yas na ni// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ g.yon no ni mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas grangs myed pas bskord to// dad pa'i rigs/ 
125a3(mdo): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang der mos pa mang pa der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi mdog gis sa chen po la rin po che sna brnyan gyi pad ma dag las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong
125a4(mdo): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gangal la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed de'i ma tshan 'dzind pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mya 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa
125a5(mdo): dang / tug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa da / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa myi 'byung ste// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyind pa na me gtogs so// 
125a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/ dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lga dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ 
125a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa tshe dpag tu myed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// / 
125a8(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya puSh+Ta ku ta na ma d+ha ra ni// bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
125b1(mdo): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig
125b2(mdo): tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas chen po 'jig rte nad kyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas/ 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind
125b3(mdo): thob pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/ de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad
125b4(mdo): la the tsom myed pa/ sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par ba che ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus
125b5(mdo): par gyurd te/ 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems de pal sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par bo che bstan la sa langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ khrus
125b6(mdo): mogayas pa yipas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga ya ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bablud+had nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das rigs
125b7(mdo): kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis nas/ de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
125b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po seng ge rnam par brtse pa la 'di skad ces bkal saH yad to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs
126a1(mdo): pa la mchod pa bgyis na de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur zhes seng ge rnam par bache ba khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul
126a2(mdo): khrims dpag tu myed pa/ ting nge 'dzi nad dpag tu byed pa/ shes rab dpag tu myed pa/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu myed pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong pa dpag tu byed
126a3(mdo): pa ste/ seng gi rnam par brtse ba gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu byed pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ 
126a4(mdo): de la mchod pa'i rnam par sbyind pa de yapa dpag tu myed par shes par bya'o// seng ge rnam par che ba gang la la dag de 'di/ na gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su rtsa
126a5(mdo): ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ mchod pa byed pa de dag thams ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyasakyi na pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa ga
126a6(mdo): las theg pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// seng ge rnam par che ba gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
126a7(mdo): mngasems dpa par 'gyural/ dang pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / dpa' dang / dang / dang / tsu gam pa srin dang / so kyang dang /
