198a1(mdo): yan chad bzlas te/ yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir 'thor ba'i lam bdun byas na ri snyil bar 'ong ngo // la la zhig gi rin po che yod pa'i gnas su bab na de'i mdzod kyi lha rab 'phrul zhing 'ong ngo // mtsho
198a2(mdo): skams par bya na/ thog mar 'jab stong rtsa brgyad yan chad byas te/ zangs la 'brug gi gzugs byas te gser chus bskus la mtsho'i nang du bor na mtsho myur du skams so// chu bzlog pa'am bskam par bya na/ ku
198a3(mdo): kul bsregs la rtsal ba lang gi gzugs ci tsam yang rung ba zhag byas te/ chu nang du bo la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad kyis sngags na// de ma thag tu log par 'gyur ro// slar dbab par bya na/ rdo gtsang
198a4(mdo): ma gcig la bsngags te/ chu'i nang du bor na snga ma bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro// lce 'bab cing 'brug trag po zer la klu gdug pa rgyal byed du 'ong bzhag yod de/ slar zlog cing myi zer bar bya na lag pa
198a5(mdo): g.yon pa'i sor mo gung dang srin lag dang / 'thel 'u chung gsum la ga mthil du bkug 'dzub mo bsgreng 'the bos 'dzub mo'i tshig / sa su non par byas te/ 'dzub mo 'brug zer ba'i logs su
198a6(mdo): stan la bstams na rang 'chad do// lha thams cad dbang du byas te bkol par 'dod na/ thams cad bsdu ba'i phyag rgya la/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi srin lag gnyis lag 'thil du rgyab spad de bkug la/ kong
198a7(mdo): mo gnyis rtse sprad de/ 'dzub mo gnyis so so nas/ me tog khe phye ba ltar byas te the'u chung ya kha phye bo ltar bya'o// 'the bos 'dzub mo'i tshogs dbu mar mnan la lan mang du bsngags la yul phyogs de na lha
198a8(mdo): ma yin yod do/ cog sprin bzhin du 'dus te 'ongs nas/ tsi dkar bkol du rung po/ tsi bye yang rAng ste/ gnod pa zhig yod na/ bya de rgyu sar sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab na bya de rang 'chi'o// ri la tsi ya
198b1(mdo): myi gnas par bya na/ gnas de bsngags brgya brgyad yan chad kyis btab la skad chen po lan gsum bos la bsrung po'i phyag rgya 'di 'di ltar bya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang 'the'u chung gnyis lag
198b2(mdo): mthil du bkug la/ gong mo dang / 'dzu ba mo dang / 'the bo gsum bsgreng ste/ ri la phyag rgya btab la gom pa bdun phyir nAr te/ kom pa re re dang sngags lan re dang phyag rgya lan res btab na bya'o cog myi
198b3(mdo): rgyu'o// r-i dgas dang gcan zan no cog kyang slar sngon gyi gnas su 'dug go// nam mkhal la ci yang myi rgyu bar bya na/ phyag rgya gong ma byas te sngags lan bdun gyis btab taM/ nam mkha' stong pa la phyag rgya
198b4(mdo): lan bdun kye bar du brgyud na/ nam ma khal la stu nyag cig dang rtul phra mo yang myi rgyu'o// mya myi smra bar bya na de'i myong rus yi gai/ ra bris te/ khar bcug na yong myi smra'o/ smra bar bya na kha nas
198b5(mdo): byung na smra'o/ sngags 'di gzungs su 'dza nad cing bsgrub par 'dod na/ snying po 'di lan bdun 'bum 'dzab tu byas na thams cad byar rlung ngo// bsnyen pa ma tshang na byar myi rung ngo // bde bar gshegs pa/ 
198b6(mdo): zhal 'tshems kyi gsung dang / nga rgyal 'dul ba'i phrul dpa'i phyag rgya 'i le'u dang gsum pa'o// / phyag rgya 'di rnams byed cing bsgrub pa'i cha/ gyis myi mthong bar
198b7(mdo): bya'o// dbang po'i phyag rgya 'di ni tsan dan dkar po chen gang phun brgyad gru bzhi 'khor ba las brkos te/ lan stong yan chad kyis sngags la pog dkar pos gtugs te/ snying dkar btab na gzhan gyi sems
198b8(mdo): shes pa'i shes rab dang / tshe snga ma dran pa dang / theg pa chen po'i do ni khong du chud par 'gyur te/ phyag rgya'i cho ga zhag brgya'i bar tu bsgoms na/ rdzu 'phrul yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di tsan dan
199a1(mdo): dkar po tshon gang phun do gru bzhi las bskos te/ lan drug brgya yan chad kyis btab la/ ku gul gyis/ bdugs te lus la thogs na/ longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab mchog dang
199a2(mdo): ldan par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di ni can dan tshon gang gru bzhi las bskos te/ lan drug brgyas bsngags la phog dkar pos 'dugs pa la phyag rgyas btab ni nam mkhal la 'phung par 'ong ngo // phyag rgya 'dis ni con
199a3(mdo): dan tshon gang phun brgyad gru bzhi las bskos te/ sngags lan bdun stong gyis btag la/ pog dkar pos bdugs la rkang pa la btab na/ nyid gcig kyang khri phrag sum brgya'i bar du 'gro nus so// 'di yan chad
199a4(mdo): kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhin tsin dan dkar po myed na/ 'am shing laM sha'i nang tu bcos te byas na byar rlung ngo // bde bar gshegs pa'i zha la tshems nga rgyal 'dul pa'i gzungs las tshe bsring ba dang nad kyi tshe
199a5(mdo): ga'i le'u bzhi pa'o// l+r-i'u 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad ni mtshal chus br-i 'o// sri gdon gyis btab pa la snying kar bris na myur tu 'tsho'o// bgegs kyi dbang du myi 'gro'o// 'dre gdon gyis/ btab kyang rung ste
199a6(mdo): myur du 'tshe'o// 'di bdun bris te nad pa'i khong du byed na myur da tu 'che'o// gzungs 'di sgom pa'i myos phyag rgya 'di der ri mo can chag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshon bdun dang / dang dkar thang par sbyar te tshas bzang
199a7(mdo): par byas la/ dong zlum por bskos nas der bzhag na lo bud+yA na stong thub po// skyel ba'i myi myed na bdag nyid kyis khyim dag ra'i 'dab tu zabs su chag bud+yA na brkos te lo bdun gyi bar tu sbas na sngar bshad pa bzhin tshe ring zhing
199a8(mdo): di gzhungs la 'dzangs rgya che ste shes rab mchog dang ldan par 'ong ngo // bdag dang gzhan tshe ring bar 'dod na/ 'di bdun khri bris te khong du srid na tshe gnam sa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// rnam pa bdun po 'di can yang rung / 
199b1(mdo): khong du myed na myur tu 'tsho'o// re re bris te myed na tshe ring la 'dzangs rgya che ste mngon rtogs che'o// la la zhig rin po che sna tshogs dang ldan par 'dod na/ rnam pa bdun po 'di yi ger bris te khong tu myed na/ de zhag gsum lon
199b2(mdo): narin po che'i mchog tu bzang 'arnam pa mang po yid bzhin su 'phob 'o// gzhan gyi nor 'dod na yang myi de'i phyi rus phyag rgya'i 'og tu bris te myed na mod bzhin du thob bo// rnam pa bdun po 'di bris te 'khor du myong na/ 
199b3(mdo): zhag gsum lon na nam mkhal la 'phur ba 'ong ngo // lus gzugs swa par bya na/ khrag gis bris te myid na zhag gsum len na gyi snang bar 'ong ngo // rnam pa gsum po 'di khri rkang bzhi la bris na/ rdo rje mthu 'o/ 
199b4(mdo): che brgyad kyis rtag tu rimi 'gro srungs te/ bsrungs ma rnams kyang sus kyang myi mthong ngo // srang sbra cher bya dgos te sme sngol myi bya ste sh+ya dmyed dang nyal du mya rung ngo // me chen po shor ba la 'di bris te sngags
199b5(mdo): lan brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad kyis btab ste me'i nang du bo na myur du rang shi'o// rlung chen po longs pa la 'di bris te/ sngags lan tha kya rtsa brgyad yan chad kyis 'atal la rlung khar por na mod bzhin rang
199b6(mdo): shi'o// chu chen po mya chod na 'di bris te chu nang du bor na mod bzhin rang 'chad do// char ched 'o bab pa la 'di bris te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste char chen po'i nang tu 'or na mod bzhin rang 'chad do// yang sngag
199b7(mdo): kyi ye ge 'o cog bri zhing khong du chud par 'dod na/ sngags 'di bris te khong du byed na 'dod sngags kyi yi ge bzhin go zhang bri khang nus te 'dis myed na ko 'ar myo nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das brtan pa stobs pa tshe/ 
199b8(mdo): de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / 'khor mang po rnams kyis bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing 'phags pa'i 'bras bu la sems can thams cad bkod pa na/ legs so legs so// 
200a1(mdo): theg pa chen po 'di gang na spyod pa lag nas der bdag cag dam tshig la gnas pa'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing myur du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
200a2(mdo): sabaka' stsa lad pa/ sems can rnams la chos 'di spyod po zhig yod na/ nga nyid der gshegs te sku mngon tu bstand nas yang dag pa'i tshol ba'i re ba bskang par bya'o// la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs
200a3(mdo): ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / che ba'i yon tan zhag tshol ba yo na myur tu dngos grub par bya'o// la lo zhig gos chos 'di nyams su len cing theg pa chen po'i yod na/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
200a4(mdo): rkyang bstand te/ phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal da pa dang / 'khor rnams chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma byung nas bcom ldan 'das brtan pa'i mthus bka' stsa lad pa'i mdol/ 
200a5(mdo): 'jig rten gyi che bo rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin/ gyi rgyal po rnams spyi bos blangs ma thag tu/ 'phags pa brtand pa'i stobs pa ches spru lad te/ gshegs pa 'khor rnams
200a6(mdo): kyis ma tshor ro// // bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal chems nga rgyal 'dus pa'i gzungs las/ gleng gzhi dang brtan pa gzhag pa rdzogs s+ho// 
200a7(mdo): N+yan+ya kar skad du/ a r+ya ma ha san ni pra ta rad no ka tu d+ha r-i na na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa 'dus pa rin po tshe toka gi gzung sa zhes bya ba theg
200a8(mdo): chen po'i mdo'o// / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// de la phyag 'tshal te/ bdud kyi 'khor gyis myi
200b1(mdo): tsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di sbyor bar bgyis bdag gi rigs sngags 'di grub par gyur da cig// 'di lta ste/ a ba me a ba me/ a ma ba re a ba re/ pra ri ku na dzA na dA na da pu ska ra ba ha dza lu 'am
200b2(mdo): kha ya myA li mya le ko li myo li/ kar rti pa ra mu tre mu tra mu khe swA hA/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa tus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kha ba 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na dge slong stong
200b3(mdo): du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shind tu rnam
200b4(mdo): bar grol ba/ cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa/ byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag go don rab tu 'thob pa/ srid pa kund tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas
200b5(mdo): sems shind tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi de ma pa'i pha rold tu sond pa/ shastag dang thabs gcig tu bzhu gas so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/ 
200b6(mdo): lhun po'i tshe 'dzin gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / chu lha'i bre gros gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / babang skyong blo gros gzhon nu da gyurd pa dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / 'od kyi blo gros gzhon nur gyur da
200b7(mdo): pa dang / nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa dang / bub dka' gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / chu lha gzhon nur gyur pa dang
200b8(mdo): tri ma myed pa gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag las tshogs pa byang chub sems dpal khri thams cad kyang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin
201a1(mdo): thob pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes can/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa// de bzhin gshegs
201a2(mdo): sa rtsu pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa/ shes pa la mkhas pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang shes ral la mkhas pa/ shastaka dang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi krong
201a3(mdo): khyer chen po na kun tu rgyu mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ g.yog lnga brgya pa tsam/ gcig gi mying ni nye rgyal/ gcig gi mying ni pang nas skyes shes
201a4(mdo): bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de// tshogs kyi gtso bo/ g.yog gi tshe gas can de gnyis phan tshun 'di ltar bdag cag las gang gi sa phog mar bdu do che thob pa des gcig la ga cig sman to zhes dam
201a5(mdo): tshig byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul sA tro'u dI so kyai tshe she ma thabs dang dz+re k+ko bgos lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po 'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / 
201a6(mdo): de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod yul du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo // mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar dge
201a7(mdo): 'di'i spyod lam mdzes pa de lta bu ni bdag gis sngan chad dge sbyong dam/ bram ze 'am/ myir 'gyur pa gzhan su kang la yang sngon ma mthong na/ bdag de'i gnas su song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi stond pa
201a8(mdo): gang yin/ gang las rab tu byung gang gi chos la dkal zhes 'dri'o snyam nas/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ka la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lan mngon tu
201b1(mdo): yang dag par mgu par bya ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs go cig tu 'dug nas/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
201b2(mdo): pa khyod kyi stodad pa gang / gang las rab tu byung / gang gi chos la dga'/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// shag kya'i sras po brtul shugs rka thub
201b3(mdo): chen po kun gyi dam pa dbang ldan pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol du phye nad cing grol la de bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas shes bya sad mdzad myi mnyam sdug bsngal mtsho skyems da ltar 'di na
201b4(mdo): yod// dri ma myed pa de'i skyabs su nga song nga ni de'i chos la dga' nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi stond pa ji skad smra/ ji skad ste/ nad/ tshe dang ldan pa rta zul gyis smras pa// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa
201b5(mdo): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig bshad do// ji ltar 'a jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyud bcas byed rgyud ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab
201b6(mdo): tu gsungs// gang na skye dang dga' dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mya gnas pa// tha rad pa'i mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de'i sa rang gis mkhyen de de gsungs// de nas ku nad tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam
201b7(mdo): grangs 'di thos nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa myed pa skyes te/ des rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras/ 
201b8(mdo): so// sangs rgyas kyis ni shi nad tu rnyed dka' chos gnyer bdud rtsi'i chos bshad pa/ 'di ni rtag tu skye ba'i 'bab chu skyems pa bden par khong du chud// de ltar na ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar
202a1(mdo): 'gyur ba ste// lam 'di dam pa shes rab chos rnams sgom pa myi mnyam byed pa yin// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
202a2(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da ltar ga la bzhugs// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/ 
202a3(mdo): ral ba can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge' slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ bdag gis grogs po'i mchog dang slob ma'i 'khor la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu
202a4(mdo): rab tu byung / de nas ku nad tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te slar song nas ga la ba der song ba dang / kun tu rgyu pad nas skyes kyis
202a5(mdo): kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyi sa pon ma ni dang / padan gyi dog ni sos su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni kun tu dkar ba las
202a6(mdo): na/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdud ci rnyed do// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/ kho bos 'dud ci rnyed kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyi ro legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / kho bos ci snyed pa
202a7(mdo): khyod la bshad do// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan las langs nas bla kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs te/ kund tu rgyu nye rgyal ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di
202a8(mdo): skad ces smras so// gang gis srid gsum rgya mtsho myur rgal zhing // phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba// mya ngan myed zhi lam de shod cig dang // yang 'byung myed pa'i lam tu 'jug par bya// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal
202b1(mdo): gyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji lta ba 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs gyur bcas khyed rgyung ldan 'byung dang / las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// kang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sug
202b2(mdo): bsngal nges par myi gnas pa// tha rad pa'i mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de'i sa rang gis mkhyend te gsungs// pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma myed pa zhi ba'i chos// nyon mongs
202b3(mdo): lta ngan nyes pa thams cad ni cid kyi gcod pa dang // 'di na 'dus byas gsog gso de phyir stong pa sku ba thub pas gsungs// de zos zhi ba reg 'gyur tri ma myed po'i tshig de bzlos de gsungs// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ dza
202b4(mdo): ltar las dang nyon mongs rgyud bcas byed rgyud ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs // gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par myi gnas
202b5(mdo): pa// tha rad pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de'i sa rang gis mkhyend te gsu ngas// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis/ de nyid tu chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myod cing tri me dang bral la nyon mongs
202b6(mdo): bamyed pa rnam par sbyangs te des rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 'di skad ces smras so// yang dag spyod pa 'di ni chu bo sgrol ba zhi ba mgyogs pa'i gzings// ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum po zhi
202b7(mdo): byed 'khor ba 'i pha rold 'gro// 'don yongs su shes na nyon mongs phung po 'joms shing bdud 'dul 'gyur// thar dpa'adi ni dgra dang zab mo sA lad cing sug bsngal rgya mtsho skyems// pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ 
202b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga ya bzhugs// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
203a1(mdo): po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge' slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs zhes zos nas bdag cag gnyis bcom/ 
203a2(mdo): ldan 'das de'i zed tu rab tu byung ngam par nas skyes kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin te/ bdag cag gi 'khor la bltas la rab tu byung ngo // de nas kund tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / par nas skyes rang gi 'khor
203a3(mdo): ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can gyis yul ang ka ma ngag d+ha na mkhas shing snyan pa dang / brjod pa grags pa dang ldan pa skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes
203a4(mdo): g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong ko'u ta ma'i bstand pa la rab tu nga bar 'dod do zhes zos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems so// da kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge la sbyong kol+yata ma'i slob mar gyur
203a5(mdo): na/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul stongs par byed kyis bdag der song ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu byung ba las bzlog sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzind du gzhug go snyam ste/ de nas skad
203a6(mdo): cig zang cig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can myu rad du bdag gi khang pa nas myi snang bar byas ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bsgyur nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na
203a7(mdo): lam kar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste// khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges par bgam par bya ba 'i phyir// smras pa de dag thams cad don yod ma yA
203a8(mdo): 'di la rgyu yang myed// dge dang myi dge las de 'bras bu thob pa 'di ni ka la yod// myu rad du khyod gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod ched mo byos// skye rga na 'chi myed cing sdug bsngal myed de 'jig rten pha rol
203b1(mdo): byed// bsod nams bsod nams ma yini las bskyed 'bras myed/ rgyu dang byed pa myed// rnyed phyir 'dir ni shag kya'i bu yis smras kyis dad pas ma 'gro shig// de nas nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes 'di snyam du
203b2(mdo): sems te/ kye ma bdud sdig can bdag cag rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa'i phyir 'ongs so snyam nas/ de nas nye rgyal rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i
203b3(mdo): khye'u nyon cig 'khor ba'i skyon dran par gyis la// 'jig rten rga ba yis gzir cing 'chi bdag gis ni rab bskor ba// de gnyis spang phyir rab 'byung legs par zung // de nas pang nas skyes kyis bdud pa/ 
203b4(mdo): slar smras pa// mkhas pa'i blo 'chang stug bsngal gsum mthara'abyind mchog chos rnams kun shes kyis// rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros 'di las bskyod nus su yang myed
203b5(mdo): sred pa rab zhi bya phyir bdag caka brtan pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bad // seng ge'i gzugs can wa'i tshig kas nged kyi blo gros ma bsgyur cig/ bden pa mthong ba'i lha dag nam mkha' la
203b6(mdo): 'dug pa de dag gis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed legs so legs so// 'di lta ste rab tu 'byung ba 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags/ 
203b7(mdo): bal lam yin te/ lam 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o// lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa'o// 'di lta ste rab tu 'byung ba dang mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs
203b8(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo// de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde ste/ yid la gcags nas de nas de nyid du myi snang bar song ngo // 
204a1(mdo): de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dag nged ni rga dpa'o che ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
204a2(mdo): las rab tu byung bar yang dag par chas kyis khyed kyis shes par gyis shig/ khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu 'byung myi 'dod pa ni 'di nas phyir log shig/ de nas bram
204a3(mdo): ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag cung zad shes pa'i de kun kyang khyed kyi mthu na/ khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na/ khyed gang las rab tu 'byung ba de
204a4(mdo): las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gis
204a5(mdo): rig nas/ ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong ko'u ta ma'i gam tu 'gro myo nus pa ra bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi log sa su/ g.yapas chen po zab tu dpag tshad brgyad pa zhig spru lad to// de
204a6(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ ci nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kri ga yang sa chen po de myi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do// 
204a7(mdo): yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun dur chen po brtan pa sra ba la snyil pa sul byed pa gcig tu stug por gyu rad pa/ mkhregs pa 'phang tu dpag tshad spong yod pa zhig mngon par srul te/ mang de
204a8(mdo): khro zhing gtug la gtum pa/ dgra chen po 'byi nad pa stong yang mngon par srul da na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzil 'jid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis mo de yang ma mthong // seng ge
204b1(mdo): yang ma mthong / seng ge'i skad kyang ma thos lam drang por bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su song ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor mang po brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing / mudun gyis bltas
204b2(mdo): nas chos stond to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsa lad pa// dge slong dag khyed skyes bu dam pa tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tsho gas can 'di gnyis la ltos/ de dag gis gsol
204b3(mdo): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis g.yog dang bcas te/ nga'i zad du rab tu byung nas gcig ni nga'i nyan thos
204b4(mdo): thams cad kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gcig/ ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas dke' slong zhi ga gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// skyes bu mkhas
204b5(mdo): pa g.yog ldan 'di gnyis ni// rdzu 'phrul ldan dang shes rab 'jig sa myed par// mye mchog phan pa mdzad pas sung bstand te// bdag gis de gnyis bsti bstar bskyed nas su// de nas dge la
204b6(mdo): srong de stan las langs te/ dge' slong mang po dang / khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba mang po dang / lhan cig tu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsu nas bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas skyes bu dam pa de
204b7(mdo): gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das
204b8(mdo): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis lagastsal tu gsol// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du tshangs par spyad
205a1(mdo): da do// mams ldan 'das kyis bka' sus dpa/ rigs kyi su kyad gnyis kyi mying tshe/ rgyal gyis gas la pa/ bdag ni tham pa la rgyal gyi bu lags te/ rgyal zhes bkyil/ bdag
205a2(mdo): ma'i mying ni sha ri ka ste bdag de las skyes pas na de'i slad du bdag gi mying ni sha mi'i bu zhes btags so// bdag rab tu byung bar yang pha mas kanang lags so// pang nas skyes kyis gsol da pa/ bdag
205a3(mdo): ge pa'i mying dag tsu di n+ya nas bgyi/ bdag shi pa'i phyid na ma chu gal zhim bgyi ste bdag de las skyes pas na de'i slad su bdag gi phyi ni ma chu 'gal gyi bu zhes btags so// 'dagarab tu gyul
205a4(mdo): sapa pha mas gan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sho ril du dang po lu 'gal gi zad du g.yog dang bcas te tshangs par s+yadad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / de nyid kyis de gnyis
205a5(mdo): rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i dge' slong gi dngos po ra gyur da to// sha ri'i bu dang mo lu 'gal gyi bu g.yog dngabacas pa pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par bad+hAd sdig can
205a6(mdo): dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// gang dag bstan da bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol so pa/ de kun ngo la rkang la phyag 'tshal
205a7(mdo): de dag 'dren pa dang // ko'u ta ma slob ma 'khor bcas pa la deng myur skyabs tsho lo cig/ mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyal ba gsal ba'i lam ni khyod la bshad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka lasaHlad pa// khyod
205a8(mdo): lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror 'gren cing stug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed// nga'i lam ni rgyu dang myi rgyu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skyems byed pa// 'chal pa 'dzem pa myed cing mu cor sma ba wa skad da
205b1(mdo): yang ci zhig zer// khyod ni bcom zin bdud kyi las kyis pa la da yang 'dir ni byed kyi nus// de nas bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs suM myi snang bar byas nas// tshangs pa'i cha byad du bcom
205b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs sred pa'i mu ku rab tu gsal// de'i slan chad thub pa ci 'dra sems can don 'dir 'di ltar stug
205b3(mdo): bsngal spro// rtse po 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod 'gyur skye bo gang yang ma mchis te// dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod da ni ci'i slad du mya ngan myur myi 'dal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 
205b4(mdo): ngas 'dul gang 'od sems can mtshungs myed gang ga'i bye ma ste/ dad// ngas mthong de dag nga yis snying rjes thard par bya ba yi na// 'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur da pa thar da thug na// de nas
205b5(mdo): mya ngan 'da' yis blo gros ngan pa g.yos ci skyel// de nas yang budud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde nas yid la gcags te de nyid du myi snang bar gyurd nas// rang gi gnas
205b6(mdo): su song ste/ mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug pa dang / de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun/ phan tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'od mye ngan gyi khang par zhugs
205b7(mdo): zhes 'dre'o// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / zug pa thogs te rab tu yid tu 'os pa'i gos dang / lhab lhub kyis ba/ 
205b8(mdo): cag brgya nad nas/ rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed po'i lha'i sil snyan byas te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis glu len gar byed cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha'i sel snyan dag byas nas dga' bo'i
206a1(mdo): rtsed mo dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun tu 'khod pa dang / bra dAd sdig can des lag pa gnyis bsgreng nas bos te sgra ma byed sga ma byed ces de skad smras pa dang / yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang myi// / 
206a2(mdo): zer bar 'khod de/ yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yabs te bos so// lha'i bu mo do dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang gar dang sil snyan lan bad+yAno gyi
206a3(mdo): bar du byas pa dang / yang de bzhin tu bdud snog can de lag pa bsgreng nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed smra byed ces zer ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag cang mya zer bar 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu mo
206a4(mdo): dbyangs snyan glog ces bya pas prad+hAd sdig can ga la pa de logs su zal mo sbyar ba but+tad nas 'di skad ces smras so// che bo khyod kyis depa 'dir shi 'phos ltas shi ge gzigs sam ci// 'on ta ma dzi
206a5(mdo): zhig do rang 'gro ba zhugs kyis 'khrugs gyurd tam// 'on te 'a di ni khyod pas stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lags sa/ pa// ci'i slad du khyod ni dges par myi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad// 
206a6(mdo): bdud kyis smras pa/ ngal dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems yul po / sa steng shag kyal bu po sgyus bslabs pa'i blo// den ci nas gal te 'arlag pa pas gyur da na// da'i ma ngal 'dod khams 'don stongs
206a7(mdo): par byed// snyam nu ma das smrab pa// po mod gsum bcings srid rgya mchomam la rings la// bgyid nus pa'i dubs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis// bdag po tha bas sto'os brtson 'grus cas rnams ga nas
206a8(mdo): kyang // de la de dngas yus bgyid par nus ma mchis// bdud kyis smras pa/ sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa mun las snying rje'i zhags pa can// stong las can pa byed pa'i mtshon ma mchog dang 'thu can/ 
206b1(mdo): te/ 'khor ba las 'byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang mthun gyur da nas// srid pa ma lus zlog pa nye bar bstand pa byed pa po// de'i slob ma bsam gtan la ni mngon par batshon yid kyis// dben par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad pa
206b2(mdo): bya phyir khor zug tu// cho ga bzhin tu zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong pa dang // nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri'i sman ljongs rnams na gnas// rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang snying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa'i// dam pa nye rgyal
206b3(mdo): pa nas skyes gnyis thub pas btul bar gyur da// rab gdul chos can 'jig rten gsum po cho ga bzhin du btul// des ni de'i 'dod khams 'di dag stongs par byed par 'gyur// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya
206b4(mdo): po de dag gis bdud sdig can las bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi/ bsngags pa zos nas/ thams cad kyis byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i ting nge 'dzind rnam pa dang bral ba'i klog ces bya ba thob bo/ 
206b5(mdo): de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po do dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i sil snyan dang / lha'i me tog dang / gtug pa dang / spo sa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / 
206b6(mdo): lhab lbub dang / spud pa dang / rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / sal snyan nas rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rtselu kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshel tu bab par gyur/ 
206b7(mdo): to// bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes par gyur da to// gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i
206b8(mdo): me tog gi char rab tu 'bab ces dge slong de dag the tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sha ri bu dang / modo lu 'gal gi bu g.yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang mad du thung
207a1(mdo): pa chen po sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog gi cher chen po rab tu 'bab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu ma lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi/ 
207a2(mdo): bu 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin te/ bud+had sdig can gyi g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis bud+had kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta bu'i me tog char chen po nas rgyan gyi bar gyi char phab po// de nas rang po mya/ 
207a3(mdo): thogs pa 'dir 'ongs te/ nga las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po do dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang / brjod pa'i dbyangs
207a4(mdo): zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ de dag dgal ba dang rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems myi brjed dpa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob bo// de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo
207a5(mdo): de dag bdud kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo ga yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom lda na 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di
207a6(mdo): skad ces gsold to// srid chu ma lus skyems pa 'gro ba'i myig gin+ma gr-i myig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni/ khyod kyis lha dang myor bcas pa'i 'gro ba sgrol/ thub pa bdag cag ji ltar myur du sangs
207a7(mdo): rgyas 'gyur// lha dang kyis mchod don dam gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das// bdag cag mthun par bud myed smad pa gnyis spangs nas// blo mchog khyod phrul gyis drung du myur bar ni// mchis nas 'di bzhin thub po'i dbang po
207a8(mdo): gsung mnyan to// bdag myed gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das// byang chub yan lag rin chen nor gsung smon// mtshungs byed bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la// da ltar myur da tu lhan cig byang/ 
207b1(mdo): chub lung bstand gsol// de nas bdud kyi bu mo do dag stan las langs te 'grin gcig tu bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po byed gsol ba'i// dpal snyed ci phyir bcom ldan
207b2(mdo): 'das la sdang bar sems// dregs pase gos nas skye ba las stsogs sdug bsngal gyis// lus kun gtses te myi bzad gnas su nye bar song // de ltar khro ba spangs te rgyal la dad par gyis// 'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs
207b3(mdo): pa'i 'das las tha dad pa'i bdag// 'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi rje tha mkhyend// thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gos myur du bzhud// de nas bdud sdig can shind tu gdug pa'i yod dang ldan pas 'di snyam du sems
207b4(mdo): te/ bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la/ gang g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong par bya ste/ 'di nas bzlog la 'gro mya nus par bya'o/ 
207b5(mdo): snyam pa dang / bdud des de dag bcing ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de nas g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po
207b6(mdo): de dag bdud sdig can gyi drung nas dong pa dang / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu 'khros te 'di snyam tu sems so// bdag gis yang 'di 'dra bo'i ba dad kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas te// ci nas bdag gi g.yog mo de dag
207b7(mdo): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cad 'khrul nas/ dge sbyong 'go lu ta ma myi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam mkha' 'di dag thams cad 'thor rlung dang / rlung nag po chen pos kun khyab par bya'o snyam na
207b8(mdo): ya / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed ma nus so// tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na mang du lta ci smos// de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu 'khros shing / 
208a1(mdo): sdug bsngal te yid myi bde zhing yid la gcags nas/ ngu zhing skad chen pos rang gi bu dang tshogs kyis bskor la bos te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang par byas so// sdug pa'i bu dang tshogs kyis
208a2(mdo): sa/ 'khor rnams tshur sheg shig// nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams// shag kya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g.yon can ngag 'jam la// khong nas rang bzhin tug sdong 'dra ba 'dir skyes so// de nas sgra des
208a3(mdo): bdud kyi g.yog mo dang / bdud kyi bu me de dag thams cad dang bdud kyi bu tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur tu lhags nas/ bdud sdig can gyi mdun tu 'khod pa dang / 'khor de'i na
208a4(mdo): na bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros shes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'di ska da ces smras so// ci'i slad du thugs 'khros rab tu 'khrug/ sa shing thugs mye dgyes// sreg skal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas
208a5(mdo): khyod ma 'phos// 'di ni khyod lhag dgra ni sul bam mchis na/ khyod ci mongs par gyur da tam ci srad bzhin du dgongs// bdud kyis smras pa/ shag kyo'i bu po dmangs pal shing gi krig ma 'dug pa
208a6(mdo): ma mthong ngam// ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra myed smras// stobs cig ldan pa g.yon can de yos thams cad rnam pa tu mar bskus/ bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar dang bcas
208a7(mdo): pa me'i sa bsregs// 'jig rten 'di ni skyes bu tso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags pa// mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dgas mang po byed brtson mthun pa myur bar yang // chos kyi kyolazang gis drangs te shag kya
208a8(mdo): li bu 'di la skyabs deng song // lus mdzes g.yon can blo gros ldan 'di nga'i dgrar ni rab tu gnad// rab tu stug pa'i g.yog mo do dag snying rje myed pas nga bor ste// nga la dbang btsugs nas ni dge sbyong de'i skabs su
208b1(mdo): so // gal te bdag cag myur ba sgrims stobs chen 'di dang thal bar ma byas na// g.yol dang skya yis srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stongs par byed// de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad
208b2(mdo): kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar bgyi'o// bdag cag ke rdzu 'phrul dang stobs kyi yul gyi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kr-i sta nad te/ shag kya'i bu 'di gal te thal par 'gyed nus pa lha na ni
208b3(mdo): legs// de ltar mu nus na ni de'i skyabs su mche'o// yab nyid mngon gsum tu gyur da pa lags te/ gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba sngar shag kya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su myed par 'dis/ dz+ha 'phrul
208b4(mdo): kyo stobs kyi rab tu 'pham par bgyise na/ da g.yog mo mang po gyur pa lto tsa smos// / bud+yAd sdig can kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang sa? dag nged la gal te dge sbyong kony+tsa ta ma 'di gsod nus ni slar
208b5(mdo): sheg shig// ji ste ma nus na yang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrub gise slar shog shig/ de nas bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phragabacu gnyis po de dag de nas 'phags te// 'di nas steng du
208b6(mdo): dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong kyi bar d+hu bkang nas/ de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gi rdzu 'phrul drag po bstand te/ gang gling bzhi po na mo ma khal thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung nag po chen po dang / 
208b7(mdo): skab mdas bkang nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab la yang lag gis brdabs te/ gling bzhi pa thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas na/ shi nad tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyab 'byi nad to// de dag gis klu dang klu chen po dang
208b8(mdo): gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin chen po dag gis/ sa chen po brag dang re bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa dang / ri'i rgyal po re reb kyang g.yos par rig/ mtsho dang mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / chu bran dang / 'bab
209a1(mdo): rgya chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor na 'khod do// bdud kyi 'khor de dag ni ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas/ dpag tshad tsas kyi rdo'i char mngon par sprul te/ 
209a2(mdo): nam mkha' las kund tu 'bebs so// ral gyi dngartun shing dang / rdo ba dang / mtshon che gnyis pa dang / ste lu ka ma la dang / lcags mnga' dang / spu gr-i dang / su kr-i lte bu dang / dgra sta dang / ste'u so lta bu dang / 
209a3(mdo): ste lu so dang / kha rad rod can dang / shi nad tu kha rad rod can dang / sra ba drag pa rtsub ba rno ba li cher rab tu spru lad te kun tu phab bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jog pa zhes bya ba'i ting
209a4(mdo): 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhugs te/ gang rdo dang mtshon cha de dag thams cad lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / dad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i me tog
209a5(mdo): gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ yul a pag mang skad na skar mdal ltung ba ni spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ sgra de da gno rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su khyon gyis brlabs te 'di ltar sangs
209a6(mdo): rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / phyir gyi ldog pa'i sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang / 
209a7(mdo): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang / lend pa dang bcas pa dang len pa myed pa'i sgrar byin gyis brlabs/ rdul dang mun nag dang / rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o// gang gleng bzhi pa 'di ni/ rtswa dang shing ge la
209a8(mdo): dang / sman dang nags tshal dang / sa dang brag dang / ra ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni 'on pa tshe sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gtsug to bstar myi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni tshangs po'i 'jig rten
209b1(mdo): gyi bar tu skus dbang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re ra las kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur da to// stong gsum gyi stong
209b2(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'do'i lha dang k+ku dang gnod sbyin dang / tr-i za dang / lha ma yon dang / nam mkhal lding dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yaM dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / myi dang myi
209b3(mdo): ma yin pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'grolo skye gnas dang / gshon rje'i 'jig rten de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang sngo ze dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha
209b4(mdo): lnga dang / myo'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myo dang myi ma yin da pa dang / nam mkhal la 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni mi tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so// sems can dmyal
209b5(mdo): ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten po mye 'khrugs pa phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni dran pa rnyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa tran nas/ sangs rgyal
209b6(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas te ngan sa padade dag nas shi 'phol nas lhar skyes so// bdud kyi sde do'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nye khro tshogs kyi 'kho mo dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong
209b7(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba depes nga'i phyind pa dang / bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'ag zas phyag 'tshal te/ 
209b8(mdo): thal mo sbyar nas chags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam dag sku mngal mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// ye shes rgya mchog ser gyi lhun po 'dra// grags pa 'jig rten bkram nas lam me ba// mgon po yin
210a1(mdo): nyid la ni skyabs su mchi// rab tu lam stong rnam par myi gzums la// khyod ni 'odag rten sgron ma nyi ma 'dra// gzhan gyis myi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig/ ded dpon khyod la rab tu skyabs su
210a2(mdo): mchi// shind tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor pa'i mdzod// nam mkha'i rang bzhin bzod nas rnam grol thugs// thugs rje'i bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsum// don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi// 'jo
210a3(mdo): pa dgon pa las ni khyod thar da mdzad// tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston// byams la gnas shing mchog go cho ga mkhyen// thugs rje gnas pa 'i skyabs su rab tu mchi// sgyu ma spyig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i// srid pa la ni
210a4(mdo): yul gyi gnas kyis chags// myi shes nad sel 'jig rten rnams kye 'gon// sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi// chu bo zhi dubus zam par gyur pa khyod// nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab
210a5(mdo): sgrol ba// yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po// thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do// blo mochog khyod la bdag cag pa/ zod par gsol// khyed la bdag cag yod kyis gnod bsams pa/ 
210a6(mdo): 'gon po dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol// khyod ni 'gro ba'o rtse lag gcig pu rtso// bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te/ byang chub mchog gi sems na bskyed par bgyi/ sems can ma lus
210a7(mdo): thams cad 'gron du gnyer// bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi// rtse nas bdag cag pha rol da phye nad spyod par/ bdag cag rnams la spyod pa rgya chen stond// gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni tu rnams dang / 
210a8(mdo): ldan na byang chub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// me tog gang gos khyod la mngon gtor ba// phyogs kun tu yang de dag gdugs gyur da te// dus kun bde ba la 'byung gnas zhing du ni// rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur
210b1(mdo): cig/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi sil ma gtor ba dang / me tog gi sau le ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdze'uphrul gyi
210b2(mdo): mthus/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i me tog gi gdug pa kun tu 'dug par gyur da te// me tog gi gtugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
210b3(mdo): bzhugs shing mtshol ba zhes pa thams cad dbu'i gartsug go drang zad kyi steng gi khar sA pa la 'dug go// bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
210b4(mdo): kye zhing grangs myed dpag tu myed pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing mtshol ba zhes te/ chos kya pa 'chadad pa 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/ lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhug
210b5(mdo): pa'i dbu'i rtsug gi trang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ me tog gi ke tu gas de dag 'dug par gyur par mthong zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa/ rtags mtshungs pa gzugs
210b6(mdo): 'dra bar mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng ge 'i khri tha dad cing 'khor tha dad la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa nyi tse za dad par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
210b7(mdo): de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni ma thos so// bdud kyi 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/ mchog tu dga' ba dang mos pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das
210b8(mdo): kye zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyer log nas/ bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo // 
211a1(mdo): mtshar bdud sdig la rgya cher bzlas te/ dge sbyongab 'golu ta ma de'i sku'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhag ma nus na/ gsad par lta ci spos/ de'i steng du nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir
211a2(mdo): sa/ de'i ma d+hu na na 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig cag rab tu 'khros te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde nas yid la gcags te des 'od skad ces smras so// shag kya'i bu 'di ji srid brlag par ma byas na// de srid nga'i dpal song
211a3(mdo): slar mya 'ong // shag kya'i bu 'di ji ltar di daMr sad snyam ste// bdag cag gzhan la yid myi rton cing myi smra 'u dug/ de nas btud sdig can yod mya bde zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'udug go// / 'dus pa rin po
211a4(mdo): che tog gi gzungs las bdud spa bkong pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di snyed
211a5(mdo): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'di lta bu'i theg padang / ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul dang / snying rje dang / thabs dang spob sa pa 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang
211a6(mdo): shes kyi bar nga ldan pa ngo mtshard to// bcom ldan 'das du dang ldan na skyes bu gang bag sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu phyimachi zhing / myung tu blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang sa/ 
211a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal su lad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag chos bzhi dang ldan na 'di las skyes bu gang zag la la sdig pa'i grogs po la lag tu gyi 'gro zho srung du ldan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
211a8(mdo): 'tshang rgya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mya 'dzind cing chos gang yang myi 'dzind myi gtong khas myi len myi gnas nye bar myi lend myi rtog rnam par myi rtog go// 'di lta
211b1(mdo): b+ha sbyin pa'i pha 'o da du phyind pa la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang myi gtong gyi 'dzin kha so s+ye len nye bar gyi le nad myi gnas kyi tog rnam par gyi rtog ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bdu du pyod pan/ 
211b2(mdo): rtog rnam par myi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzangs dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de sems can du smra ba ma yin/ srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gso'o bar smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu smra ba mo len zhing / sems can gyi khams la
211b3(mdo): yid kyis mchog tu myi 'dzind pa nas myi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzangs dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de gzugs dang / sgra dang / tre dang / ro dang / reg bya la mchog tu myi 'dzi nad pa nas myi rtog rnam par myi rtog pa'i bar
211b4(mdo): du'o// bzhin pa'angs dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de khams gsum dang dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dmyigs pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par spyon pa 'brung
211b5(mdo): dang / gnas dang skye ba thams cad la mchog tu myi 'dzind pa nas myi rta/ ga rnam par myi tog pa'i bar du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyend pa ni spyod pa'i gnas kyi yul thams cad la rtog pa dang rnam
211b6(mdo): par rtog pa dang bral ba ste myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzangs dag chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi dngos po myed pa yin te/ sgra myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ yo ge byed pa// smond pa myed
211b7(mdo): skye ba myed pa/ 'gog pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ chags pa myed pa/ dmyigs pa myed pa/ bstan du myed pa/ dbyen pa bdag myed pa mtshan nyid dang bral ba skad cig pa nye bar zhi ba mun pa myed pa snang ba myed pa gnas myed pa
211b8(mdo): sul myed pa/ dbang po myed pa/ phyogs byed pa/ gnyen po myed pa/ bsam du myed pa/ myi 'phrogs pa ser sna myed pa/ spros pa myed pa/ rdul byed pa/ rdul dang bral ba cha nas myed pa/ tso yang myed pa/ byed pa po myed pa/ tsho ba
212a1(mdo): bo myed pa/ rten myed pa/ gzung ba myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ so sor snang ba myed pa/ skad cig ma yin pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzangs dag thams cad mkhyend pa ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs/ 
212a2(mdo): sa te/ stong pa nyid pas dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mchog tu 'dzind pa myed pa'i tshul dang / myi rtog rnam par myi rtog pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzangs dag chos bzhi po de
212a3(mdo): dag dang ldan na skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu myi 'gro zhing myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bzhin bzangs dag gang la la yul thams cad
212a4(mdo): la chags pa'i lus kyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas la rnam par khyod pas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes tshol na/ de gnyis la chags pa yin te/ de gnyis la chags pa'i yid kyi brdeg pa ni// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
212a5(mdo): slu bar byed do// de la gnyis gang zhe na gang phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la mtshan nyid du rnam par spyod pas gnas pa dang / mchog tu 'dzind pa de ni gnyis te/ thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du slu ba'o// spyod pa
212a6(mdo): gnas dang 'bras bu la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// skye ba dang srid pa dang le nad pa dang / sems can gyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// bshad pa dang rab tu bstand pa dang / bdams pa dang / tshig gi lam dang / sgra dang skad kyi
212a7(mdo): gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// rtag pa dang chad pa la rnam par lta ba'i shes pa dang / shes bya'i gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// sems can dang / srog dang / gsol ba dang / skyes bu dang / kang zag dang / byed pa po dang
212a8(mdo): byed du 'jug pa la 'du shes kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// gapa pha ro lad dang tu rol dang rtog pa dang sel pa la gnas shing rtog pa 'do ni gnyis so// bzhin pa 'angs dag skyes bu gang 'ag sul la thams cad mkhye dad pa'i
212b1(mdo): ye shes 'tshol ba de dus gsum tu ngang 'dzind pa dang / nga'i re 'dzind pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa rnam par spyod pa la gnas shing kun tu rtog pa ste/ mchog tu 'dzind na thams cad mkhye nad pa'i ye shes la de yi gnyis so// 
212b2(mdo): 'di lta ste dpe na skyes bu la la zhig me 'dod pa la ni se'i ngos la nyug pa dang / skom 'dod pa ya me dang / zan 'dod pa la rdo dang / me tog 'dod pa la gos dang / spos 'dod pa la mya ro bam pa dang / kos 'dod pa la dUr khrod dang / byug pa 'dod/ 
212b3(mdo): pa lta nam mkhal la nyug pa de bzhin du/ bzhi ni bzungs dag gang dag longs spyod pa'i gnas la chags shing / rnam par spyod pa'i lus gnyis kyi gnas kyi gnas gyis thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes tshel na de'i 'bad la 'bras bu byed
212b4(mdo): ba yon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzung das kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'kho bo dang 'dus par gyur nas 'jug pades/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar dpa btud de
212b5(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang brjod du ma mchis pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus lags sam/ brtsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ gang brjod tu myed par shes pa de
212b6(mdo): nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod nyid la tris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin tu lan thob shig// gang thams cad mkhyend pa'i mying thob par 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po gang
212b7(mdo): yang yod dpag so yod pa/ gal te mches zhes bgyi na ni rtag par 'gyur/ ji ste ma mchis zhes bgyis na ni chad par 'gyur ro// dbu ma'i lam ni dmyigs su ma mchis te de ni mchis pa yang ma lags ma mchis pa yang sa
212b8(mdo): lags so// gang ma chags kyi skye myo 'igog/ tshad ma mchis// grangs ma mchis// dpel ma mchis/ snang ba ma mchis pa de la 'tshal ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' klog go blo
213a1(mdo): gros kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang la 'ang 'gro ba'ang ma mchis/ 'ong ba 'ang ma mchis pas/ de lta bu shes pa la 'ujug par mkhas pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpa/ 
213a2(mdo): sarnam par snang byed kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang na thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/ ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis/ mngon tu bgyi ba yang mchos// zhi ba yang ma/ 
213a3(mdo): mchos// rab tu zhi ba yang ma mchis/ dus gsum yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/ smon lam dang mnyam pa'i rlom sems kyang ma mchis pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dang
213a4(mdo): gzungs kyi blo gros kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang khams gsum yang ma mchis kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang ma mchis/ rigagasum yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma mchi ste/ phung po dang / 
213a5(mdo): dang skye mched la yang rtog pa yang ma mchis// rnam par rtog pa yang ma mchis// bri ba yang ma mchis/ 'phel ba yang ma mchis la mnyam par yang myi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub
213a6(mdo): bems dpal rdo rje'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// gang so so skye bo'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i chos dang / slob po'i chos dang / myi slob pa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la myi rtog rnam par
213a7(mdo): myi rtog ste/ mnyam par yang gyi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpal sra ba'i na gas kyis gsolang pa ga gang dben pa'i tshul gyi de bzhin nyid la rnam par spyod cing mngon par gyi da sa
213a8(mdo): 'dini mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag mang dpe chos gsol pa/ gapa chos thams cad kyi rgya skye bo'i mtshan nyid thal par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du myi rtog pa 'don
213b1(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bsam gyis myi khyab pas gsol pa// gang khams gsum la rnam par spyod cing sems nyid sems la 'jug par bgyid de/ sems gnyis ga la seMs kyis
213b2(mdo): narna pa spyad nas/ myi dmyigs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpal dgra las rnam par rgyal gyis gsol la/ gang chos thams cad la myi 'jigs rjes su gyi chags/ btang snyoms su myi basbyi
213b3(mdo): khong khro bar rgya babyed/ 'dod par gyi 'gyid// rgya mo ba kyi 'dzind myi gtong ba 'don mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpal pad ma'i stob pos gsol dpag dang bsod nams dang / sdig pa la gyi
213b4(mdo): chags shing / zab mo la bzod pa'i tshul la 'jug pas ngang 'dzind pa dang da yir 'dzind pa mya rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zla 'od gzhon nur gyurd pas gsold pa/ gang chos thams cad chu zla dang
213b5(mdo): mtshungs par rab tu 'tshal cing / chos thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid rtsog pa dang / 'bri bar yang gyi mthong po 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur rgyu
213b6(mdo): pas gsol pa/ gang gi sems dang sems las byung ba mun pa dang snang ba dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bri ba thams cad kyi 'byung ba 'do ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpal byen/ 
213b7(mdo): pas gsold pa/ gang gnas pa la gnas pa na/ khams gsum pa la gnas pa'i tshangs pa la myi dbyigs/ mnyam par gyi bgyid pa 'don mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpal blo gros kyi bzad / 
213b8(mdo): pas gsol pa/ gang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas// pha rold tu phyind pa rnams la gyi daphyogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu goms par bgyid cing / myo chags kyi skyol 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// 'jam
214a1(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyu pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la myi chags kyi skyo zhing chos zab mo'i tshul yang rab tu 'tshal te// gang rab tu 'tshal ba de yang myi lenadamyi 'dor/ skud
214a2(mdo): par myi bgyid 'bral bar myi bgyid cang / chos gang la yang stsogs pa 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'phel ba yang myi skyed na/ dngos po dag la rnam par myi rtog pas/ 
214a3(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/ tshul gcig po 'dis thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpal ltad/ 
214a4(mdo): mo can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul 'di ltar zab mo stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshul 'di gcig gis/ thams cad mkhye nad pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyan
214a5(mdo): kund tu sbyor ba dang rab tu sbyor ba ci dgos 'jam dpal gyis smras/ 5/ lta ba phye bzad pa dang bral zhing yang dag pa'i lta bar sgra 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / ga yo'i myed cing drang por sgro 'dogs
214a6(mdo): pa yang myed pa dang / sdig pa dang bral zhing bla ma lo ri yo bya bar sgra 'degs pa yang byed pa dang / bka' blo bde bar smre 'dogs pa yang byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i tshor bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / kun tu sbyor
214a7(mdo): pa thams cad dang bral bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / sems can thams cad la khro ba dang / snying rje bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / sdom pa gsum du sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / mya skye ba dge ba'i chos
214a8(mdo): su sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / rnam par ma zhi bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su kyi gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang
214b1(mdo): myed pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong par spro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / sems can nyam chung ba stobs la rab tu dgod par sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skyabs myi 'jigs par sgro 'dog
214b2(mdo): pa yang myed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams nan tan la gzud par sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / bzod pa dang nges par sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / 'dzind pa thams cad la chags pa'i mtshan nyid tu/ 
214b3(mdo): sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / rdul dang mun pa'i phung po thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa dang / bsngo ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smyind pa thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa yang myed pa 'di dag na/ 
214b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba nyi shu ste/ go yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / smra ba dang / brjod pa'i tshig da rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa la 'jug pas thos
214b5(mdo): cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba'o// gzhan yang mu stegs can kye tshig gi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa thams cadakyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / bsod nams thams cad dang shes
214b6(mdo): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i sbyor ba'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / le nad pa dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa gsum dang gnas dang / rgyu dang / las dang // 
214b7(mdo): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa li bkal thams cad shes nas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba khong tu chud par 'gyur ngo ro// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/ 
214b8(mdo): 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ nam chos zab mo'i tshul 'di rtogs pa de'i tshe/ chos gang stond pa dang / gang la stond pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yi ke kang dag gis stond pa dang rab tu ston po'i chos gang yang myi mthong
215a1(mdo): ste/ gang rab tu spong ba dang / gang sgom pa dang / gang kun shes par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad brjod du byed pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la 'dug ste// des thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyu
215a2(mdo): sa ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so rigs kyi bu tshul gcig gis thams cad mkhye nad pa'i ye shes thob pa de khyod kyis legs par smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad la chags pa
215a3(mdo): myed pa'i dngos po yin pas chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa myed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / myi 'jig pa'i mtha' can dang / ma rig pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa myi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang / nam mkha'al dang
215a4(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang / chos thams cadani brjod du myed pa'i mtha' can dang / sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu yin pa dang / chos thams cad ni rdzas myed pa'i mtha' cam
215a5(mdo): dang / dus gsum dang / khams gsum dang / phung po thams cad ni rje yang myed pa'i mtha' can dang / 'du byed gsum ni stong pa nyid kyi mthal can dang / chos kyi phung po dang / rnam par smi nad pa'i phung po/ 
215a6(mdo): dang / stsogs pa dang 'bri ba'i phung po rdzas myed pa'i mthal can du yongs su brjod do// stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mthal can dang / brjod du myed pa'i don dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
215a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad ma khye nad pa'i ye shes la 'dug go// thams cad mkhyen pa la yi shes thob pa lung bstan pa 'di'i shad pa'i tshe/ bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor lho rje/ 
215a8(mdo): myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ lus rags pa spangs nas yid kyi lus rnyed do// gzhon nye khri brgyad stong gas myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par gyurd to// lha dang gyi dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa ga'i
215b1(mdo): kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang gzungs kyi tshogs thob par gyurd to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyi khri ba de dag gis bcom
215b2(mdo): ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 'os phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar myi dge ba'i grogs po dang / 'grogs pa'i
215b3(mdo): dbang gis sems can rnams stsogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la myi bgyid pa la gzigs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
215b4(mdo): ngo mtshar du gyurd pa'i sems can rnams kyi the tsom gcad pa la phyir/ sngon byung ba 'di gsungs so// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba da 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po dang pag tu myed pa 'das pa de'i
215b5(mdo): de'i dus na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du snang ba 'changazhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po skye dgu'i tshe lo drug khri brgyad / bathub ste de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhe sas snang dang / 
215b6(mdo): zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rtend mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste nyon mongs pa
215b7(mdo): can snyogs ma lnga'i dus su gyurd pa na/ 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i chos stond to// yang de'i tshe gleng bzhi la dbang po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de nas dus
215b8(mdo): gzhan zhig gi che rgyal po ud pa la li gdong btsun mo la 'khor dang / g.yog dang dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song ste/ phyi nad pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
216a1(mdo): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cing sil snyan sna tshogs dang / gdug pa sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor te
216a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dge' slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gse mngon par bstod do// lha dang k+Sha las stsogs pa'i yon tan gyis// mngon par rab
216a3(mdo): bstod nyes pa mang sel ba// nor bdun gyis ni 'gro la phan mdzad pa// gang gis blo gros zhib dang ldan 'gyur gsungs// 'gro ba'i mun sel zhi ba'i smon ma mdzad// shi 'phos na 'chi skyeb mya ngan 'jom// 'gro ba ngan
216a4(mdo): mngal ma las rab bzlog la// gang gis bdud kyi lam las pa da gsungs// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'danas snang dpal des rgyal po mun pa po me gdang de la 'di skad ces bkas
216a5(mdo): la to// skyes bu dam pa chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sem sa dpal na grom zhi ma yin te// gsum gang zhin 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i tham mams sems can rnams cad pa snyi rje ba dang / 
216a6(mdo): lta bur sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang / chos thams cad la srog myed pa dang / gsol ba byed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / tha dad du dbyer myed cing mnyam par yongs su rtog pa
216a7(mdo): ste/ skyes bu dam pa chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhi ba yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mya len cing na
216a8(mdo): khyim ma las pa dang te// gsum gang zhen/ 'di ste ste/ sems can thams cad la sbyin zhing / blan ga rgya chol ma yin/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyin gnas su 'dzugs pa yin// chog thams
216b1(mdo): cad la tshul gcig tu yongs su rtog ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing bcos su myed pa/ tha dad pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa ma byung ba ma 'gags pa ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar
216b2(mdo): rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog pa'o// rgyal po chen po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas myi zin cing / bdud kyi lam las tha dad pa yin
216b3(mdo): no// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po ud pa la'i gdong gyi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba bud myed brgyad khri bzhi stong kas yongs su bskor tsang mud+han tu bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dang
216b4(mdo): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ka la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ bco ma ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la me
216b5(mdo): tog sna tshogs kyis gto te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol da to// mya mnyam yon tan 'dzind pa rab ra bi myed mdzad pa/ ji ltar bud myed las ni ngan song spangs pa'i// skyes pa 'dir 'gyur
216b6(mdo): shi 'phos se lad pa bka' stsa yad cig/ rab mchog phan mdzad myurd tu yid kyang thul// dam pa'i 'gros bzhud bde gshegs rab zhi dga' mdzad pa// bcom ldan ji lta bur na bud myed skyes par 'gyur// 'dul
216b7(mdo): mchog gzhan la phan mdzad myu da tu bshad par gsol// bdag gi blo gros thibs po/ 'dir ni bsal du gsol// 'jig rten dag ni myo mnyam mnyam pa dge sbyong mchog/ rab grags yon tan mang po dran dang
216b8(mdo): 'dul ba 'dzind// ci nas 'di nyid du ni skyes bdag 'gyur bar// rab ri ye mya mngal bde 'gro 'chi myed lam myur gsungs// rigs kyi bu de skad ces gsold pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dang/ 
217a1(mdo): des btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes la 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// che zhe rnam grangs gang gis bud myed dag bud myed kyi dngos po myur du brjes te/ sngon 'phangs pa'i bud myed kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad/ 
217a2(mdo): par 'gyur zhing bla na myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par bud byed du skye ba 'dzind par myi 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do// che zhe de la rnam grangs gang gis bud myed myur du skyes pa
217a3(mdo): 'gyur zhing // sngon 'phangs pa'i bud myed kyi dngos po myur da tu ma lus par zad par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de gang zhe na/ che zhe de la rin po che tog zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzu 'phrul chen mo phan 'an mo 'di lta ste gabud myed kyi
217a4(mdo): dngos po thams cad zad par byed cing lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gnas ngan le nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smind pa ma lus par zad par byed do// // rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud myed rnams kyi bud mye/ 
217a5(mdo): kyi dngos po ma lus par gyur da te/ bud myed kyi dbang po mya snang zhing skyes pa'i dbang po skyes par 'gyur// skyes pa gzugs bzang po yan lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur/ drang zhing zhib pa shes pa la mkhas
217a6(mdo): par 'gyur/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par byas pa'i las kyi ma za' dang ldan zhing legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang / dgra thams cad thul par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'di dang tshe rabs phyi ma la lus dngangag/ dngo
217a7(mdo): kyi sdug bsngal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par skye nad pa de yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa
217a8(mdo): dag ma gtogs par de dag gi bud myed kyi dngos po'i lhag pas lus par de nyid la yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// lus dang ngag dpe yid kyi gnas ngan len gyi rnam par sbyind pa tshe gzhan la bud myed kyi dngos po 'grub par
217b1(mdo): byed pa'i sa bon sdug bsngal rnam par sbyin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i bakhon gyi rgyu mthun pa ri rab tsam kyang ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams// 
217b2(mdo): kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smi nad pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir 'das pa'i de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
217b3(mdo): kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad byin gyis brlabs so// gcig la ga cig rjes su dgyes so// mngon par bstod do// bsngags so// rab tu bsngags so// da lta phyogs ban+d+ha na da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
217b4(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas gang dag bzhu gas te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sa
217b5(mdo): can rnams kyi nyes par byas pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / da ge ba'i rga pa rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad de/ rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad do// gang dag ma
217b6(mdo): 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par sbyin pa'i
217b7(mdo): las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel po'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro// rab tu bsngags pa 'i 'am du mdzad par 'gyur ro// da ltar pa yang rin po me tog gi gzus
217b8(mdo): 'di 'chad de/ phyogs btsun da ltar 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i 'chad pa rnams la yang rjes su yid rang ngo / bsngags po// rab tu bstod do// che zhe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dang
218a1(mdo): bsrung sa sgyus mi dang na sa thu dang/ dbang grol bgapa la yang ngon mom rtag gi gzungs 'di glegs pams du bris te 'amang na/ rgyal po rgyas rigs kyi bo nas dbang 'asrung ba nam snyan pa dang sgra dang tshigs su
218a2(mdo): sa rbA ma ba dang phyogs bcur rgya tsho daklags par 'gyur te/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi bar du zhwa dang / snyan brgya chen pos gang bar 'gyur ro// lga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / l+h+wam yin dang sha nam man
218a3(mdo): sdong dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto po chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma// rgyal po rgyal rigs skye ba nas dbang bskur ba de bsrung ba dang skyab pa dang sA ba'i phyir/ phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas so// de'i yul thams cad
218a4(mdo): du zab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ke dang / nad dang / pha ro med kyi sa ga tshogs dang / 'dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang Ta dang / tsha ba'i nyes pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / 
218a5(mdo): srin po dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / spyad kyi ma rungs pa thams cad dang gnod par myi 'gyur/ dug dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / snum myed pa dang / ro myed pa dang / 
218a6(mdo): chub pa'i sdug bsngal ba reg na myi bde bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// no dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog thams cad kyang rab tu skye zhing
218a7(mdo): rnam par 'phel te/ sdum pa dang ro zhim por 'gyur ro// kal te rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gsul du nye bar gnas pa'i tshe rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi
218a8(mdo): mo la thogs na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des pha rol kyi dmag tshogs thub par 'gyur ro// de rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul tu zhugs pa gnyis ka rin po che tog
218b1(mdo): ki gzungs 'di glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi che mo la thogs te/ de gnyis gcig la gcig dga' zhing mthun par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar na rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di yon tan dpa pa na yon mang ngo grong ngam gro/ 
218b2(mdo): khyer ram grong rdal la lang myi 'am/ rkang bzhi pa dag na 'am/ tus ma yin par 'chi ba 'am/ gnod pa zhige byung na der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam mchod pa'i yo byad rgya cher sbyar te gzhag la shin
218b3(mdo): tu zhus byas shing lus rab tu byugs te/ kos sar pa bgos nas tshangs par spyad de/ seng ge'i khri'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor pa/ dI sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor pa la budugs
218b4(mdo): der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam klags nakader nad dang dus mo yin pa 'che ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// dpe 'jigs shang spu zing zhes byed pa dang / ltas ngan pa zas
218b5(mdo): cad myed par 'gyur ro// bud myed gang la la bu 'dod na der khrus byas te gos gsar ba bgos la tshangs par spyad de/ me tog dang / 2phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pas glegs bam de mchod la bdag
218b6(mdo): nyid kyang stan me tog gos gtod pa/ tri sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ra bri ba sna tshogs kyis bsko ba la 'dug nas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di klags na/ de lta bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bla na byed pa'i yongs su
218b7(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar tu sems can yongs su smind par bya ba'i phyir rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de nyid de'i bud myed du gyur pa'i mtha ma yin no// che zhe rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di las tha na tshigs su
218b8(mdo): bcad pa gcig tsam gapal la'i rna lam du grags na/ tha na bya dang ri dgas dang / gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag
219a1(mdo): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyis zhabs g.yas pa'i the gos la reg par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas kyang de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po rnam pa/ 
219a2(mdo): sarbA drug tu g.yos par byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu dag gi lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / 
219a3(mdo): sha za dang / grul bum dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa grangs myed dpag tu myed pa rnams shi nad tu skrag pa skyes par gyur da to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched 'di thams cad kyang snang bas rgya cher khyab par gyur da te/ la
219a4(mdo): mthil ltar mnyam par 'dug cing / de'i tshe na ri dang / shing dang tshig pa dang / ring ba dang / 'khor yuka dang / 'khor sug chen po yang myi sdang bar gyurd to// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin de dag kyangs/ 
219a5(mdo): gsos pa dang / snang ba des skrag pa skyes par gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / de dag thams cad kyis mda' rgyang gang tsam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub
219a6(mdo): pa mthong nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyurd te/ thal mo sbyard nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pa des 'di skad ces bka' sachal da to// 
219a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i lethe bos la reg pa na yang 'di bzhin du de'i tshe sa g.yas par gyur da/ de'i tshe 'di bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di / 
219a8(mdo): lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par 'dug/ 'di bzhin du snang ba dang sa gsos pas skrag pa skyes te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin thams cad phyogs bzhir lta zhing mda' rkyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi
219b1(mdo): spos snang dpal de mthong nas thal mo sbyar da te/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des rin po tog gi gzungs 'di gsungs so// 'di lta ste// dza lo ke dza lo ka ma ke
219b2(mdo): dza li dzi ya/ dza khai ni/ dza la pra te/ dzA hi li pa ra pu ru/ Sha lag Sha Na sa mA du h+ya/ a ma mI/ a ma me/ ba ma mI/ ba ma mI/ na ba swe/ ma ha mA/ dza ha me dza ha me/ kha ba ra me/ ba ra me / ba pa be/ ba ba
219b3(mdo): ba ga le/ bang ga be/ yang be/ bA ra ba ra She/ dz+wal me ge/ ba ma la/ a la la ti li/ dzin tu ldo/ dzin tu le/ dan tu mu le/ bkam pa dang / side b+ha pra te/ nan ti la dan ti na dA ya/ su bya bi he Sha/ tsan tra la
219b4(mdo): tsaka shu d+yo ta sha ba hi Sha/ sa pa k+ka ya s+t+ri tA su ra bi ha Sha/ dza kha ka/ dza kha ka/ su ra kha ka/ ba ha ma/ a mri kha/ a mri Sha/ das mr-i Sha/ a mri Sha/ a mri kha/ a sr-i Sha/ a mri kha/ sa mr-i/ 
219b5(mdo): mriSha/ mri kha/ mr-i kha/ bya ba tshe/ kar ma/ 'du ne tu ne/ ud pa da bya sa tshed gnya na kri ta/ a nud pA ta/ kha ka ne ru ka ang ku le/ b+ha pu le/ bi bi ku le/ ku la ha/ Ani tra pa ri/ 
219b6(mdo): ba ha/ bya ba tse da kar d+ha/ tsa pra ti/ a mo ha/ dar sha ne/ pa ri brta g+haH/ kha sa ma kri/ ma t+yo ti/ kha ka dza hi/ ma ha t+yo ti/ nik+ki/ b+hi ra sa/ b+hi ra sa/ b+hi ra dza/ ma tri kra ma g+hipa krI ba ma ha kr-i pa/ !
219b7(mdo): le hi hi le/ a ru na pa te sa ma sa na kai/ da ma/ dA na/ d+h+ya ni/ a pA ro mr-i s+ya/ pa la kun da sa pa e/ ni bA ta/ i ste b+ha b+ha/ kar ma k+ka sa/ pra nu g+ha la/ pu ru sha ta tam/ a sa ma sa ma/ sa ma
219b8(mdo): b+hi d+hi di nya na/ ta tha ga ta swa hA// de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang sa chen po g.yos so// bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag kyang rin po
220a1(mdo): che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan myi snang bar gyur da te/ pho mtshan skyes so// lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci dang
220a2(mdo): lho 'phye chen po dang / dgas dang / sha ba dang / grul bum dag gi bu ma grangs myed dpag tu byed pa rnams kyang rin po me tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan gyi sdang bar gyur da te/ po mtshan rgyas
220a3(mdo): nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur da te/ thams cad kyang ma 'ongs pa na bud myed kyi dngos po tha za par 'gyur ba li las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang nas
220a4(mdo): bud myed de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs dpa shag kya thub pa de la phyag da po 'di skad ces gsol dra to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
220a5(mdo): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ngo mtshar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal mo/ thugs rje chen po gang gis bdag cag da ltar bud myed kyi da sa po mye gdal bar gyur do cing rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa la skyes
220a6(mdo): pa'i dngos por gyur da pa'i sngon 'byung ba 'di rgya cher bshad du gsol// de lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang / cho 'phrul dang / skyo bas bdag cag bla na myod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom
220a7(mdo): ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'di lha dang myi dpag tu myed pa rnams dbang tu 'gyur bar bshad du gsol// de bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas sngon 'byung ba 'di bshad pa/ bzhin bzangs dag/ 
220a8(mdo): gang go tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i zad nas rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong gya btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes bud myed brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas pas rin po che tog gi gzung dathos te/ thos ma thag tu
220b1(mdo): btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes dang / bud byed brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mo mtshan myi snang bar gyur da te/ pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas myi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dag rin po che tog gi
220b2(mdo): gzungs 'di thos ma zag tu bud myed kyi dbang po mya snang bar gyur da nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po skyes te/ bud myed de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bud myed kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus /
