243b5(mdo): ga 'tshal ba'i// skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags// 'jig rten na ni nam shes 'dis// sems can rnams ni pha rold 'drend// com ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa// kun tu rtog pa'i gyod yul
243b6(mdo): na// kyis bkang la lags lug pa// den gyis pa'i mongs pa ste// sems la gnas gang rims nad panas// phyi dang sbrul dbum pa la dang // srog chags gzhan yang nam yang po// rkang sa rgyal la gang skyes pa// de/ 
243b7(mdo): tan rdzu khru dang / byad kyis ni// sa dan ga ban/ da kyi dro// dan pa drang spong nams la dag/ 
244a1(mdo): gsu dang dbyangs dag 'byind pa ni// tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gdal// pyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni// sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra// thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs// 'di sngar ma mthong ma yos
244a2(mdo): khyod kyi spyo gang de'i sla/ khyod kyi gdu tshus kyi lags gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la dpa// par sa tshu sa myi shes shig// mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sug brdal kun kyis bas
244a3(mdo): de ni tha dad pa'i snod ma yin// pha rol phyind drug pa'i nus// bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan// yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing // dbang po drug ni rnam khar bshig/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga'i pyod pa rnam
244a4(mdo): thar gsum// byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa// de che nga ni rab tu bya // mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmyigs// mtshan ma myed par ba tu bsgoms// sems can myed cing srog myed pa// bdag myed stong
244a5(mdo): par mngon sangs rgyas// tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum// stong pa nyid du rnam par sgoms// nga ni ye shes pa rol song // ra'i tshig 'di mtshungs pa myed// gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par// byang
244a6(mdo): drub byer ni sem mo bskyed pa// de dag patha~Md mas sun sum tshogs// ya zhes 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur// chos rnams la ni gyi'i thug cing // rnam par sbyind pa 'dod byed la// de bzhin nyid las 'ag gyi byed// 
244a7(mdo): de dag byang chub rnyed myi dka'// chos rnams la ni myi gnas shing // pha rol tshu rol myi rtend par// yang dag mtha' ni 'dir bsgoms na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshan nyid myed cing mtshan ma'ang myed// dmyigs
244a8(mdo): dag ni rnam par spangs// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la// rang gi sems la the tsom spangs// nam mkha 'dral bar shes nas su// nga 'dra sangs
244b1(mdo): rgyal khyod 'acur byos// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di da ga gsungs la lag tu// de nas drang srong skam sa la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
244b2(mdo): gzugs dang / gas dang khyod lam tu zhugs par mthong nas/ sdod kyi dge ba'i ma ba rnams mngon du gyur to// de nas drang srong skang sa la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya
244b3(mdo): man gyi rtse ma bzhin tu 'dug nas/ ga ting ba 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pamyed de// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin da rin po me tog ces
244b4(mdo): bya ba thob bo// de nas drang srong skar ma la dka' bas/ bcom lda na 'das kyi s+yan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis la me to gzogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
244b5(mdo): gis mngon par bstod do// yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten 'gon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa// khyod kyi ye shes rgyan gyi 'od gzer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang 'amadzad// rtag tu sems
244b6(mdo): can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa// sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal// gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od gzer rnams kyis bsil 'gyur
244b7(mdo): ba'i// yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyurd/ pha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyu
244b8(mdo): ni de ring mabar da byind to// sman da pa chen po sems can snying po mochen rnams kyis ni rab brgyan da pa// sems can snying 'o sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol// bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mdzor
245a1(mdo): bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bskal par bgyi// ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba myi'i dam pa lung bstan gsol// sdug bsngal chu bos 'das pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtshol las bskal bar bgyil/ 
245a2(mdo): mya ngan 'das pa'i bdel ba zag pa myed pa'i lam la bkod par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ de dag bdag gis dbang du gsold te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol
245a3(mdo): bgyil// drag cing byi ba zad chub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun// dus gsum du ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
245a4(mdo): de ring zhi bar gyur da cig sems can kun// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog/ sems can thams cad nad zhing gyurd cig nyon mongs chu yang skam par shog/ ngo bo nyid
245a5(mdo): kyis ye shes dbang po snying po ldan pa thob gyurd cig/ sems can gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gces pa na mas// de dag bdag gis bsod nams gzi'i brjid dag gis
245a6(mdo): su du tha dpa shog/ sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad pob sku rad cig/ shes rab bsod nams chad byed pa dang bdel ba kun gyis tshim par shog/ de dag ldog pa rnam spangs lta ba mnyam
245a7(mdo): bar myur du sten kyur da cig/ sems can thams cad skye badran zhing chos la spyod pa nyid du zhog// sems can de kun chos grus srid po'i rgya mtsho ba rol rgal gyur da cig/ thams cad chos kyi ma rol phyin pa sangs
245a8(mdo): rgyas su yang grub ming shog/ bskal pa dpag tu byed par chos kyi char pa 'bebs shing 'dug 'gyur da cig/ sems cad thams cad chos kyi sprin gyis chus legs par 'khrub pa shog// bdag kim lus dang ngag da
245b1(mdo): yid kyis nongs po ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags// bdag kyang phyi nad cad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams dpyod par ma gyur da cig/ rtag tu mdun na bas
245b2(mdo): gyis kyi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog/ bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ji mchis deng de byang chub bsngo ba bgyis// sems can ched du dpyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems can thams/ 
245b3(mdo): cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzhud par bgyi// bskal par zhi dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi// gang du byang chub reg 'gyur zhing yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag
245b4(mdo): cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog// smra ba'i seng ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog/ 'dren pa chags myed ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstand gsol
245b5(mdo): 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ me tog sil ma gtong ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog/ lha klu dang gnod sbyin myi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dbang kyis shig// 
245b6(mdo): sa rnams gso bar byed cing khyod kyi zhapas la mig zas phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skang sa la dga' bas me tog de dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga li ba de'i skang logs su gto pa dang // me tog de dag thams
245b7(mdo): cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng du gdugs cig tu gyur da nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas/ rab tu zang zir myed cing mchog tu dga' ba dang yid 'dems tshim par gyur te/ de nas bum mo
246a1(mdo): gsum gyi stong chen po la'i jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dga'/ deng lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang yid skyo zhing ltad
246a2(mdo): bor gyur da to// gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni/ bdel bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas/ yid dga' bar gyurd cing drang srong chen pos me tog gtor ba de dag/ steng gi bar
246a3(mdo): snga ba la gdugs su gyur te/ gnas pa dang sa g.yos pa de yang mthong nas/ rab tu ngo mtsha rab tu gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems
246a4(mdo): cad de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ma byad du mthong nas ngo mtsha rang du gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / 
246a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis/ ting nge 'dzi nad de las bzhengs pa mthong nas/ zang zing myed cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / 
246a6(mdo): 'greng ba dang byug pa dang / na bzal dang / byang phrul dang / rgyam ji snyed pa de dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa la to// drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon// 
246a7(mdo): byang chub lung bstan da zhes ni 'dren pa gsung // mnyam pa skyed pa'i mthus nis g.yos shig// nam mkhal la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug/ byed ni 'jig rten pan byeng ston dbang po// rkang gnyis dag gi gso bo mas
246a8(mdo): rgyas su// bas nams mtha' yas nas mkha' chad mnyam la// khams gsum snying por 'gro ba'i smon mar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa skangs la dga' las/ bcom ldan 'das la
246b1(mdo): 'di skad ces gso lad to// gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mi 'dra bar 'gyur // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs myed pa na ga byang phyogs su
246b2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar 'jig rtend kyi 'khams bdel ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes
246b3(mdo): bu dam pa khyodabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdel bar
246b4(mdo): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul myed spos skar mo'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur date/ 
246b5(mdo): khyed kyi che'i chad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas myed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig gi gnas su gyur te/ 
246b6(mdo): khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtus lan shig gis ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dza snyed lhags pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// skangs la dga' ba'i lung bstan pa de thos nas/ bcom
246b7(mdo): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson par gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
246b8(mdo): sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ byang chub kyi sems kyi brjid pa zhes bya ba bam// 
247a1(mdo): 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las drang srong ska ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bo zhi ba'o// / de nas bdud bye ba dga'ang
247a2(mdo): snyam chu sems te/ ji ltang gro ba khyer 'dir phyi'om/ gdang klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyadad pa de bzhin du / bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i / sgo gang nas gshegs pa de'i zhosgo dang / 
247a3(mdo): gang dmis phyogs bkod pa'i rkyen dam pa/ khyad bar du 'phags pas brgyan tosnyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa kun tu mkhyend nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i
247a4(mdo): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba// mngon par 'du mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i ts+tsha 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi
247a5(mdo): sgo re re nas/ rgyal po'i kheb kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// / bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkhal la gnas bzhin du/ bdud rtsi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i rkyen shi nad tu khyad par du 'phags pa rtsu
247a6(mdo): 'phrul grangs myed pa dang ldan pa bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis// grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa phyogs de dag dang / tshig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgya nad to/ 
247a7(mdo): bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag/ la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas/ drang srong chen po'i tshe byad lta bur bsgyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / 
247a8(mdo): babs dang / ba ga ma dang / bskyed shing gi nang du me tog dang / spos dang / gtug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gse dang / drangul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang
247b1(mdo): ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhal lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan dang / bkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol nas/ bstod pa dang yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyi sa bcom ldan 'das
247b2(mdo): la mchod pa byed do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po/ sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgon bzhugs te/ 
247b3(mdo): zhabs g.yas pa'i ma be bos sgo'i thim ba la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i thim pa de la reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pol 'jig rten gyi 'am
247b4(mdo): 'di rab tu g.yos so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig na gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha
247b5(mdo): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang ka lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho' chen po dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang
247b6(mdo): yul 'khor gyi rta dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i'i 'od dang / 'on byin gyi bar nas bzung ste/ sems can ga'i brjid che ba/ gzi'i brjid che ba de dag thams cad
247b7(mdo): sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang nam mkhal la gnas shing / me tog dang / spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis/ bcom
247b8(mdo): ldan 'das la gterd te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs cha re re na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul 'phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
248a1(mdo): pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / myi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti po stang bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' la gtor dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang phye ma
248a2(mdo): dang / rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos// byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod// khyed kyis 'khor ba'i cor rong 'khyams pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dag ni
248a3(mdo): bskal bar byos ka/ yongs su smi nind dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis// g.yeng bar gyur da pa dag ni myur thong la// 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byas// byang chub lung bstand rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po
248a4(mdo): mya ngan myed// 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs// bdud ste/ dbye ba rang gis 'pham mdzad de// de ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dka' mchog
248a5(mdo): dngos po yang dag ston pa mdzad// 'gro ba sdug bsngal dag las zar da mdzad nas/ byang chub tu ni de ring lung snyon de// rang byung myang na myed pa'i grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu myur sheg la/ 
248a6(mdo): de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab ltos te// rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos// yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag 'jog
248a7(mdo): la gnas pa/ de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kheb kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na/ 'dul ba la bzhes shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
248a8(mdo): po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lham sogs su 'khod pa dang / bkod pa men po de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas me tog dang / phye ma'i rkyen de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i nA ka
248b1(mdo): byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / stong pa dang / myi stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi/ rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na
248b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos gang dag gnas pa de dag gis// sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta
248b3(mdo): bu ga tshis par byed pa 'di lta bu kaspro bar byed pa 'di lta bu/ yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i/ sgra 'di dang / me tog dang / phye ma'i cha ba 'di yang ga las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
248b4(mdo): dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyi ges btang ste/ ngo mtsharam cher 'dzind par gyur to// de nas bco ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
248b5(mdo): rgyan dang / lba ba lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa' zhes bya ba'i ting pe 'janid la snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs
248b6(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dug/ bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu 'od snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing / rdul bcags myed
248b7(mdo): ces bya ba yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa chen po 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig pa myed la legs par brgyadad pa'i/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi dul snyed
248b8(mdo): thams cad du ya // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kyi thub pa rgyal po'i khab kyi gro khyeram chen po'i sgon// shinan tu lum me lhan ni lhang der bzhugs par snang lan ma gtogs ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rje
249a1(mdo): ngag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag smra thos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed 'di he cang snga
249a2(mdo): phyiring ba na 'dug par mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis lha rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyud de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam
249a3(mdo): du sems te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la yang blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang / 
249a4(mdo): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dong ngo // der ni bdag cag bla na myed pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ lung bstand pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ ram chag snyam mo// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
249a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mjus rang
249a6(mdo): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas kyi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig zang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed 'di'i byin to// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249a7(mdo): chen po grangs myed dpag tu skyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma us par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems
249a8(mdo): dpa' mas dpa' chen thaM di dag dang / byang chub mams dpa'i dge ba'i sal ga rdzogs kyi chumathun pa das ra 'phrul ba'i byed kyi kyis kyis de bdid ga shegs pashag tu phu la lasachod bya byor rtson 'a gyur to// 
249b1(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khyebs par byas so// la la dag gis ni mu
249b2(mdo): tig gi char phab nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni gser dang / dungul dang / bye du rgya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / go sha sha dang / tsan dan sprul
249b3(mdo): gyi snying po dang / shi ta ma la'i la mo'i phye ma'i cher gyis nam mkha' khyabs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni lbab lbub dang / byang phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras brtsa po
249b4(mdo): bu sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dgags ni rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan sna tshogs bsgreng ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mchod
249b5(mdo): ba bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni sacos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so// / la la dag gis ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyis gtor da to// la la dag gis ni sil snyen dang dkrol ba sna tshogs kyis
249b6(mdo): bkral to// la la dag gis ni klu dang gang dang rol mo'i spyi rag tu bstand to// la la dag gis nis phyogs deng spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag cag 'debs so// yal dag gis ni rin po che'i sngon sna tshogs rnams
249b7(mdo): dab rtsenatshogs kyis bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ldan chags so// la la drag gis ni 'on ma che'i snod ma tshogs rnams su po zhum bkang ste/ me tog dang 'bras bu dpa lo mos brgyan nas/ bcom ldan
249b8(mdo): sa kyi byed ldad thegs pa// yal dag gis na pa po mig ldan pa datshogs gzig pa dang / rgya dang / btag dang / bras can rdzogs kyis brgyad nam la rjod da sogs so// ma la dag
250a1(mdo): nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par skul da te/ thal mo sbyard nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'khod pa nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no// 
250a2(mdo): la dag ni bdag nyid seng ge'i cha byad du mngon par srul da te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu' dang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas/ sems can
250a3(mdo): de dag phan tshun myig gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la zags thogs myed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po lha rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang ka rang gi dran
250a4(mdo): nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang / ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yul gyi
250a5(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi gro khyer chen por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na pad mo yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te/ byod nas phyag g.yas
250a6(mdo): ba'i mthil gyis pad ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de/ drangs nas bzhugs so// pad ma de drangs te// g.yos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhingab 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri kho yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ma ris dang / rgya mtsho la
250a7(mdo): chen po dang / gud kyi gnas thams cad kyang gsas so// tsun kyi gnas thams cad dgazhal byed khang dang / gnas dang / mal dang / smad rnams kyang ragatugamapa mo// dadagang lus kyi zhurnams dang / da kyi
250a8(mdo): su mo rnams dang / bdud kyi tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad ces 'dzerd to// rgyu myed rkyen myed par ni gzhal byed khang 'di dag na mo'i bar myi 'thung na/ bdan/ 
250b1(mdo): cag gi rgyal po bdud de/ rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur da grang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar myi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mtho
250b2(mdo): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur nas/ 'di sus legs par brgyand cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo// de nas rang gi yul na gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas
250b3(mdo): pa de dag de na 'khod bzhin du/ yang de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyand cing / shind tu lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ngo // thams cad
250b4(mdo): dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po la'i'ajig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gyi gzug sa dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas
250b5(mdo): ba sha stag gis yongs su gang bas sems can gcig kyang ngo mya shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ brtson par mthong ngo // de nas de dag yang 'de
250b6(mdo): snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / da ltar bdag cag gi jo bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa gar 'dong pa la yang dri ba'i phyir/ depe 'dod gor ma chag
250b7(mdo): snyam so// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ga la ba deng dong ste/ lhags nas s+yan
250b8(mdo): sA mi la 'dod// de nas badrud sdig can phyim bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo spyad da pa btud nas 'di skad ces gsoyod to// rab tu rnam par dang sems kyis// bcom ldan 'dan ni skyabs su ma na/ 
251a1(mdo): bdag khrol 'di nas myur du mchil// chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang // ngas ni su yang bzlog pa myed// gal te lam ni
251a2(mdo): rab shes na kar du dga' bar 'gro bar byom ga ga bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gso la to// rang gi spyod yul gang dga' bang // gang che bdag ni mchil 'tshal che / bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis// bcings
251a3(mdo): par mthong kony+tsa ta ma // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la dang/ nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te// grol nas 'gro ba sgrol byed pa// ngas ni 'che ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings pa za da par byas// de nas
251a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhib 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i se mas can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas/ tshigs
251a5(mdo): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa lad to// 'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang // the tsom thams cad rab spongs la// skad cig ci ya nga ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams ni de nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs
251a6(mdo): byas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon// dad cing mos par 'byor pa dang // byang chub khyod bzhind tu dkon// 'jig rten mgon po'i mngon gsum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon / ka gang du
251a7(mdo): bzed pa snyen byed pa// de'i'adris ni rnyed par dkal// gang du 'jig rten sdig pa'i// rtog pa thams cad rang spong ba// stong pa nyid ni rnam pa dang // mams ni la par byed pa dag na// ji sarangs sngon spyad pa'i// byang chub
251a8(mdo): khyod pa rnyed pa dga'// de las ma tog tsam chod 'di// khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byo byed pa// srid pa'i ba ma par bkrol zhing // mun pa'i phung po mil ba'i// las gyi mchog ni bstan
251b1(mdo): bar bya// dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la// ston pas gsungs pa 'dir nyon cig// chu bo rnams kyi pha rol da rgol// rgya mtshol can gyi sred pa spongs// rnam thar da gsum la rab gnas shing // sdom pa gsum la yA/ 
251b2(mdo): dag gnas// khams gsum gyini nyon mongs gang // de dag ma lus rnam par chom// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang // chos kyi don tu khye cag rnams// sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi// byin rlabs sprul
251b3(mdo): bas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems// bye brag tu ni rab tu spongs// khams gsum pa las grol ba'i// zhi byed bzod pa thob par byos// byin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis// so so'i skye bo bslad
251b4(mdo): ba rnamasaka/ dngos po myed la rtog byed pa// de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin// myig ni gzugs la chags pa'i// lus dang ngag dang se mas bsgribs nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams/ 
251b5(mdo): 'khor ba shi nad tu bstend par 'gyur// 'jig rten na ni gar mkhas gsal// bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag phyind ci log bzhi las/ de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag
251b6(mdo): sems can rnams tshu za bzhi las pa dad par byed// 'chi bo skye bar ba shes la// des pa rnams ni pa 'i lad 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs myed pa// rkang bzhi ba dang ldan pa dag/ sems can srid pas bcings
251b7(mdo): ba rnams// yang dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa las grol zag pa skyed// yang dang yang du gyi skye ste// sring ba'i rgya mtsho la ro la phyinid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar
251b8(mdo): khyed// sdig pa dag ni myur du shogs// sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la// 'jigs pa myed par pha rol song // srid par yang dang yang skyes par// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni/ 
252a1(mdo): 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i klogs sa spangs te// sdig pa'i lta ba nam thong nas// 'khong ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te// dam pa'i don la rab sbya bag// btung ba'i
252a2(mdo): ba 'thung bar byo'o// stong pa nyid kyang rubya sgoms shig/ dam pa'i don la dngos myed pas// rdzas kyang byed cing mtshan nyid byed// 'di snyer dbang po drug stong ste// byed pa 'o ma 'di la byed// de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang
252a3(mdo): dngos po tsam ste g.yol ba myed// tshong ba drug dang sred pa drug/ reg padrug las byung ba yin// de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong pa yi par shes par byos// rang bzhin gyis ni dngos myed par/ ka dngos po nyid
252a4(mdo): la brtag par byos// skye ba myed cing 'gag myed pas// 'don rdzas kyang myed pa bltos// gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste// dus gsum du yang dngos myed par// shes pa de dag nad myed de// de ni tha
252a5(mdo): na myed pa'i lam// rnam pa bcu gsum nyes grol la// sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // chu rol pha rol rnam grol ba// de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngo
252a6(mdo): rnams kyi stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa myed pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
252a7(mdo): kang stong pa dang / myi stong pa dang / snyigs ma lnga can/ gang ka'i klung dpag tu myed pa myi 'khrugs kha'i bye ma snyed rnam su dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi
252a8(mdo): 'a'i ba re nas kyang / sems can gyib khrag khrig 'argya stong grangs skyed dpag tu byed pa dag ni ga ni tu yang mir byed pa'i dga' ba dang dad pa rnyed de/ bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir phyi ldog pa su da ton/ 
252b1(mdo): la la dag gis ni ting nge 'a'adid dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang tshig dang yi ge 'di dag
252b2(mdo): thos nas phyir myi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sems can grangs myed dpag tu byed la dag ni theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar
252b3(mdo): thal dka' bas pad ma'i khri la 'jig par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun g.yogs pa mngon par skul te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
252b4(mdo): su thal mo sbyadad te 'dud nas 'di skad ces gso la to// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rga shi mya ngan gyi 'das tu bying ba'i 'jig rten sems cad la// rab tu gzigs te mya rgyu chur bcas kyi// 'jig rten
252b5(mdo): d+ha ni chos kyi zam pa thogs// thal mo sbya da pa'i sems can rgyan rgyas// rab tu bltam pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su// chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgol bar gsol// rang gi mthu tha la rnam par
252b6(mdo): bsta nad du gsol// mtshungs pa myed pa pad ma mngon 'jigs te/ mgon po shes rab dang ni thibs rnams kyis/ chos chu srin gyi cheng ba rab phob la// nyon mongs gzi rad pa'i myi la bstand tu gsol/ 
252b7(mdo): phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi dbang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis// thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams 'pham par mdzod// chos rnams stong pa nam ma'
252b8(mdo): lta bu dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma R+Yar mkhyen nas// sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mjedzod la// bla myed 'khor lo dam pa bskor d+ha gsol// chu bo bzhi dbus 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// myi'i seng ge de ring
253a1(mdo): bskal du gsol// khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu thugs su chud// srid gsum mtshol las 'jig rten bskal du gsol// shi nad tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bdel bar gshegs
253a2(mdo): bo'i lam ni bdel ba la// 'gro ba gzud mdzad mtshungs myed chos kyang stond// 'jig rten nyes pa'i dri me bsal tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur spruld pa'i thim smras de las pad ma'i khri la
253a3(mdo): mngon par 'jigs te// pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas/ bdud sdig can la bka' stsa la pa// bdud sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen
253a4(mdo): kyis deng 'ding 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis rtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par
253a5(mdo): tha rad bar 'gyur/ chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te 'di la sdig can khyod ni sems
253a6(mdo): can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyis khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can khyod kyis phal chos bshad par gsol da cig dang / ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul
253a7(mdo): kyi chu bo'i pha rold tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad la 'di smras so// ji ste sdig myed khyod la za ba zhe sdang rgyags myed na// ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya
253a8(mdo): bya'i chos kyang ston do// de tshe khyod la za brgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni// nub dbang khyod kyi mi rad pa ci 'dra bdag la 'dir shod cig// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dab// nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur/ 
253b1(mdo): gnas pa// de na yang ni bdud khyod pa la bsad par rab tu sbyar // de tshe la khon dang 'thab pa cung zad tsam yang myed// nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus myed pa yin// pa ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yung g.yos/ 
253b2(mdo): bar byas// ra bsad phyir ni rdo ba'i char ba rab tu dbab par byas// de na khyod kyis nga'i me'i nu zho myur skams byas// khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma ci ma byas// nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud myed khrid de 'ongs
253b3(mdo): nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod che zas kyang bcad pa byas// khyod kyis rtag tu phal rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs// nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par 'gyur// de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis gong
253b4(mdo): khyer kun tu bskor// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song che rdza cher drag po rab tu phab// sa ni 'dom do 'phang tsam rdzob dag gis gang bar byas// zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phung // nga ni shi nad tu
253b5(mdo): dka' ba s+yapyod che grang ba'i rlung dang ni// 'bab tshwa 'gram na gnas tshe khyo da kyis chu bo rab tu btang // da ni bsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang // de tshe khyod kyis nga'i zas la trag po'i tig kyang btab/ 
253b6(mdo): ngani byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na// rdo rje dang ni gnam lugs su gri mda' char khyod kyis phab// 'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i bdan la mngon par gnas pa na// khyod kyis rung spyig gos kyang 'jim rdza ba dang / 
253b7(mdo): gis rab tu 'asdus// de na yang ni gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams kye ste// rabs dpyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs yod kyi// 'on kyang khyod kyis nga'i spu gcig la ni gnod byas cung zad byed// ngas ni khyod 'dul
253b8(mdo): nas su byang chubs rgyangs pa myed 'thob// 'on kyang ngorba bar te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang sla'as// sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog las sogs pa bzlog byas te// khyod kyis sems can gyib dums cung byas na
254a1(mdo): snying rje bor te 'dir yang phal rgol zhing rgyu byed dam// nga yis zas ma zos pa de'i tshe yang khyod kyis su// pabasad phyir ni klang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang // sa steng nga la lha sbyin gyis mardo ba 'phangs/ 
254a2(mdo): ba dang // kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang // phyang ka btang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang // me 'dag 'bar ba myi 'azad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang // kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang / 
254a3(mdo): spyadad pa'i// de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtse bar nges pa yin// khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su// ra bsad phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gyi mda' mang thogs// 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis
254a4(mdo): nga'i spyi gcig ma g.yos na// ji phyir khyod na rgyags par gyur da nas 'a da dung 'di ni 'dug/ ji ste bdud bzhi bye ba stong phrag rgol du ya nga btsud kyang // sems can khrag khrag dag ni 'di ru yang dag lhags
254a5(mdo): nas su// zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa ra'i dbang yin te// nga ni khyod phyira'i mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya// nga ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa// khyod ni shin tu rdum
254a6(mdo): po pa la rtag tu brtsegs byed de// thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga'i dbang yin pas// da lta tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya// rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don kyang bapyad par bya/ 
254a7(mdo): smras par gyur da kyang bzod pa yongs su btang bar myi bya'o// pal pra dog tha ba rab tu khro ba'i yid myed de// khyod ni rjes su gzung phyi nga nyid rtag tu mngon par bson// ngal gsol btang khyod yid ni phyi 'i 'jig rten gsum
254a8(mdo): dag tu// mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud ci bshad par bya// dpyis khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams myed pa ma pa 'thu gyis// 'jig rten mgon song la yid ni myur du dad par byos// khyod na nyig tu 'di na gnon / 
254b1(mdo): byayang rab sems kyang / kya bram gyi ning nga ga tu rtsams par ban+d+ha dang // sdig pa'i thogs 'ong la dang bcas 'dis bya ba shig dang // rangab rgya gas khyod na bying chub tu yang 'ju bstan to// de nas yang
254b2(mdo): bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la rab tu thos te 'khrugs shing rngas nas de nas slang 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi mi gul pa bcing ba lngas lacings pa snyam d+ha shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra byung bar 'dod kyang // de nas
254b3(mdo): dus nas bcom ldan 'das 'grongs pa'i phyi zlab pa'i mthus shin tu ba'i 'dugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shining su mi du 'ong ba'i matog du mngon par sprumed te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
254b4(mdo): zhi thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shi 'i la gnas te/ chos kyang ston dpa de dag thams cad kyi dbug/ tsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar snga nga la shini da tu'i da du'ang
254b5(mdo): ba'i gdugs su byin gyis 'drabs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'a'od pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ 
254b6(mdo): me tog gi gtugs 'di dag ga las mchis/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams
254b7(mdo): gyi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ rab tu nyon mongs lacan snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
254b8(mdo): kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos stond to// de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'jo/ 
255a1(mdo): par byed pa/ stobs dang myi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma ring du gnas par
255a2(mdo): byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa/ dgra dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad shi nad tu char gcod par byed pa/ ngo mtshar dang bkra myi shes pa dang
255a3(mdo): smod pa dang rmyi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / mu gye dang 'jigs pa'i tshogs 'thab pa dang / 'byed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'thab mo dang thod pa dang / char myi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par grang zhing tsha ba dang
255a4(mdo): rlung dang tsha ba dang / nad dang / sgra myi snyan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa thams he cad 'dun par byed pa / rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gug
255a5(mdo): rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang po rab tu stond pa khyim dang grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul
255a6(mdo): dang / zo brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin par dang mtshan mo dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba byed dang / dus dpalo thams cad 'thun par byed pa/ lo tog dang
255a7(mdo): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman thams cad grub par byed pa/ bzo dang las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / dgom pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes la
255a8(mdo): thams cad sa rgyan pa byed pa/ rigs pa dang dran pa dang / thagros dang / mam pa dang / dpa' ba dang / sbyin pa dang/ med pa dang / mchis pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ tsham sems cad la sgrib byed pa'i
255b1(mdo): snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa// 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen po stond pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po rnams dbugs
255b2(mdo): 'byind pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'dzud par byed pa dang / myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ khong du chud bar byed pa/ dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / 
255b3(mdo): byang chub la 'jog par byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzind pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor pa/ sems can/ thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dzud
255b4(mdo): pabla na myed pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can rnams che ma par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su
255b5(mdo): rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu tha dad par byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la brten pa'i
255b6(mdo): chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstan dpa 'chad par bzhed do// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
255b7(mdo): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos/ lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa gsungs
255b8(mdo): lo// khyin kyis 'arlabs so// gcig sa gcig rjes su dgos so// da lta phyogs bcul na de lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas
256a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam po nyid rdo rje lta bu brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstand pa gsung ngo // 
256a2(mdo): byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gcig rjes su dges pa mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
256a3(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten da pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa'o zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung
256a4(mdo): bstand pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// ga cig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a5(mdo): dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la
256a6(mdo): brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstand pa gang dI'i ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa 'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang
256a7(mdo): ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes sdang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags// chom mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i
256a8(mdo): gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa// bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'jom par bgyid pa nas/ phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das
256b1(mdo): mgyis su gyur na mas 'dam pa'i macu phyi / skyel mang po sa smad pa dang / skub mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / rna mobs po me dang / gdang kyi rnams kyi de dang ldan
256b2(mdo): pa dang / dam pa'i rlung tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bsha tu gzol// den pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di snyed ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de kyang 'dzin
256b3(mdo): rten gyi khams myi mjed du / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub bag la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na
256b4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shinga'ichom lag na sa pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis bsko cing nyan zas kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du 'ad nas
256b5(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya rngub pa ga la ba zhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa
256b6(mdo): de dang lhan cig tu sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ngad bar spyod pa'i las las bzlog pa dang / bzang po'i myong rab tu thogs par bya ba dang / tha na myed pa'i mazhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'i phyir tshim mnyam
256b7(mdo): pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlon par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjes
256b8(mdo): su dges pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed du 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
257a1(mdo): gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten da pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / chag rab tu dbye ba pa la 'jug pa lung bstand pa 'odi bshad par
257a2(mdo): 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas
257a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chad myed grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod par bya ba dang / chos de yang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
257a4(mdo): dpa' thams cad dang / lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams da dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan dpar rgyud zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma
257a5(mdo): zos pa ltar 'dod pa de dang / de nyid lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa deng 'dong
257a6(mdo): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chang pa
257a7(mdo): dgal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyed bkur bgyi ga dang / mchod
257a8(mdo): ba dang / com ma nyad par jithog pa ldan/ de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu/ da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub ba kal pa/ 
257b1(mdo): de chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jos pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ de bdag cag gis dus/ 
257b2(mdo): gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad myed grangs myed pa zhig bzhugs shing 'chol la gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o// de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o// der
257b3(mdo): bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa bzhis/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed legs par brgya na pa de yang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom
257b4(mdo): ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas/ rang na nga gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
257b5(mdo): kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas da dgo skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tsom ma za shog/ de ltar nem chung ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
257b6(mdo): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa de ni mtha' yas so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa/ 
257b7(mdo): dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag par bzung ste/ sems can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa/ khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can de dag
257b8(mdo): gal te/ re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyurd du zind kyang / de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur da pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so// sems
258a1(mdo): can re me zhing yang yul gyi gnas sha skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag phan tshun du myig rgyang gis kyi slebs so// yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang par gyi
258a2(mdo): su mngon te rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra ba nyid de dag thams cad sa'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub
258a3(mdo): ba des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng du la'i khrims thams cad bzhag kyang / bri ba 'am gang bar myi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de ni thabs
258a4(mdo): mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang kang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des/ chu'i khams de thams cad smra
258a5(mdo): lirtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la/ skra'i rtse mo de gcig tu de bcug kya dra chu'i khams de cung zad kyang bri ba 'am gang par myi mngon no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni
258a6(mdo): me'i khams te / me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'asrung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad tshul phralab gcig gi nang du chud par dus la/ me'i khams de thams cad rdus phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas/ 
258a7(mdo): gni bu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang shung bad rlung gi khams su sdang ba'i rlung gi khams de dag thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub 'des su'i lung bu gcig tu 'dug
258a8(mdo): chus lag rlung gi khams de thams cad 'acu'i khung bu da gcig gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des ni/ gdubyags
258b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad lhan cig tu tshul cig gi steng du 'jog par nus te/ rdul cig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang rang ga
258b2(mdo): yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod kyang gnas shi nad tu yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa yang myed la/ rdul cig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba 'am gang bar yang myi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de ni
258b3(mdo): thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dAs gsum du rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa dang / nye bar le nad pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / tshig gi
258b4(mdo): lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi la sa kyi mtha'i bye ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / bachags da pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad
258b5(mdo): kyi mthu'i mu nas bzung ste/ d+has gsum du rtogs pa'i 'gro ba dru ga tu 'khor ba na/ srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang
258b6(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du rtogs pa'i skad cig zang gcig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i u'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad
258b7(mdo): kyi nus gsum cu phyogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs khyod dang/ kun spyod pa dang / bod pa dang / lug bsngal myong bar 'byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshogs lagag kya thub pa rnaMs rgad
258b8(mdo): cig la rab tu ma khyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thul pa danam tshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / mngon pa gas pa'o yi shes 'di lta bu dang ldan par myi rtog nas pa kyi tog sa yun gyis chus
259a1(mdo): dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su ma byed du/ rigs kyi 'u dag de bzhin gshegs bshag tu thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul la mkhas smra/ nyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su
259a2(mdo): su sbyind par byed pa'i thabs chad myed pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no// mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya
259a3(mdo): stong grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag/ smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha ra mad tu phyin par gyur to// / dus pa chen po rini po me tog gi gzungs las mtshan nyid kyi
259a4(mdo): lo'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang de'i tshe shang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'jug
259a5(mdo): ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu myed pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis
259a6(mdo): gshegs bar chas nas/ skad cig yud tsam la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byod te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
259a7(mdo): ba'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la bzhugs par gshegs nas/ pad ma'i bdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / rang gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ston
259a8(mdo): bskyed pas/ pad sa 'i sbyin dri lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khodado// de dag la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'azhugs shing 'tshol gzhes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed dpag tu myed pa
259b1(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang skad cig yud tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byond to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b2(mdo): dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de ka
259b3(mdo): la bzhugs par byonod to// byon nas kyang pad ma'i bdan ji lta bu thung ba rnams la bzhugs so// yang de'i che na/ lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog ces bya ba byon nas/ pad ma'i
259b4(mdo): snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyo/ sa logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rda smra zhes bya ba byon nas// pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe nu phyogs
259b5(mdo): logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba
259b6(mdo): byon nas/ pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zerd ces bya ba byon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig
259b7(mdo): brgya stong grangs myed dpag tu myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul snyed dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de nas gshegs bar chas
259b8(mdo): pa dang / sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa
260a1(mdo): der gshegs nas/ pad ma'i bdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod nams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi
260a2(mdo): byin gyi rlabs kyis/ pad ma'i stan skul pa rnams la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu' nas 'dus pa de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i
260a3(mdo): phyi la la dag gis ni 'dzam bu chu bo'o gser gyi char phab bo// gong du smos pa bzhin du sbyar te/ la la dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor ba byas so// la la dag gis ni chos nyan pas paskor nas
260a4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi s+yaspyan sngar thal mo sbyar da te la la dag ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing ga nas so// yang de'i tshe na rab 'byor de gzhon nur gyur pas/ thal
260a5(mdo): mo sbyar da te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthul dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// the tsom
260a6(mdo): thams cad gcod mdzad pa// thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs// sngon chad ma zos ma mthong ba'i// dge 'dun phun su tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul shugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis
260a7(mdo): rab gang bas// zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste/ 'di rnams kun gyis phyag byas so// gang na sems can smad pa'i// zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ldan 'dir// thub pa snang mdzad rgyu myed par// rdzogs pa'i sangs
260a8(mdo): rgyas deng byi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan mar bcad cing // nag po'i phyogs ni ra gzhom dang // s+yad pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// de 'don tu kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab tu dang byos la// bcud sde ras tu
260b1(mdo): 'joms pa'i// // chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byosapa/ nyon mongs thams cad zad bya
260b2(mdo): 'i phyir// gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos// ba dan rnams la ni bzhugs nas su/ bsrung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir// de bas thams cad mgrin gcig tu// 'dren pa rnams ni s+yaspyan drongs shig
260b3(mdo): dam chos yun ring gnas bya phyir// sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa// chos rnams thams cad sdud pa'i// gzungs ni gzhan gyis myi thub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob
260b4(mdo): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di sked ces gsold to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa da ma'i bdan 'di dag la bzhugs te/ deng thugs rje chen po dang
260b5(mdo): ldan pa rnams kyis/ byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgoms pa/ myi 'jigs pa'i rgyu mthun pa bshad pa/ chos mas cad sdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/ bdud kyi
260b6(mdo): yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan stsol ba/ chos kyi rgyal mchan baspong bam bgyi pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jom pa/ dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa/ the tsom las na
260b7(mdo): gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnas par ba dad par bgyid pa/ thams cad srung ba bla na byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad drad pa dang / Ta
260b8(mdo): gropa dang / rtags pa dang / mam pa gyi mdzad pa dang / gyod pathams cad kyi babs cad/ bzhes la mkhas pa/ bran tu rgod pa bathun su ma tshogs sa/ mas cad kyi kyi med dang byid kyi
261a1(mdo): ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzind pa'i bar gyi gzungs
261a2(mdo): 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa myi brjed
261a3(mdo): ba dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa dang / me tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzind pa dang / dran pa'i Ad tu gyur da ba dang / dpyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag lnga
261a4(mdo): thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa kyi gzungs 'di deng 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol da// chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas
261a5(mdo): pa dang // dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chab myi 'tshal ba dang bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstand pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang
261a6(mdo): de bzhin dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang snang ba dang / dmyigs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa dang / chu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang 'gro ba dang / gsol
261a7(mdo): ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad kyi skye ba dang / myi 'byung ba dang / myi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyed ma mchis pa dang / sa dang chu
261a8(mdo): dang / me dang rlung dang / nas mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshu rol gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gso
261b1(mdo): gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu myed pa dag la dkon mchog mngon gsum tu gyurd cig/ sems can rnams phan tshun du dge' ba'i bshes gnyen 'gyid cing / phan pa byed par gyur da
261b2(mdo): rig/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dag/ blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / phyi myi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur da cig/ sangs
261b3(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang / chos bstan pa'i phyir cang myi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas/ pad ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug
261b4(mdo): bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bas gas pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
261b5(mdo): mthong ma zag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rtogs pa'i sems can rnam sa kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags
261b6(mdo): ba dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tsho gas la lta ba dang / the tsom dang nye bar lend pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshes
261b7(mdo): ba'i spyaspyan sngan chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi 'di ni gzhan ni su yang myed do// bdag cig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos stond par bzhed do// 'din
261b8(mdo): gad bus kyang da ni gshegs pa sa mkhyen pa byi gas yod pam // rgyags par gyus de sa su'i sa rgyas kyi dus kyi mad mapa nyid jun pa nga 'dzi mi rnams zhugs so// 
262a1(mdo): yang de'i tshen gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad brtan da te/ thal mo spyad nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom
262a2(mdo): ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyi chos nan tan gyis
262a3(mdo): bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos/ gong du mchog tu khyad par du
262a4(mdo): gyurd pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin na gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rna mas la mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rtogs pa'i
262a5(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba de nga/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / ltab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis
262a6(mdo): brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dri ba'i phyir byond pa rnams
262a7(mdo): dgong su gsol ka bdag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pam sangs rgyas te ga sos can pas
262a8(mdo): ba nyams pa las rab tu stonod pa ma rig pa'i thun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog gnyen mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa// ngan mong gsum du zhugs pa/ myi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ mkhas pa rnams
262b1(mdo): da kyis yongs su spangs pa/ mtshams myed pa byed pa dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la bskur la 'debs pa// snying rje byed pa'i bsamaM pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad cu/ snying 'che ba dang brtson
262b2(mdo): 'grus kyi stobs kyi batshon pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ral ba dang / chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khoraru d+hu rkang gis 'gro
262b3(mdo): bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du// rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro myed pa shin tu smad pa myi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad dug sbom pa
262b4(mdo): thub pa/ reg na myi bde' ba/ sha na dang / shing bal dang / gsol ma'i/ ras dang / phyag dang khrod kyi goso bgol bar bgyi'o// r-i dang ri 'i sul dang / nags stug po dang / grong stong pa dang / dur khrod du nas
262b5(mdo): bar bgyi ba nas/ cha'i mal cha dang / gsol ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma dang / rtsub pa dri myi zhim pa/ reg na myi bde' ba'i mal cha pyad par 'gyi'o// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen
262b6(mdo): zho dang / brtson 'grus kyi go ma bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te / rgyal rigs nas la ni rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi gtam 'gyi'o// bram ze rnams la ni rigs byed dang skar ma'i
262b7(mdo): tam dang / blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha' nyim dang / sman pa rnams la ni khams dang ldan bsgrub pa'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni nyo tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon pa
262b8(mdo): na pa'i gtam dang / bud byed rnams la ni kha dog dang rgyan dang / bu dang phyug pa dang / 'gran zla myed pa'i ga ti dang / dge sbyong rnams la ni bzod pa dang des pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can
263a1(mdo): rnams yongs su sbyind par bgyi ba'i slad du// mthob pa khrob par bgyi ba dang / mngon gsum du ma bgyis pa mngon gsum du bgyi bar gzud do// ma tha da pa rnams rab tu tha mad par bgyi ba'i slad ku gasdug
263a2(mdo): bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongasu sbyin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag la gshe'o// myi snyan pa zer ro// phrag dog gi chos kyi
263a3(mdo): skyes bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis skyed pa la bskud pa 'des so// kha gas ga dang tshul 'chos pa dang / spu dang g.yo dang / bsnun smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud byed kyi tshig dag gis bskur ba 'debs so// bdag la sas
263a4(mdo): 'azer po// bdag gsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang mda' bo che dang / ral gyi dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rdo dang mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so// bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang / 
263a5(mdo): sbrul gdug pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / klang dang / ma he dang / s+yang khyid nga/ phag rgod dang / chen po che rnams kyang 'gyed do// bdag gi gan sa dang / gnas khang dang / phug lag khang yang myi chang ba dang
263a6(mdo): ngabs 'gyengs so// bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du zhugs pa rnams la 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis klu dang gar dang tshul ma yin pa byed du bcug go// babs brgya stong du mas bdag bsad pa'i phyir brtson no
263a7(mdo): bdag gis bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma bsad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang / chos kyi gru gzhig pa dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir 'artson no// da sangs rgyas
263a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mangs pa can stsogs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di
263b1(mdo): rnam ma nam ngamasan tu dpa dang / lud bya stsal gyi yus bams cad rabatu gzhos pa dang / da mchog gsum gyi gas gnas brgyad gyi ched dpa 'bya ba dang / sems cad
263b2(mdo): ba par bgyi ba dang / sra dang pas gyon pa pa thams cad chos dang mthun pas char gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'bab pa dang / cod pa dang / mu kye dang / nad dang / pha ras kyi dam gachog
263b3(mdo): dang 'tshang ba dang / byed pa dang / rnam pa dang / chus ma yin par grang zhi dang / mab dang / ma ba dang / rlung dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa dang / kha yang ba rab tu ni par bgyid pa dang / na dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin da
263b4(mdo): rnam yid dang / myi dang myo ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyid pa dang khyim dang / grong dang / grang khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor tham sa cad la srung ba dang / g.yo'i dang / dug dang / byad dang / rmongs
263b5(mdo): khyed dang / rmims ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad gzhis pa dang 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tshol 'ar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs
263b6(mdo): dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba pyod pa la gzung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b7(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel par bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs
263b8(mdo): dbyung ba la 'khyud cing ye shes kyi pha ro la tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje la bu brtend pa'i
264a1(mdo): chob kyi snying pos sum 'jom pa zhes pakyi ba'i gzungs byag rgyad cig rang tu bya ba la 'dug bu sung brtan mamachos kyinas grangs 'dis na cing byin gyis 'drabs te/ gcig la gcig dges pa de 'di lnga sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das da ltar phyogs
264a2(mdo): btsun bzhugs shing bzhes pa dag/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dri ba'i phyir gshegs te/ bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bsrung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi
264a3(mdo): snying pos lus 'dzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul rgya stobs thams cad rab tu 'jo ba/ 
264a4(mdo): dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shwe kya rol tu 'gro lnga bgyi ba'i sa du/ bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse 'a mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas/ 
264a5(mdo): shing bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa dang / bya ma yus pag da shi byed dpas kyang bya nga kyi ga / pos sha / da kyas da sa su sa de bya da de gi na gsums
264a6(mdo): ban rgya rkyen zhes kyi tu na cigs du ga song ba pan ba gro kyi rked kyi ma ta nyid lta su bye / 'i su 'di ng+ge i sa kya bya ki bye ba yun sasu su dag kri su jug na 'o tsa ni
264a7(mdo): gal ga gas ga gza gag ra/ rgas phyin kyi ma ga ste/ ta la tam mal ba de/ de'i do de/ ke bad Te/ ke yu re/ sa ma ba ha ne/ sa man tra b+ha da tre/ d+ha rme d+ha rme/ d+ha ma ke/ dze pha le/ myid tra Sh+ya pha le/ pha la ba te/ ga Ne ga Ne/ ba ran te/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li ke/ dza ma b+ha ba te/ Ta ka
264a8(mdo): se/ ra kan rbe/ Ta ka pa ran te/ ga con te/ shI rini te/ byin du ba te/ ko DA te/ tu re myid tra d+ha re/ tsu le/ a kle/ a a me/ sa s+ya ta ba tAn/ tsu lu hi le/ can traM/ sa a d+ha me d+ha me/ ku tsu r+ya/ mu ru ru/ a tsid ta/ si li kyi
264b1(mdo): lim ban/ tsu lu tsu lu/ gyi tra ba hA/ ku lu ku lu/ sa ma sa pa/ ku gra ku g+ha/ ma ha sa nga sa ra/ tumya tu rba/ ma hA sad t+ya ti d+ha ya/ pu shwe su mu se/ d+hu ma pa mi rke me/ a g+ha ye/ tsu tsi ne/ ka ra kle/ a a ma stu bi ba ha/ ti ti le/ 
264b2(mdo): ma ma le/ ba sha ka/ shi shi ma/ shi shi ra/ lo ka bi na ya ka/ badz+ra badz+ra d+ha re/ badz+re ba te/ badz+ra ma te/ badz+ra da d+he/ tsakra 'dre/ tsakre tsa pa te/ d+ha re d+ha re/ pu re te ye/ hu hu ra/ bang ga bim pa re/ sha ra sha tsi li/ tsu ru pu re/ man da le
264b3(mdo): man da le/ ga ga ra ni/ mu Na ne/ sar ba mA hU ha ne/ 'di d+hi ra ya ni/ ma khi shA ra la ya ni ri shi na/ dza ni d+ha pa ba tsi/ tsan Da la se me/ sarba sa s+ya a d+hi ShA na/ a tsid d+yan tu/ bra ha na/ ma mi ni pa la ra ti/ o dze gre/ bi tsi ni/ ba na ra
264b4(mdo): ha/ pu bu re/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ hi li hi li/ har da ra/ ka ka nad ba ha/ hi ti ta ma/ a yu ha na ka nad dz+wa la b+ha se gar da ne/ a da ha ni/ ma rga ma bi ro ha ni/ pa la sad t+ye/ a ro sha pa ti/ hi li hi li/ 5
264b5(mdo): badz+ra ya sA gra/ ya thA pa ran tsa rti da ya ba ha/ sad t+ya pa rid+ha la/ maH/ a b+hi mo ha ne/ a tsa la bud d+hi da da pra tsa la pa tsa ya/ bin da hr-i da ya tsan tra tsa ra ha/ a tsa le sho d+ha ni / pra kri ti mA rbe/ i li i li le/ pra
264b6(mdo): b+he sa ra pra te/ sarbad tra ta tha ta/ sad t+ya ru ga te/ A na/ ba ra na pra te/ a la tha/ ang gu re/ sha mi ni pra pre mA ba ya hi/ a hita/ a b+ha hi/ ni ra ba ya ba/ a tsi ra marga/ la na la g+hu sa re/ tri rad na bar she/ d+harma ka ya dza la tsan tre
264b7(mdo): sa su trab ti/ ma had nyud ta bya ya/ sa su tra theg pa d+hA na/ mu rjen su khi mu dza/ su ra pra ti se ma bi te/ sa mu tra/ a pa ha ni/ sam mo ga skar byi h+yA tang sen gi ti/ mu tri ho sa/ e ge cing zi'i ba sa/ bag pa ga/ 
264b8(mdo): ba gab hA/ kI Ti ka pa ta/ she li la pra ti t+ya hri da ye ne mu trita d+ha ra ni/ d+ha ma d+ha ra d+ha ma/ dan d+hi lI/ dan di la/ d+ha kA sa madz+ri ta ya/ mu Thi N+Da ma/ bdu ra bad ta/ dza la ba ta/ sus ti/ ba ti
265a1(mdo): ma had bud ta mu tri ta ye ke tsing/ sha dA ya na ni/ shrita pu ta/ i na mi ne/ sa tsa ne/ go sha sa tsa ne/ mu trita// tsir+ya ma d+hiSh+Tha na ba ka pa tha na n+ya tha ma ha pru Na/ sa mud tsa ya/ a pa ta ra ma ha ka ru Na mu tri te si mra
265a2(mdo): sa myaka pra ti pad/ tsa ratran dz+wa la tu/ darma ne tri sarba mu naM br-i sha pA/ ma ha ka ru na/ sa ma d+hi/ gnyalan la ba le na mai tri tA ga a g+ho 'o r+ye ba le na/ a d+hiSh+Tha shA/ sarba bu to pa ya yA/ sA hA/ 
265a3(mdo): de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
265a4(mdo): zhes lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar
265a5(mdo): che// kye ma 'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i bstend pa'o chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu bya la ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs stond pa'i
265a6(mdo): bstand pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stond pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnams 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ 
265a7(mdo): chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ chos kyi phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying po dang / phyag
265a8(mdo): rgya dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bla na byed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thol par bgyi ba'i phyir/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi/ 
265b1(mdo): ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstand pa 'od bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dang
265b2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang bzod pa thob par gyur da to// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stand las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ 
265b3(mdo): kun tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul kyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor// 'di 'dra ba ni rnyed
265b4(mdo): par dka'// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'dir ni rnyed par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa'i// 'gon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa// phyag rgya de 'dra thos pa yang // mchog tu rnyed par dka'
265b5(mdo): pa'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni pham phye da pa// dkon mchog gsum rgyun myi 'chad pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya so byin gyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bas lad pa'i phyir// bzod
265b6(mdo): dang nges pa rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong// 'di na ngan byas zlog byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byi nad pa// byang chub lam yang rab
265b7(mdo): stond pa// pha rol phyi nad pa 'phyel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed pa// thabs dang yo shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni skyed byed pa// gzungs no gzhan gyis myi thub pa// 
265b8(mdo): byang chub lam las myi g.yol ba// chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa// gzungs la yod gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas lhag par mos por byos// gang gi se byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no// 
266a1(mdo): chos smarnams ni srung ba dang // nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis myi thub pa'i gzungs// bdag gis da yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa myed pa bslab pa dang // sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir
266a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su dag 'di la dad pa 'bul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyu rad pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag
266a3(mdo): kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo// byin gyis rlob po// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge' slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhog gis khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos/

266a5(mdo): dang / ba dan bsgreng bas gnad du brgyand pa'i khyams su seng ge'i ka na 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na su yang de'i sems 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'jug
266a6(mdo): pa 'am/ yad nya zhug par s+ya byed do// de'i lus la u yang dbugs myi gtong ngo // glad pa na bar byed myi nus so// myag na ba dang / lce na pa dang / so na ba dang / rus pa na ba dang / 'gul pa na ba dang / dpung pa na ba dang / rgyab na pa/ 
266a7(mdo): dang / rgyu man pa dang / ston pa dang / chu so na pa dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na bar byed pa su yang myi nus te/ de ni ke nas byed do// de'i skad 'gag par yang myi 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de sngon gyi mya dge b.li las kyis khams/ 
266a8(mdo): 'azhugs pa 'am/ nad 'gag par gyur da na/ yang des gsungs 'di glegs par gyur da na/ thams cad ma lus par zhi 'ar gyur da ta lus yongs su byang nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos nyand pa gang dag der 'du 'ar gyur
266b1(mdo): pa de dag la yang khams 'khrugs pa 'am/ skad 'gags par byed par myi 'gyur ro// gang dag de na gzungs 'di mnyan pa de dag kyang myi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags
266b2(mdo): pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur da pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang ga'i bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyard pa budud
