267b7(mdo): gshegs pa spros myi mnga'// de dag skye 'dzag mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas dag kyang stond par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzungs dang yi ge dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul bsnyes pa ste/ 
268a1(mdo): che me de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste/ rnab bya mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas de bzhin nyid las 'grel par gyi mdzad de// nam mkhal la ni 'du byed gsum kyi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spro btags pa byed do//

268a3(mdo): srog la ma yin / gso' ba la ma yin skyes bu la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mchod rnams la 'ang spro bar myi mdzad mngon par myi zhe nad na/ che zhe khyod kyis ji ltar na de bzhi

268a5(mdo): bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas ni @// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'o// skyes bu dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ le

268a7(mdo): smras so/ rigs kyi bu bdag la zhugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bzod par gsol/ 'di skad smras pas/ bdag 'bras bu mya stug pa thob par ma gyur da cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhad mo can gyis gsod
268a8(mdo): babacom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par smyind pa ji tsam tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyis bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu gral te des slar/ 
268b1(mdo): ma bshags su zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong tu 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud myed kyi dngos po blangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu ji nas kyang ngag gi lus bsrung bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
268b2(mdo): ba rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te/ 
268b3(mdo): phyogs bcu pa rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

268b5(mdo): smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe myi 'gyur bar 'di dad pa rtsa lang du gsol// gang slad ma'i tus na btud nas myi dang myi ma lags pa'i bar gyis// de dag la
268b6(mdo): 'tshe bar myi bgyid pa dad pa gsul du gsol// de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang / mnal bsgag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas/ sgra des 'jig rten gyi
268b7(mdo): khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis 'gron gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo// bdag cag nyid kyis kyang
268b8(mdo): phyi ma'i dus na gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// rab tu bstand par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung par bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang nyan pa de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bkyi'o// bdag
269a1(mdo): cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyis skyes bu dam
269a2(mdo): pa gsungs shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos
269a3(mdo): chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol 'di lta ste// / a ma le/ bi me le/ ka Na Sha Na De/ ha re/ tsanaNe/ ma ha tsan Ne/ tsa me ma ha tsa me/ s+tho me/ swA me/ a pa ta/ bi b+ha ha/ ang ka radzA
269a4(mdo): ne tra/ kha kha/ su lca la pa ri tshe de/ ya kra tsan te/ bi shA tsa tsan Ne/ a pa ta ni/ sem pa rta naM/ sang ka ra ni/ dzam pa ni/ stam bA ni/ mo ha ni/ ud tsA Ta ni/ ha ma ha/ ha ma ham ha
269a5(mdo): ang ku tsa ne/ kha ga sha ba/ a ma la/ a mu ny+tsa la/ pa ri pa te/ a sA ra kha pa sA hA// / gsang sngags 'di we ga 'da' zhing mang po tshogs par mya spyod na// myig myi mthong zhing mdo
269a6(mdo): yang 'gas ka yan lag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ a tsa \u0f7f/ a ba ha/ tsa6/ tsu wa krA/ tsa ta Ta/ la tsa tsa/ nag sha/ rtsa tsam tsa tsan tsa ha/ mu lu la tsa tsa/ tsa mu la/ tsa tsa ha/ ma mu la tsa
269a7(mdo): tsa/ ha mu ha mu ka ra.a su ba ha swA hA// de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas sha zla 'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// stong chen po'i stobs kyi shugs shi nad tu
269a8(mdo): 'jos pa li gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de/ phan pa ma yin par sems dpa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'di btab na/ de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad
269b1(mdo): ces smras so// 'thung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa cad snying rje byed pa byas pa kyi 'bol ba/ sems cad la 'tsho ba rnams sam/ bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor klags lta zhing skabs tshol ba/ sangs rgyas brtsa
269b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyas rigs skye bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshol tu nye bar 'ong ba dang / btsun po dam pa dang / bu dang bu mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang
269b3(mdo): blon po dang / nor ba dang / dpung dam pa dang / 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa la dad pa'i skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / dgel bsnyen dang / dgel
269b4(mdo): bsnyen ma dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge' slong ma bsam gtan dang / kha don la 'grus pa rnams dang / zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol
269b5(mdo): tu 'ong zhing zan sems kyi skad cig gcig ya/ spa'i khung bu gcig/ tsam la 'tshe 'am/ gnod par byed dam/ 'jig par byed de ma/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs gtong ngam
269b6(mdo): sdang ba'i sems kyis lta na/ bdud nas myi dang mya ma yin pa'i bar du lus tri nga ba de dag gis 'go 'tshal ba bdun tu 'gas so// de dag gi myig kyang long par 'gyur snyeng yang skams par 'gyur sha bkral can tu 'gyur/ 
269b7(mdo): lus rul cing tring ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su 'bring par 'gyur/ de dag sa gas par ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhing gtor bar 'gyur/ rtul gyis kyang g.yogs nas de nyid tu sems 'khrug
269b8(mdo): te/ 'go 'joms par 'gyur ro// gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag ni sa 'i khung tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// gang dag chu na smra ba'i 'bru
270a1(mdo): po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa la mngon par ma dad par gyurd pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas zhal ta byed/ 
270a2(mdo): pa la brtson pa dge slong gi ba la 'tshe'am/ gas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' na/ de dag kyang de bzhin du bkol mchal pa bdun du 'gas pa nas de nyid du de dag go tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// 
270a3(mdo): yang yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis kyi grub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgyar chos kyon pa grangs 'di'i thung po dang bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sA pa'i skad du sprob ma brgya'o// de chos 'dod pa
270a4(mdo): li sems can thams cad yongs su sbyind par bkye'o// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas snang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bskrad par bgyi'o// yul de na zab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / 
270a5(mdo): pa rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / tus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o// bde ba dang 'dum pa dang / lo logs pa dang / dgel ba'i rtsa ba dang mthun pa rnaMs
270a6(mdo): bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang / grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / sto steng chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pa/ 
270a7(mdo): zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcul gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkur/ bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kun gyis bkur/ brgya byin gyi nang du ni 'argya byin kun gyis bku 'das
270a8(mdo): de bzhin du sbyar da te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang / 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi 'bang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred byed kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de dag kun tu/ 
270b1(mdo): bkur pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa / rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa bud myed kyi gzugs dang rtags dang / pyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 
270b2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs bshag kya
270b3(mdo): thub pa de la myig myi 'dzums par bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du myed pa la ji yang ma yin par bltas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka'
270b4(mdo): sarba lad to// kye khyod myig myi 'dzums par ci yang ma yin pa'i bar du da da la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dem/ de bzhin du 'dod chag
270b5(mdo): dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod de zhes bya ba'i myi gyi dngos po ni rkyend kyi mtshan nyid do/ mtshan nyid kyi rkye nad ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkye nad kyis 'du byed rnams nas 'gog pa'i bar
270b6(mdo): du byas par bya'o// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mchis pas ni/ de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na/ srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de dag gang las
270b7(mdo): skye bar 'gyur// ci nas nam mkha' las skye zhes 'byor na nim mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu/ 
270b8(mdo): go/ rnams 'a 'jams yin/ mchod byed ma yin/ mun pa ma yin// snang bam 'di/ na pa med/ rdom par rtog pam yin/ chub po ma 'ad/ brjod pa ma yin nyim mang ma 'ad sa kya
271a1(mdo): po thams cad spangs pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mthal yongs su bcad pa'o// bri ba byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chob
271a2(mdo): rnams ni pha rol dang tshu ro lad la reg pa myed pa'o// cha shas myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du myed pa'o// myi g.yol zhing rnam par gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang mtshan
271a3(mdo): nyid thams cad myed pa'o// tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa myed pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las sred pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis rnams skyes so// 
271a4(mdo): bstand pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsold pa// gal te sangs rgyas kyi
271a5(mdo): chos nam mkhal lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa la gas na/ de ci'i slad tu ye shes dang brtson 'grus dang thabs dang pha rol gnod pas khyod 'di ltar bdag la 'tshe'o// bdag gi bdud kyi
271a6(mdo): yul 'joms pa/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/ 'gro ba myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed pa dang / ci yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyi bslab pa la slob pa na gang de dag la
271a7(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i skye ba'i pyod pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // gang gi slad tu khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po/ 
271a8(mdo): rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin
271b1(mdo): dang / dri ra dang / l+h+wam yi dang / nam khal lding dang / bya'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhings lus pa 'dig par bgyis/ snying rje byed pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma lag tu
271b2(mdo): bdag klad pa'i nad gyi 'bad pas btab ste/ sdug bsngal go cho 'byung zhing lus kyang rgyas la lding ba gyu da yi 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bkod// yang de'i ma 'dud drug zhi brgyad srung dang / bdud
271b3(mdo): kyi 'khor grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / sha ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'gron gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang zos ma thag tu klad par
271b4(mdo): bar 'gyur te lus kyang rul cing tri nga bar gyur nas shind tu sdug bsngal/ kyi sor bamyong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pas 'dis/ da ces bka' su lang to// sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de tran par byos
271b5(mdo): shig// nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis gas pa 'i phyim dpag tshad brgya bcu tshun chad kyis sa dang nam mkha' bdud kyis bkang ste/ 'ongs pa nas da ltar btud dbye ba 'kho dang bcas te/ 
271b6(mdo): gsang pa'i bar du bkye bas/ de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzlal pa dang / de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas kyi dang byi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang zhi bar bya ba
271b7(mdo): dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye ba zhi bar bya ba dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa mi yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i 'khor ba'i mu kun bskam pa dang / phung po la
271b8(mdo): lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs myed dpag tu myed pa nas myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bstsog
272a1(mdo): kyis// sdig cad byed da phrad byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/ de ltar khyod klad pa na pa'i sdug bsngal gyi babad pa'i tshor ba 'di las yongs su 'thadad par 'gyur te/ ma tha dad kyis sangs rgyas
272a2(mdo): kyi chos nas ma kha'i rang gnid lta bur mngon du 'gyur/ bdud kyi yu la las chas kyang par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang khob par 'gyuraro// yang de'i me bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs myed dpag
272a3(mdo): tu byed pa dang / sdang po'i gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po'i sdang ba'i bar gyis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gso lad to// bdag cag gis kyang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ra/ 
272a4(mdo): ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di yang thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig
272a5(mdo): can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha' muli ba du klad pa na bar gyurd kyang / bdag 'di 'akra ba'i g.yo sgyus bya/ chub tu sems myi skyed do// de nas tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan
272a6(mdo): papa 'di ska cimigs med ta// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dab sangs rgyas ma ma 'ang 'das sems cad kyi spyan sA bstad pamachos kun bzung bar spro'o// sangs rgyas kyi dang snyigs pa lnga can 'dabade la nin
272a7(mdo): gshegs pagag kya thub pa 'di'i bsta nad pa la gartse bos gtad pa 'di bzung bar bgyi ste/ da yang shag kya thub pa'i nyi ma nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstand pa 'di la chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o// yul gang na bdud
272a8(mdo): kyi tshogs kyis kyi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar brgya yi// gang du thung ba deng ni sha nid tu byung bar 'gyi'o// grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang yul de dag na rigs kyi bure
272b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kun bsrung par bgyi// yongs su bslab par bgyi// gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi// don dang dge' ba la bzud par bgyi'o// gang dag pa dud kyi tshogs kyis myi thub pa'i gzungs
272b2(mdo): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di za na bris nas 'chang ba rnams dang / gang na chos smra ba seng ge'i khri la mchis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags
272b3(mdo): kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag 'gugs par gyur pa te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas par phyogs der mchis nas chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag bsrung
272b4(mdo): ba dang swa bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba me ka a ba me / am ba re/ am pa re/ pa ri kun dza/ na Da na// pu shwa ra ba ha/ dza lu lu kha/ ma kha ya/ e li mi li ka ki li mi li kai rta tsa ra mu
272b5(mdo): tre mu tra mu khe swa hA// bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis/ thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis lag/ bdag nyid kyis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shi nad tu yong
272b6(mdo): su dag pas thos te/ de ma mchis na 'das pa dang 'khyod pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing bdag za byed pa yang dag par ngo ca ma la bar gyi 'gyur sa
272b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das pad/ der mchis la chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du skye bas zang bar 'gyir/ sgyu ma da'i rlobs pa rig pas nye bar 'asgrub par po byed/ chom phra ba dag dang chos nyan pa dag ga dadum
272b8(mdo): zad bas la bar bgyi'o/ lta ba ngan pa dang bya ba ran pa dang / the tsom thams cad bsal bar 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi na ma grangs 'di 'chad pa dang / 'dzin pa dang kun tum par bgyid
273a1(mdo): deg/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas/ 'bab pa dang rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang nad dang 'jigs pa dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / char gyi 'bab pa dang / tus ma lags pa'i rlung dang tsha ba dang / lta ba ngan
273a2(mdo): kha dang / bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang / myi dang myi lags pa dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de na bkra myi shis pa dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / brlang
273a3(mdo): ba dang / de gcod pa dang / ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / dri nga ba dang / reg na myi bde ba'i dug de dag zas pan bsal bar bgyi'o// der tsha ba dang / mu ke'i gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi/

273a5(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa'i slad du nor dang 'bru dang sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro dang / zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / mal cha sna tshogs nye bar
273a6(mdo): bsgrub par bgyi'o// yul gangan chos kyi nam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa dang bdag gi ma mams can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad ma song 'a
273a7(mdo): bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa'i slad du phan pa dang bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba khyod pa la gzudas
273a8(mdo): byas te/ da bdag gis yangs rgyas ma ldan 'das sems pad kyi phyin sde phrin lam bte pazhi/ sangs rgya kyi po ldan 'das thams cad bdag 'a tshugs yang mang chun pa'i// khyis bu'i
273b1(mdo): nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la yod bzhin du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub pas yang du gsolang // de nas de'i mod la shag kya thub pa la yogs
273b2(mdo): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de dag la zhugs pache bar dgongs te 'di skad ces bka' saH la to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dis gang gi phyi'i brgya byin dang / mangs
273b3(mdo): ba dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed
273b4(mdo): par 'gyur gyis// nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
273b5(mdo): tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub par gyurd cig 'di lta ste// tsa mung+ga de/ tsa mun Na pa ri tshe de/ ha mu'u ha/ ha mu lu ha/ sa pa ra k+ka pa la kri Sha mi kha pa ri g+ha ha/ tsa ma ra ya thA dza/ su bi Sha
273b6(mdo): a su 'u la pa ri tshi de/ sa rba bud pAn twe swA hA// / de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' baN+Da lad to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dpa'ajig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / 
273b7(mdo): gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gdod sbyin dang / triT dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gzi'i brjed che ba'i myi dang mya ma yin pa' rnams bkug cing mdun par byed pa'i gzungs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
273b8(mdo): yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brla' so kyis khyod 'das skyes bu'i mabu chen po 'di lta byed nus par 'gyur ro// dbyangs dang ldan pas gso med pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bud myed kyi cha byad 'di lta
274a1(mdo): sum tshas kyi rgyas bsrung bar 'bya'o// bud byed rnams kyang songs su bsrung bar 'gyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das bud byed la la bu 'chal te/ sa kyi nas grangs 'di 'dzid te/ klog gas kun chub par byed
274a2(mdo): da bris ste 'amang na/ bdag kIs bud byed de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// yang bud myed gang 'di lta bus sems yongs su skyo bar 'gyur te// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'cha ba zhing klog pa nas
274a3(mdo): nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na/ de 'dod pa la spyod kyang mngal tu myi chags so// sang bud myed gang brnyas shing spad par gyur pa/ longs spyod dang / kun dgyod pa dang bral ba des chos kyi nam grangs 'di klags na/ bsam pa
274a4(mdo): thams cad grub cing bde pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyu/ raro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / sems can kyi/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis nor
274a5(mdo): bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la' bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi zu de de bzhin te/ bsrung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 
274a6(mdo): 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha nad tu rnam par phye
274a7(mdo): ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa dang / a cang yang myi ring ba zhig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de yud tsam gyis
274a8(mdo): tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo // de bzhin du sbyar da te brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs dang / 'phrul dgal dang dgal ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / rgyal chen bzhi
274b1(mdo): dang dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srul po dang / yi dgas dang / sha 'a dang / grul bum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang
274b2(mdo): rnge'u'i rigs dang / dbang rigs dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnams rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo // skad cig gis bya dang shing dang ro dang / 'bras bu dang / gos
274b3(mdo): dang / al cha dang / snam bu dang / sdod dang / byang phrul dang / rgyan dang / sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i gzugs dang / sud tsam gyis dge slong ma'i gzugs dang / skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su
274b4(mdo): snang ngo // skad cig gis kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs dang gzugs bya rgya bcu rtsa bzhir snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ngal tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das
274b5(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'ang ni kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang gzugs pa rgya bcu cha bzhi gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkye nad gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs
274b6(mdo): kyi bu 'di mthu rab tu che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shi nad tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la gnas nas/ semaso can rnams yongs su sbyind par byed cing / shes rab kyi myig sgrub pa myed
274b7(mdo): pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ bsam pa dang sems ji lta bu dang spyod pa ji lta bu dang / ji 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang / gapal
274b8(mdo): skyabs su mthom 'i sems can ji 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi thar gyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags
275a1(mdo): dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams theg pa gsum las phyir myi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ yo byad dang long 'apyod
275a2(mdo): gnas pa sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag gis chags pa spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnams kyis byin nas phyir gyi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te/ phyir myi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / 
275a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' shind tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis/ nyen gcig la gang ga li klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su tha dad par byas te/ theg pa gsum la phyir myi ldog
275a4(mdo): par 'god pa yidam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin/ bgrod pa ma yi/ na no// gang pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
275a5(mdo): 'dis sems can yongs su sbyind par bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu chen po batshams nas ji srid gcig lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di bskal
275a6(mdo): pa gang dag gi pha rol tu blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs myed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed do// byang chub sems dpa' shi nad tu rnam
275a7(mdo): par bye ba'i blo gros 'das bskal pa gang dag la ting nge 'dzind kyi mthus/ skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas/ bskal pa grangs myed pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'das so// gang pos gsold pa/ 'di ji srid ci
275a8(mdo): na/ yongs rgyas kyi na gang du zin byed pa yang dag par rjonam kyi chu tu mdzin par rjeg sa 'i ro byang du bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ga' phrul das/ brnam pa chen po'irgya stong phrag kyi su ma/ 
275b1(mdo): 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgrol ba zhes bya ba la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skye dga' che lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na/ mtshams myed pa byed pa nas myi
275b2(mdo): dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sa tshang brgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
275b3(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// des lo bzhi khri sangs rgyas ka bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las bzlol ba'i phyir theg
275b4(mdo): pa gsum kho dag la sems can rnams yongs su smyand par byedad par 'gyur ro// de la ga tu phung po lhag ma myed pa'i mye ngan la da sa 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
275b5(mdo): ro// gang pos gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'a dis/ sngon sems can gang dag yongs su spyi nad par bgyis ba des gang dag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
275b6(mdo): bka' sa tsha khad pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ras su chad pa myed de/ des smon lam 'di skad du/ nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rtul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
275b7(mdo): rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad myed par mthong bar ma gyurd ta ma/ bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag thog mar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
275b8(mdo): chub la btsud pa dang / yang dag papa 'dzi nad du bcug pa dang / pha rold tu phyi nad pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
276a1(mdo): bam sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba do med du/ bdag zan byed pasang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar myi bya'o// ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs
276a2(mdo): nga yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tus phra rab kyi rdus skyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'a rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / gzhan na yang sems can gang dag mtshams myed pa byung pa dang / thacos can nas kyi dge ba'i mas kyi
276a3(mdo): ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba de rnams de dag nas ni 'phom nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar 'gyur bzhin tu de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i che ba bskyed pa byas te/ phyir myi ldog pas/ 
276a4(mdo): so sor bkod nas de nas gdod bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun tu bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas
276a5(mdo): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems da pa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams stond pa 'di lta bu dag
276a6(mdo): kyang mnyes par bgyis/ byang chub sems dpal snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu yang mthong / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje
276a7(mdo): lta bu bsten po'i chos kyi snying po lus 'jom pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'dug pa lung bstand pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byi gi brlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di yang ches mnyan pa'i slad du// rnyed
276a8(mdo): pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i khre'u ste bdun pa'o// / yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa myi
276b1(mdo): 'khrugs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma

276b3(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'dra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa 'di dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
276b4(mdo): sbyin dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa'i 'dus pa 'di lta bu ni dkon no// de bas na da khyod kyis 'di mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi dang 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i des na dam pa'i chos 'di dang / chos kyi tshul
276b5(mdo): 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang / dkon mchog gsun nga gis 'di'abar bar byed pa spro ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyod so so nas rang gi smon lam thob shig/ yang de'i tshe
276b6(mdo): bdud dge' sbyong me tog ces bya bas/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi bre bo byur bur bkang ste/ bud myed kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur nas/ 
276b7(mdo): bud byed kyi gos dang / rgyan mchog gis brgya nad te/ 'di skad ces gsold to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon to// bzhugs pa thams cad dang / gang gzhan su dag 'das
276b8(mdo): 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag kasi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang 'bras bu dpalo tog dang myu gu thams cad kyis byung bur yongs su bltam zhing rgyas pa'i bre bo
277a1(mdo): 'di 'brus na/ sems can thams cad 'thugs partse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi zla zang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dag myu gu bams cad kyis longs
277a2(mdo): sanA su bltam pa 'di khazhes su gsol// 'di ltar bdag skal ba 'bang po mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud myed kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang skom dang 'bras bu dang me tog sbyin

277a4(mdo): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya kyi'o// sem sa can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad kyi/ sa mya brel bar bdag gis rim gror bgyin bdag gi bsam pa

277b1(mdo): grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis kyi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ stond tam 'chad dam/ za na glegs bam la bris te/ sti stang bgyid pa'i grong dang krong khyer

278a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la myi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang 'bras
278a2(mdo): bu 'tshal nas pan bya dang ri dgas kyang chos 'tshal bar gyurd cing stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de ni bdag gi zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs
278a3(mdo): 'di gang du 'byung ba der sems can gyi 'bras dang / gro dang / nas dang / til dang / mon sran sde'u dang / son sran gre'u dang / rgya sran dang / sran chung dang / sran ma dang / gang dag lo tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi slad

278a5(mdo): bar gyur da na ka de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// der bdag gis khu ram shing dang / dgun 'bru dang / bal po se'u'i zhu shugs shi nad tu bskus par

278a8(mdo): khyab bgyis// bcom ldan 'das rnasas dang / byang chub mams da mams dpa chen po sems cad kyis// bdag gi byang chub sems dpa'i byed pa 'di na na dis rjes bu dashes pas da tun sad /

278b8(mdo): nas kyi mngos khyod 'di sa su dag gi mtshim par 'akye'o// de bzhin du sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyan mongs pa can du gyur dpa/ snyigs pa lnga dang ldan 'grangs pa mchis pa gang ga'i klung gi kyis ma sa
279a1(mdo): su bskal pa ro ma la yang / skyes bu'i mthu' chen po 'di lta bu bkyi zhing de nas gdod dpag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bkyi nan 'a/

279a3(mdo): tsa me Sha/ bi br-i ta/ ha ste/ ba ha la ha ba g+ha/ sma ra a sA kan/ sa ma te/ ba~M ba ba so 9/ sa mas rin te/ sa ra margan tre/ sa ra badzin tre/ sa ra ha ra ba a a swa kan/ hu hu hu hu hu hu/ a sa /

279b2(mdo): gyod pa ni legs so legs so// kho bo can gyi bsod nams dang batshon 'grus dang / stob dang / pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthul de lta bu mngon par grub par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/

279b4(mdo): gso lad to// bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing / mdza' ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i grogs bgyi'o// skyes bu dam pa khyod nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
279b5(mdo): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis bdag cag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond cig/ bdu da dge' sbyong me tog gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin du
279b6(mdo): gyurd cig/ sems can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / tri kun tu spyod par gyur da pa de yang bdag cag la phan pa dang bde bar gyur da cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
279b7(mdo): shag kya thub pa de la/ bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces gso yod to// bdag ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar 'gyid pa lags te/ de nyid du zag mar su go'i dgon par btu ni
279b8(mdo): rab kyi ba'i slad sun na tan cir po gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ldan byed pa yang dge par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu lung bas na dugs so// de nas bdud dgel byung ma zhig gis de bzhin gshegs na na
280a1(mdo): thub pa de la/ yan lag sngas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pas bdud dge sbyong me tog la 'di skad rjegasasu yad to// bde'i gshegs sras
280a2(mdo): bo dpa' bo pad ma'i gdong long shig/ khyod kyis di ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab// rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni
280a3(mdo): sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin dri myed dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // stong zhing mtshan rnams smon sul las la rab grol bar// rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring por myi thogs dpal
280a4(mdo): ldan zhes bya ba'i// sangs rgyas dgra thul blo gros shind tu bstan pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas bdud dge' sbyong me tog mchog tu dka' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
280a5(mdo): me tog sna tshogs kyis gtord to// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te thal mo sbyar da nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs
280a6(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol da rta// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol // bskal pa bzang po byung nas
280a7(mdo): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi spyan snga ma// sems can yongs su sbyid par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/ sems can rnams kyi nad brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du
280a8(mdo): bud kyad kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin grangs te/ rtsa dang / rtsa ba lnga tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// sems can rnams kyi lo khyod du bgyi ba dang / nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i skad du sman bcung
280b1(mdo): kyis len brgya rtsa bzhi sbyard to// rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi bstand to// 'bras bu'i sman brgya cha bzhi dang / mar las bskal pa brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / sman nad myed ces bgyi ba
280b2(mdo): brgya ma bzhi nas bsdu ba'i bye ma dang / ri lu dang sngar rtsa lad pa'i bar du stong cha bzhi bstand to// sems can yongs su sbyind par bgyi ba dang / nad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can la phan par brgya
280b3(mdo): ba'i slad du/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi zha 'bring ba dang / bcas pa la kun spyod pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas der bdag byang chub tu lung bstand par 'tshal
280b4(mdo): ba dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis 'di ska da ces bka' saHlad to// ma 'ongs po'i dus na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
280b5(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan bshag kya thub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon
280b6(mdo): gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/ der khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin
280b7(mdo): gshegapa gser thub kyis kyang de skad ces bka' stsa la to// de'i 'og tu 'od srungs kyis kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// de'i cha bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal
280b8(mdo): chen po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi las sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dib sran che po 'bud kyis yond kyis chud da cig/ dang yang bdag gim sems can gyi kun kyad pa dang / na rab tuni ma ni kyiba'i srid du
281a1(mdo): bcud chen po blangs nas/ rtsa dang tsha ba dang / lo mo dpa'adab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu snga tshogs kyi nang du sA lad to// de nas sems can ga bdag gis yang dag par spyad da te 'tshal nas/ 
281a2(mdo): sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed par so sor rtogs pa gang 'jug pa de yang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
281a3(mdo): ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes bu'i mthu chen po bgyid pa de de bzhin tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rtend kyi
281a4(mdo): khams re rer yang bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gi sa bud myed kyi gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa 'di lta bu dang / sems can
281a5(mdo): nad pa yongs su smyin par bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur da cig ces smon lam
281a6(mdo): btab bo// da ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do// skal ba chen po dang ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa/ dge' slong me tog 'di'i grogs
281a7(mdo): su yang gyur da cig/ bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud myed kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par bkye'o// bud myed rnams yongs su sbyin par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
281a8(mdo): yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang / rgan po rnams kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud las byin blangs te/ zas dang skom dang / kha dog dang / tre dang / ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar brgyas te/ 
281b1(mdo): bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas la
281b2(mdo): ldan 'das rnams bdag la legs so zhes 'gyel bcal du gsolang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lul bstan tu gsoyad/ 
281b3(mdo): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de na de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' baHlad to// khyod ni 'jig
281b4(mdo): rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde bye dpa// padam ldan pazhing rtsang dam pa der// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
281b5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzind ces bya ba lung bstand pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud myed kyi gzugs kyis smon lam btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pas de la yang 'di skad
281b6(mdo): ces bka' sa ya to// khyod na ri dag sa 'dzind gcig pu ste// khyod nor ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur// rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par na// ye shes dbang phyug ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 
281b7(mdo): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sde zhes bla ma zhes bya ba yung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud byed kyi gzugs su spyod pas smon lam btab ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sad la yang 'di skad ces
281b8(mdo): kyi / khyod kyis 'di na ci sa dpon sar ba kyis ni/ me dag wang sum mason gyi gyis nago ni gnas pa dan pa'i ni 'das// nyi mi na na rid ba gnags
282a1(mdo): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba stond ces bya ba lung bstand pa thob par 'dod nas bud myed kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smi nad par bya ba'i phyir/ 
282a2(mdo): smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// 'gro ba myi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni// skye bo byang chub yongs su spyi nad byas nas// skye bo rdul can
282a3(mdo): zhing mchog rab bsngags par// me'i sgron ma bda' bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can la g.yol zhing / rdul dang bral ba lung bstand pa thob par 'dod nas bud myed
282a4(mdo): kye gzugs kyis rlu la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' sa tsa lad to// 
282a5(mdo): g.yol bas sems can rnams la dgal sbyar da te/ khyod na nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing / rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don mthong ba// zla bo'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin tu
282a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa myed pa'i sgron ma lung bstand pa thobo par 'dod nas bud myed kyi gzugs kyis nam mkhal la yongs su pyod pas sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir smon lam/ 
282a7(mdo): btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bar byede la yang 'di skad ces bkalas \u0f7flad to// myi gnas ye shes stond pa mya ngan myed// yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba// sgrib pa bsal cod chags
282a8(mdo): pa byed zhing du// ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal spos mchog sba la lung bstand pa thob par 'dod nas bud myed kyi gzugs dang ldan pas me tog la ma/ 
282b1(mdo): su gyod pas sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bkalas ma lad to// sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la/ 
282b2(mdo): ni// me tog 'aspos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu// kun nas spos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal kha dog dur sbyin
282b3(mdo): lung bstand pa thob par 'dod nas bud myed kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mtshon sna tshogs la yongs su pyod pas sems can yongs su smyi nad par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan
282b4(mdo): 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' sa lad to// 'jig rte na dur smyig bgos la btsud nas su/ dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas// sngon por snang ba'i sangs
282b5(mdo): rgyas zhing mchog tu// rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin tu sa bon dang nags tshal dang / 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug
282b6(mdo): bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstand pa thob par 'dod nas bud myed kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su sbyi nad par bya ba dang / bud myed shi nad tu yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag
282b7(mdo): rdzogaso pa'i byad chub tu smon las btab pa dang / de dag tshogs su bcad pa res srung bstan pa thob par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ba mtshan gyur da te mo mtshan thob pa ni gnad tu rnyed 'angasam
282b8(mdo): mam can gyung nye ba mtshan tham pa ni gan du rnyed papan// de bzhin tu gas yin dkrigs theg slong zag phyag bcu rtsa 'an bye ba zag brgya bcu dang / dang kyi'i bum gyi 'khrugs 'i bye ga zhan / 
283a1(mdo): brgya stong phrag bdun bcu dang / bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas ka myi dang myi ma yin pa nas/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rnge'u'i
283a2(mdo): sa rigs dang / yapo rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yung bstand pa thob par 'dod pa dang / cig
283a3(mdo): su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstand pa thob bo// gyi ma yin pa dang / de bzhin tu lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / tri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
283a4(mdo): ya dgas dang / sha ba bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon bla na myed pa la bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag/ ni bskyed par gyurd to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag
283a5(mdo): ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyurd to// sems can bgrang pa las 'das pa dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dad pa/ bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyurd to// sems
283a6(mdo): can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob nas 'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur da to// sems can bgrang ga las 'das pa dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems bskyed
283a7(mdo): nas/ sangs rgyas nyid du phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur da te/ de dag thams cad kyis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
283a8(mdo): bka' sa khad pa bzhin du dam pa'i ches yongs su bzung bar 'gyi'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i dzi rnyed pa dang / yi ger 'bril nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rigs pas yongs
283b1(mdo): su bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las lung bstan pa'i le'u he brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub
283b2(mdo): bas yang 'di skad ces bka' yad to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag shugs 'che bar 'dra ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gos dang / sa
283b3(mdo): dang / skom dang / sman dang yo byad kyis sems can rnams shi nad tu tshim par brgya te/ bud byed kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyind par
283b4(mdo): bgyid pa dang / ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smya nid par bgyi ba'i slad du// sems bskyed ma thag tu ji 'tshal ba dang gang ga slad du 'tshal ba dang / ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang / 
283b5(mdo): zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams sprul pa 'am/ bsham par 'byor par 'gyur bar yid la re ba yongs su rdzog sa par 'gyur ba dang / ji nas skyes bu dam pa de dag skyes bu'i mthu
283b6(mdo): 'odi dag 'gyid pa dang / sems can rnams la longs khyod dang / yongs su gyod pas rim 'gror bgyid nus par 'od dag la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go so thugs rje
283b7(mdo): chen po dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa yo la mangs pas skyes su dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' ba ya to// khyed kyi bsam pa dang yid kyi
283b8(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par bya la phyir/ rgyas gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis 'drabs / dag pa ma pa thams ca mthun pa'i gis sA ga kyi chog 'dzin/ 
284a1(mdo): ga sbyin no 'di lta ste// / d+yo ti ba ga/ d+hi ti ba ba/ mu ni ba pa/ mad t+ya ba 'o/ bu n+ya sa lang ka ra ba ba/ t+yad pas pa la/ ma ha ka mun pa ba/ sa dA pra ta ba lag a mo ga pa ba ga ru ti ba
284a2(mdo): krI ti ba ya/ sa li la kha ba Sha ga la ba/ ba su ba ba/ bar rta ba kha/ a d+hiSh+Tha na ba 2/ A mA ba ga/ a ha nan pa ba/ ta thA ta ba pa/ d+ha na ra sa ba ba/ ning pri tI ba ba pra kug la

284a4(mdo): la a d+hiSh+Te na yA swA hA// / skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i de dag sems

284a7(mdo): kun 'apyod pa dang / yongs su spyan par bya ba'i phyir 'tshon par gyur de nas/ de dag thams cad kyis 'phrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol da to// bdag cag gi yid la re la yongs su rdzogs par bgyi 'a
284a8(mdo): wang cu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mgi 'di dag gsungs pas na/ byin gyi brlabs 'das bdag cag thams can thams cad la rim 'gro ba gyid nus so// 28/ 
284b1(mdo): cag bla na myed pa'i ye shes de bsgrub par nus so// bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par 'gyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson pa drag pos
284b2(mdo): spro bar bgyi'o// yang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i slad du/ da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang gi dam bcas pa la gnas par bkye'o// lha 'am/ klu nas mye'i bar gang ya la zha// 
284b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgyid dam/ zhig par 'byed dam/ rnam par ma rung bar bgyid la bdag cag gis dam pa'o chos yun ring du gnas
284b4(mdo): par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gal te de ma bzlog gam/ nan tan ma ba gyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de thams cad bslus par gyur da cig
284b5(mdo): bdag cag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur da cig/ kye grogs po dag lha nas mye'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngam/ dge la
284b6(mdo): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la 'tshel/ gal te bdag cag gis de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa gzhil bar bkye slad du nan tan ma bgyis na bdag cag
284b7(mdo): gi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bsdus par gyur da cig/ bdag cag zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
284b8(mdo): rgya bams gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub don cu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi su'am rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhig zhugs dang cha ba dang / tsug dang / mtshon dang / byad dang / rims zhan gcig
285a1(mdo): pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas/ lha dang / kla dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje lha rigs
285a2(mdo): dang / dmangs rigs dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / nad dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur da pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gri
285a3(mdo): brlabs pa ba sa ma pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tran na/ sngon ga las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/ bdag cag gis de dag gi gnod pa rnams
285a4(mdo): las yongs su tha rad par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gsheg/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis bskyas par gyur da cig/ bdag cag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed
285a5(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyurd cig/ de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis de dag la legs so zhes bya
285a6(mdo): ba byin te// skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas bdud
285a7(mdo): sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa gshegs pa de dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de// de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byaso// sdig
285a8(mdo): can khyod ni ring gi yul na rab tu grogs dang mthu byed kyis// thub pa lan khyod kyis bsngo zhi'i stsogs par byos pa gtang bar byos// de nas bdud sdig can gos shis lad pa/ khyod kyi tshig gis byeng cus
285b1(mdo): dri myed dad pa'i sems gcig bdag myi skyed// grub pa mi gsung bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis// de dag lhan cig bdag gi yul na dpung dang bzhon par gnas par bkyil/ 
285b2(mdo): phun sum tshogs 'dzind bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang myi mchi// 'dus pa chen po rini po che tog gi gzungs las snang ba che ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
285b3(mdo): yab de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad
285b4(mdo): bdag nas byon te/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlabs/ bdud bye ba ni pham par
285b5(mdo): mdzad/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis se mas can rnams la na gzigs/ sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tu tha rad par mdzad/ shes rab kyi sgron ma ni rab tu 'bar bar ma/ 
285b6(mdo): zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtend pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bgyi bi'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstand pa'i chos kyi rnam
285b7(mdo): grangs 'di ni bkang/ nag po'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa de bzhin du/ da lta phyogs btsun bzhugs shing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
285b8(mdo): rnams kyis kya sems cad 'thugs rnam ba'i slad kun ni mongs brtson phyogs mi ste dang ldan pa'i sapas rgyas kyi zhing cu 'du na po mdzad do// mas kyi tshum 'od lags pa byin kyis
286a1(mdo): nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du ni mdzad na/ shag kya thub pa'i nyi ma khyod nub pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzind par 'gyur// dam pa'i
286a2(mdo): chos kyi tshul 'di 'ab bar bgyid par 'gyur// sems can rnams yongs su smyind par 'gyur// 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yo
286a3(mdo): su gtad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bzhag kya thub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa
286a4(mdo): 'ibyang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams sam/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dwa zi dang / lha ma yin dang nam
286a5(mdo): mkha' lding dang / mya 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po la ma/ gang su yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par btson pa rnams dang / gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa
286a6(mdo): chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nas/ lto phye chen po'i dbang po labam de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad
286a7(mdo): bar mdzod cig// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa myed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad
286a8(mdo): ces pa ka las ma lad to// grogs po dag gang su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dim 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du
286b1(mdo): 'byung ba ni shind tu dkon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skad gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa de yang sha nad tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs pa che ba dang sems can thams cad rjes su
286b2(mdo): bzung ba dag pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bla na myed pa'i lam la dgod pa la phyir sangs rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / dkon
286b3(mdo): mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun myi 'chad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smind par bya ba nas/ 'khor ba'i pha rold tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
286b4(mdo): kye si d+ha sa gsum du rtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyisabarlabs so// chu'i khams thams cad dang / me'i khams tha mas cad dang / rlung gi khams thams cad dang / nam ma kha 'i khams
286b5(mdo): cad byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od na ga na sa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya
286b6(mdo): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / trin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la dbang po dag dang / gang dag yang ga
286b7(mdo): 'dzid che ba ga ra'i brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag ya pagli zazhi po la 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams cad la zos te 'di skad ces bkalasaHyad to// kye grogs po dag sems can sa
286b8(mdo): cad yongs su sbyin param bya ba'i phyi mas kyi tshul 'di byon gyis brlabs te/ khyed kyi lag tu shind tu gtad kyisi/ ce nas 'di dam pani chos 'di myurab tu myi 'dzig pa dang / nub par myi 'gyur ba de ltar myod
287a1(mdo): kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la kyis zhig/ 'bar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas yi ge madz+ra
287a2(mdo): te 'chang pa'i khar tu byed pa dang / dge slong ra ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge la bsnyen ma 'am/ dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir
287a3(mdo): rigs par khyed kyi lag tu gtad kyis chos smra ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / bsam gtan la mngon par dka' ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung
287a4(mdo): bar bya ba nas yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig// de ci le phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag / par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung par gyur pa'i de bzhi
287a5(mdo): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu 'dus nas chos kyi tshul bsrung ba dang / myi nub par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa'i
287a6(mdo): gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do// de bzhin du ma 'ongs por
287a7(mdo): dus na phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyegs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhib tu skad cig gis 'dus te/ sems can la phan yi phyis gtus
287a8(mdo): gas sngags kyi chog 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul 'di yang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur zhi chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang pa'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs
287b1(mdo): pa dang / 'ji nyan byung ba thams cad kyis gtu gtod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin tud kyis kyang kun tu 'asrung ba dang / sems cad yongs su sbyind par bgyi lal phyi sangs rgyas kyi nang 'di na gnas panas
287b2(mdo): dang / grang bzhi pa ra gnas pa'i 'argya byed dang / sangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dag/ kU dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ra dang / lha ma yin dang ga nam mkhal lding dang / kyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dir
287b3(mdo): po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shi nad tu gtad kyis/ ji nas myur du myi 'jig cing nub par myi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig/ rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig// bsrung bar gyis
287b4(mdo): shig/ rags kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa'i gang zag dge slong dang / dga' blo nga ma dang / dge la bsnyen dang / dge la bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus
287b5(mdo): pa chen po la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyand pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang
287b6(mdo): brtsod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o// rim gror bya'o// de mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
287b7(mdo): ba ste/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grob rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri bregs sam/ pho brang 'khor dang dgon pa'i gnas nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu khyod de/ 'chad da
287b8(mdo): lung chagags kun chub par byed dam/ man glegs pas la kris te 'chang na/ rgyas kyi btsu des sa'i brgyad dang / sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur to// kyad dam mdangs dang ldan zhingag
288a1(mdo): dang / gongs dang / the con 'grus dang / ma rom gnod pa dang ldan par 'brug// byed zhalazhi 'khor dang / gzhal byed khang yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ rgyan rgyal po rnams kyang bsrungs mim gyu
288a2(mdo): te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur// de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i grong gi rgyal po rnams kyang chos kyi bcud des tshim zhing gcig la gcig
288a3(mdo): phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smyin pa yang mngon par yad ches par 'gyur ro// dge la ba'i sems su 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i klung 'di yang skye bo rags pas gang bar 'gyur// 
288a4(mdo): shind tu lo legs pa dang / shAnd tu nyams dka' bar 'gyur/ kye li skye bo mang pos gang zhibs ya mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'bras bu shi nad tu mdog bzang ba dang / sha nad tu zhim pa dang / 
288a5(mdo): lo mo'i sman dang / me tog gi sman dang / nor dang 'bru rnams shi nad tu 'byord pa dang / nad myed pa dang / bde ba la reg paraganas par skye bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / mu
288a6(mdo): dang / nad dang / pha rold kyi dmag tshogs dang / dug dang / sha sA dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma la ba dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / s+yang ki dang / dus ma
288a7(mdo): pa ni ba'i rlung dang / char pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar ma dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung / sems can rnams phal cher dgel ba bcu'i las
288a8(mdo): kyi lam la 'apyod par 'gyur// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdi la 'gro mthol ras kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi
288b1(mdo): grangs 'di yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya kha'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po byan gyise brlabs te/ grags pa 'phel zhing yongs/ 
288b2(mdo): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bud byed kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus pA mo su da par 'gyur ro// mdo na tshe 'di la bud myed kyi dngos po myong bar
288b3(mdo): 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams cad bya ba par 'gyur to// mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spo ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'bras
288b4(mdo): bu rnam par smyin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang par 'gyur ro// yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zi na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na yang 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
288b5(mdo): byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang nyon mongs po'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa la thams cad la dmyigs pa 'phel
288b6(mdo): zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad phu ni sum tshogs pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur
288b7(mdo): lha ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa dang / zhi zhing phra ba'i lam thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// yul ka pud+ma gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di pyod
288b8(mdo): bar 'gyur ba deng / sangs rgyal thams cad kyis byin gyimi 'arlabs/ 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma thus/ sa phyogs dag nid tu sdum par 'gyur/ 'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa
289a1(mdo): ga dang ga shind tu zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / brtsub pa dang / ro myod pa spong bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu zhi nad tu 'byod pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang / khang ba dang / mdzod
289a2(mdo): su \u0f88\u0f90 dang / rdza phru dang / bya sgyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams shi nad tu mchog tu 'gyur te/ de nas sems can gang dag zas dang skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag
289a3(mdo): shi nad tu nad myed pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su spong
289a4(mdo): par 'gyur te/ de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis khyed cag ki g.yo ga 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa myed pa'i tshogs su
289a5(mdo): 'gyur gyis/ chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs la ngas su bskyang bar gyis shig/ sems can rnams kyi don la chud/ de ltar na khyod kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ba
289a6(mdo): ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dang ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i rgyal bzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / srung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi
289a7(mdo): ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin gyi dbang po nas tshangs
289a8(mdo): ba'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar du/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas la phal cher gling zhi pa 'di ni gnas pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'gas
289b1(mdo): spro ba mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa las rdzogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis
289b2(mdo): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas/ bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa
289b3(mdo): 'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir rigs pas stond par bkur zhing gus pa chen pos bzung bar bgyi'o// snying rjes sems can yongs su bzung zhing sbyin par bgyi ba nas bla na myed pa'i lam gyi khar la dgod
289b4(mdo): pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang da 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas rnams u rgyas par bstand par

289b6(mdo): ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i khar
289b7(mdo): thams cad dang / gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dim 'dus pa'o sems can gzi'i brjed che ba gzo'i brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig drug bcu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis 'gron gcig tu 'di skad ces
289b8(mdo): gsold te// bdag cag gyis kyang dam pa'o chos kyi tshul yun rab tu gnas par bgyi bal slad du/ 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi nam grangs 'od bzung bar bgyi gnas sangs rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du
290a1(mdo): bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan dpar bgyi'o// thams cadan rnams yongs su spyod pa pa 'argya'o// chos 'tshal ba dang / chos nyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyi'o// ga/ yongs su bskyang 'am/ 
290a2(mdo): bgyi'o// gang du chos kyi nas grangs 'di byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas/ bdag cag gis kyang lda bA dang / snod pa dang / zab mo dang / 'byed pa dang / mu kye dang / pha ro
290a3(mdo): gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char ba dang / grang ba dang / cha ba dang / gtug pa dang / rtsub pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / oM ma 'i ma 'tsha dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bde ba dang /

290a5(mdo): bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang bsku nga par bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag tha mas cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhi ni bzangs dag legs
290a6(mdo): so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ de ltar na phyed kyis tus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas
290a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na/ khyed ring por mya thogs par gyur
290a8(mdo): tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs lnga dang / 'jig rten skyong la dang / lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen
290b1(mdo): po'i dbang po la bar dang / gang dag yang sems can gzi' brjid che ba gza'i brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar da nA 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsold to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
