290b3(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rigs par blang bar bgyi ba nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho breng 'khor dang / dkon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o dam pa'i chos
290b4(mdo): 'dzind pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrub par bgyi'o// yongs su ba sbyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag yang chos bsgrub par gnas pa'am chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa'i dge' slong dang / dge la slong ma dang / 
290b5(mdo): dgel bsnyen dang / dgel bsnyen ma dang / dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rig sa kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas/ gleg sa bam la bris te/ 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan
290b6(mdo): la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// ste steng du bgyi'o// bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyil// gong nas gdugs dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / byug pa nas sman
290b7(mdo): dgayo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis sti stang du bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad pa 'am/ klog pa 'am/ stond pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
290b8(mdo): smon par 'dushes pas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan gyis ste steng du bgyi/ bla mar bgyid/ mo kyi kyi/ mchod par brgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi
291a1(mdo): phyag rgya ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i ma/ rdzas kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan pam 'gyur/ spobs dang ldan brtson 'grus dang ldan ya shes dang ldan phyogs dang gsog tu ldan napo cos
291a2(mdo): sa rtswa dang mthu thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag kasi yul thams cad du 'thab la dang rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ke dang / nad dang / pha rold kyi dmag tshogs dang / ng+yas ma lags pa'i/ 
291a3(mdo): rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / tshar myi 'bab pa dang / mi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / rtsub pa dang / brlang ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / myi dge ba'i phyogs/ 
291a4(mdo): bgyid pa 'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shi nad tu bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / 'dum pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// rlung dang char dang grang ba dang
291a5(mdo): tshab rnams dus su 'thung bar 'byo'o// mtshan po dang / nyin mo dang zla ba dang / slab byed dang / yo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyi'o// kab dang / rgyu kar dang / nyi ma dang rla ba rnams
291a6(mdo): kyang legs par rgyu bar 'gyi'o// 'bal rgyu dang / chu'i myig dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka yang sha nad tu bltam par 'gyi'o// gang du sems can rnams chu'i rlung gis gnod par gyur da pa de yang bdag cag gis bsam
291a7(mdo): par bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs de dag tu ma sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gis 'dal ma dang / yal ka dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / 
291a8(mdo): 'bru dang / sman dang / dang / lo tog rnams shind tu snum pa dang / gdal ba dang / kha dog dang / ri mo zhing ma pas bsgrub par 'gyi // sems can rnams la na pa dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / gos dang / lhan su
291b1(mdo): kyis myi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang / sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang / dpal dang bsod nams 'byung bas tshe ring por 'grub par 'gyur ro// grob de nga grong khyer dang
291b2(mdo): rmong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang po brang 'khor gang dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byani kyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad dam/ ba na glegs pa ma la bris te 'a
291b3(mdo): ngal klog gam mchod pa dang / sti stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu/ rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'thung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrub par bgyi yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ de dag la gnod
291b4(mdo): ba bsal bar bgyi/ phan pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// ltad me dang / bkra myi shis pa dang / lta ba ngan pa da / byed pa ngan pa dang / byi na kyis brlabs pa ngan pa dang / smon lam ngan pa dang / skyabs ngan
291b5(mdo): ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / g.yo'i dang / sgyu dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sA thams cad ra ba tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yang dag pa lha ba li lam drang po dang / dad pa
291b6(mdo): dang dul ba dang / kun sdom pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po dang / rtsis pa chen po dang / grong rdal dang / 
291b7(mdo): nags 'tshob dang / ljongs kyi myi rnams dang / rigs bzhi rnams dang / bud kyad dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyang bsru ba zhing yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba nas ngo shes pa dang khrel yo
291b8(mdo): khar la btsud par bgyi'o// san yul de dag tu gang pa bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung par bgyi'o// gang ni chos kyi nam grangs 'di 'chad par gyur da pa nas/ glegs 'am ma khris te gzhan pa'i lam cu gagyid na sems
292a1(mdo): can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / rtun pa chen pos yongs su bskyad par bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstand pa'i slad du skal ba mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o// de nas/ 
292a2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang dkon
292a3(mdo): mchog gsum gyi rigs myi nub par nan tan byas nas/ de lta na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// / 'dus pa chen po rin po
292a4(mdo): me tog gi gzungs las / kun tu bsrung pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi dan gshegs bshag kyi thub pas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'phags
292a5(mdo): skyes po dag kyig kyi ba'ang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / sus ngan pon rnams la 'aka' bas la dpa// bzhin pa'angs dag pa sems can sa sa ba'i smod las kyim nyan mangs 'acan snyigs pa lnga dang ldan pa
292a6(mdo): kyi ga byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ba da byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pangs sa rgyas/ bamam can pa 'aM/ mun pa bathunas panyid ma ma pamangs da / 
292a7(mdo): gsan can kyi'i gcos pa rnams kyi nyan mangs pa rab tu na par bya ba'i phyir/ ras bdud kyi phyogs nims par mdzad/ dam pa'i smos kyi rgyal mtshad ni bsgreng/ sems cad cad byed pa dag ni mug 'phrus nas
292b1(mdo): nas/ 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu byed pa rnams kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang / sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sos
292b2(mdo): can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / kye dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yos
292b3(mdo): su grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir dang / chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la brten po'i chos kyi snying pos thams cad kyi lus 'jom pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'dug pa lung bstand pa'i rnam
292b4(mdo): kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shig/ ga nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshu la yang dag par bsrung ba'i dge ba'i cha bas bsod nams mngon
292b5(mdo): bar 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / dran pa dang / brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / tshangs pa
292b6(mdo): spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang // gang bsam gtan dang po bsgom pa nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i sgom pa'i bar dang / gang rgyu nad tu
292b7(mdo): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mdzan tu bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon tu bya ba'i bar gyi bas de nams kyi tshogs dang / gang sa pade 'dra ba la bas de rnams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byab
292b8(mdo): de lta na byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i chus na byed par 'gyur ba dang / nga 'odam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mdzad par 'du bya ba'i chags de thams cad byed kyi lan
293a1(mdo): tu gtad do// gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// ma 'ongs
293a2(mdo): pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas tha na glegs bam du bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grong ngam
293a3(mdo): dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na chos smra ba sha nid tu khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang / ras sna tshogs
293a4(mdo): bting ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chad dam/ za na glegs bam la bris te klog pa der gal te khyod chos nyand pa'am/ chos nyand pa la bsrung ba'am// 
293a5(mdo): chos nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i myi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyi mam dong na/ de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang lam bskyed pa la/ 
293a6(mdo): rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la myi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi
293a7(mdo): bam du nub par gyur pa na/ grong ngam grong khyer ram krong rdal lam ldongs sama'i blugs sam pho brang 'khor tam gzhug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i gnas sam rgyal po 'i pho brang ngam// bram ze 'i khyim 'am/ 
293a8(mdo): tshong dpon gyi khyim 'am/ dmangs kyi khyim 'am/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dpagab tu dge la slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen mchos smra ba dang / gzhan la bdad pa'i rigs kyi chu/ 
293b1(mdo): 'am rigs kyi bu mo sha nad tu khrus bgyi ste yan lag shi nad tu byugs nas gos sar pa 'tshal te me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi 'khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang / ras sna tshogs/ 
293b2(mdo): bting ba dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di dag gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad dam bris te klog pa der chos nyan pa 'am/ 
293b3(mdo): chos smra ba de bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa de dag dang / bdag dang ga zhan dpa gnyi ka'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yongs su sbyind par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul chen po
293b4(mdo): yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba/ chen po mchog ga lim la 'jug pa'i slad du/ bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ der ma mchis sam/ grong
293b5(mdo): nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba dang / sems can de dag gi nor dang 'brul dang / mdzod dang ba ba mang po dag dag nga ba'i slad byedar ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thos/ 
293b6(mdo): cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon thos pa'i bro bo ba 'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ang gu ha/ ang gu ha/ rtang ga pu ra ha na yA myi la/ kha kha/ 9 bal ba kha ba/ kau na na kha ba swA hA/ 
293b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa'am/ chos smra ba bsrung ba nas/ nor dpa' bru dang / mdzod dang bang ba mnga' mang po rnams rnam par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du der ma mchis
293b8(mdo): na yid ma las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin thams cad kyis myi
294a1(mdo): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs po zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas ke'u shi kas 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ngam grong khyer
294a2(mdo): ras kang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngam bdag gis sngon pa thos pa'i zlo bam pa 'di dam bcas pa dang 'gal bang 'gyur zhes bya ba 'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste
294a3(mdo): kha ba mi kha/ kha ba mr-i kha/ na la g+ha/ a sud nya/ sa su ba ha/ a Shad ta ma kha/ a sha Sha/ dzin pra khe sA hA// / bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin dum bgyis na/ 
294a4(mdo): 'di ni bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gas pa gyur ba das kyi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar dag gis lha'i dbang po dbargya byin la legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de nas 'bakra
294a5(mdo): skyes pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ba srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi khro
294a6(mdo): bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste// // u kha na ba na ba/ sa na ba/ sa mu dA/ sang nyid ny+dza/ ta thA/ dz+ya ta/ ba rA na ba ba ra dza swA hA// / mya dang
294a7(mdo): myi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas myig myi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i
294a8(mdo): dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal
294b1(mdo): par 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste// // dza lo 'u kA/ a to g+ha/ a ma maH/ mo k+ta/ a ma sa ra/ dzan tsa bya ya/ mu dzA sA hA// / de nas myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po myag myi bzang
294b2(mdo): la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong gi bar tu gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung
294b3(mdo): pa ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal par 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste// / byin du dza pa/ kha pa dza ba/ ra mu khwa/ krA sa ra/ pu ga pa ha/ a ma rga
294b4(mdo): ba ta swA ha// / myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de na das lus ngan pos kyang 'od skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan
294b5(mdo): 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar ma bgyis na/ bcom lnga na 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi myan
294b6(mdo): sngang bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di swA ste// / kr-i tre/ kru kru m+bud+da/ bak+ku tre/ A ti/ kru tre/ a ma sa na/ kru tre/ tri ta kU tre/ sa ga madz+ra te kru rde sa
294b7(mdo): klu tre/ dang ma k+ka sa mu tre swA hA// myi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i gnod
294b8(mdo): sbyin gyi sde pan chen po 'di ni yongs su sbyong ba stong nyis brgya dang / gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / hrim dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
295a1(mdo): mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i
295a2(mdo): chos kyi sgron ma'i bar du nub par gyurd pa'i tshe/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze
295a3(mdo): li khyim 'am/ tshong dpon gyi khyim 'am/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim 'am/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dga' slong ma 'am/ dge' bsnyen nam/ dge' bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang / gzhan
295a4(mdo): yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sha nid tu zhus bgyi sa te/ yan lag shi nang tu byugs pa nas gos sang pa brko/ sa te me tog bkram pa'i khyams su ngas bcos bu lnga tshogs panyis
295a5(mdo): ba spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bltam pas brgya nad pa'i seng ka'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya li chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par
295a6(mdo): rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam la bris te/ klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas/ ma mchis sam deng chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba bsrung ba dang / rang gi 'khor bsrung / 
295a7(mdo): ba dang / sems can gzhan bsrung ba dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim kyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam 'khor dang bcas
295a8(mdo): pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongs su ma bskyangs sam/ der sems can rnams kyi nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang bang ba mang po rab tu ma bltam 'am/ dem ma mchis sam/ deng sems can rnams
295b1(mdo): kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / shi nad tu grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na bdag cag gis
295b2(mdo): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bslus pa dang / 'azhus pa dang / mnyes par ma bgyis par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang / lta ba yongs
295b3(mdo): su nyams pa dang / lus rul par 'gyur ro// bdag cag g.yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
295b4(mdo): pa shag kya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar dbabya/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi// yongs su smyind par bgyi
295b5(mdo): 'o// ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyad pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstand par chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang chos nyand pa de dag
295b6(mdo): gi nor dang 'brul dang / long spyod dang / kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstand pa myi 'jig pa'i chos su bzung bar babya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
295b7(mdo): dag thams cad kyis myi dang myi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can
295b8(mdo): sa rgyal/ sa lda 'dun ci lags/ gang bdud bye phrag brgyal ma 'di'i 'dus pachen po khams cad 'tshab dang bcos pa lags sas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ ya
296a1(mdo): cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' lhad mo can gis gsol pa/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 
296a2(mdo): lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// bdud sdig can g.yog stong yod pa 'di did pa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shing yid myi dga' nas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dAs na nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'dra
296a3(mdo): ba de srid du/ 'di klags lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir batshond par byed do// de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa bdud bco brgyad dang / g.yog
296a4(mdo): nyi shu cha gcig yod pa nyes brgya po 'di dag kyang g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs da shing yid myi dga' nas/ 'odi dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus
296a5(mdo): na sang / ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid tu/ 'di dag nga'i bstand pa la glags lta zhing skabs 'tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir bcwo
296a6(mdo): par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad khong du bzung ba dang / dge ba'i tsha ba ma bskyed pa dang / myi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / dge' bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba myi
296a7(mdo): bzod pa dang / smon lam ma btab pa'i phyir/ sems dang sems mtshams myi sbyor bar myi byed/ gnas par myi byed rab tu gtong bar myi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong pa dang / 
296a8(mdo): gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu zos pas/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' lhad mo can gyis gsold pa/ 
296b1(mdo): ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrund pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par gyur da na yang de nyid de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
296b2(mdo): kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das sho nad tu ngo mtshard to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshard to// yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
296b3(mdo): pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa myi nyams pa rnyed par gyur da pa/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du/ de bzhin gshegs bshag
296b4(mdo): kye thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyurd nas/ de stan las yang sa te/ kun tu bltas te thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas ga thecom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi/ 
296b5(mdo): zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar byas te 'di skad ces smra sa so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ 
296b6(mdo): b+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / hri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang phyi ma yin pa dang / bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams dang bdag gatshig/

297a1(mdo): mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa kyi 'das ma pyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su sbyind par mdzad pa dang / ngan song
297a2(mdo): sa gsum la shi nad tu bzla' pa dang / theg pa gsum las yongs su spyi nad par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
297a3(mdo): gdung myi 'amad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyis/ de la ci nas kyang khyod kyis stond pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di yang rnam par myi 'jig pa'i chos can tu 'gyur ba dang / bsgrub dang myi ldan pa ma gtogs
297a4(mdo): pa da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems can dag yang 'tshe ba 'am/ rnam par 'jig pa 'am

297a7(mdo): mngon par brtson pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad stug sngal las yongs su thard par bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag yang bdud dam bdud kyi bu 'am
297a8(mdo): bdud kyi bu mo 'am/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ bdud kyi 'khor ma'am/ bdud kyi po nyis gas pa pa'i bsam pas grags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol tu mche zhing gsang ba dang dag par bar chad kyi las 'byed par gyi rdzu/

301b5(mdo): zhi bar byed de/ de na myi dang mya ma yin pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya las stsogs pa las dkar po'i mtha' la mngon par brtson pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad
301b6(mdo): deng ldan pas nyi mtshan 'das par byed pa dang / dge ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / lus dang / sems kyi nges 'ang byang chub kyi la mtshom pa la 'artson
301b7(mdo): bar byed do// yang 'di skad kyang smras te/ rigs kyi buji ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di sasul cing / byin gyis 'arlab par mdzad de/ rjes su sode rang ba ma
301b8(mdo): nas/ bdag gis 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bang bgyid pa/ mtshungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa/ mye dag pa'i phyogs thams cad rlog par bgyid pa/ dge pa'i phyog sa thams cad pa ma bgyid pa/ 'a
302a1(mdo): ngothams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nas mkha' rtogs 'dug ces bya ba gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor kye tshig 'arjod pa byin
302a2(mdo): kyis brlab tu ga sol da// 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis tshig 'arjod pa'i yi ke dang smras gang par bgyis la de bzhin du ji nas kyang 'dir lhags pa
302a3(mdo): dkyil 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor kyi tshig brjod pa ni don dang tshig dang / yi ges tshim par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog
302a4(mdo): gnas kha bos te 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// rigs kyi bu nag rnga po'i phyogs skrag par bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis/ khyod kyi rdo rje nam
302a5(mdo): mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i snga gas kyi/ gzungs 'odi'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjo/ da po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis// skyes bu dam pa khyod spro bar gyis
302a6(mdo): la'azhug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad bzlogapar byed pa/ rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i ga sang sngags
302a7(mdo): kye tshig de dag smros shika// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
302a8(mdo): ma yum par dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing // gsang sngags kyi cig 'di dag smras so// 'od lta ste// // dum drus/ rdum phrum/ hu lum chu 'u ma/ de yi nan la/ do la nas/ ku ta ne/ kun ne/ ma dgu te
302b1(mdo): naru / ma hA ru Ta/ a bas/ a ny+tse sa sI/ ri ni rini/ 51/ dam na/ ma'i mi sa ma/ dA ram/ lam ga kr-i/ ku lu shu lu/ sa ga / sa su s+yaH/ sA ga su su sh+'u s+ya/ u sum ku s+ya/ ku ma hA/ 
302b2(mdo): ri mi mi man ni ri ti ri/ ni rig gi g-i She/ shi na na / ni ga/ shi ri/ kai ri/ ni ri/ hi ri/ mi ni bi ni/ hi ni shi na/ mu ni mu ni ni bud d+hi li/ pra lar/ sriny+dza lo ka ts+tsha d+ya/ do da ngaM na~M/ dzi na piSha b+he/ dzin dzi na dzin dzin/ yin
302b3(mdo): g+ha swA hA// / bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ gropa rdal lam/ ljongs nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar na kang dang gang da na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug
302b4(mdo): ces bgyi ba gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas/ lus srul po'i ma rungs ba'i bar gang dag sems ma dad pa dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi

302b8(mdo): bya / mar byas te// rang thum de/ sas ta sus seM // // gnod byin gyi'i dpyo man pa nog gnas kyim gsang ldanas kyi tshig 'di dag smram pa thag tu da pa da ma la/ dang / zla dang / da
303a1(mdo): shin dang / dum phrul sam ma cad shunas nyan nan ni sangs rgyas kyi dang 'di nas dang rnam sa khang la gnas phasam 'dag 'dang da ga de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams/ 
303a2(mdo): cad kyi spyan sngar mal po sbyar te/ lan gsum du 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshas lo// chos la phyag phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyi kyi rje dpon
303a3(mdo): ga gnas kyis gnod tu myo ba 'ad pa 'thung po sems cad kyi srung ba gnon pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams snyam pa zhes brjod pa // dus pa ched pa rin po tshe tog gi ke ma
303a4(mdo): mas/ 'phrag gnas kyi lecu ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bzhengs pa'i bdas dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i bad
303a5(mdo): bstan to// de nas de'i mad la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a'ad nga/ ba dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab su 'dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yang gsom mag/ nas mal
303a6(mdo): las kyang me tog gi char 'bab// bar snang las kyang sali snyan bye ba'i sgra byung / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyang shi nad du byung // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyurard nas// 'khor zang
303a7(mdo): zal mo sbyar de ta 'khod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen po la/ myi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa
303a8(mdo): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stond pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar byed pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i
303b1(mdo): ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur/ sems can de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dang/ 
303b2(mdo): gyi na chen pos/ myi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' la to// tshangs pa cinam bdud kyi phyogs tsham gcad pa dang / 'bal pa'i rnyog pa thams cad rab tuzhi par bya ba dang / sems can
303b3(mdo): yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / las rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khams drug byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du gang ma
303b4(mdo): 'ongs pa'i dus na/ chos kyi nim grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bcus byin gyis brlabs so// bcu gang zhe na
303b5(mdo): tshangs pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / tra za dang / lham yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
303b6(mdo): srin po dang / grul bum de dag la khyed kyis sems can de dag rtag/ tu srungs shig/ gnod pa las zlog shig/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las dge ba la tshud cig/ zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang
303b7(mdo): kun spyod pa mang po dang / nad myed pa la mkhas pas bdag gi srog dang yang sngos la sems can de dag la gzung bar gyis shig/ ces rig pas gtad nas/ de dag gi dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / spobs
303b8(mdo): pa la mkhas pa skyon myed par 'gyur ro// de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par myi 'gyur te/ de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag sems dang mtshungs shing zab mo la
303b9(mdo): bzod pa dang ldan la bsdu ba'i dngos po la yang 'artson par 'gyur ro/ dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems can gyi lus las snying po blangs te/ dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi pyod pa nyams 'og tu/ 
304a1(mdo): chud par 'gyur ro// ting pa 'dzind ring po mo'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'di na des ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i shes pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus
304a2(mdo): chis sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dga' slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdapa' sol zhing 'azhes 'acom stond cing / 
304a3(mdo): bzhugs pa grangs byed dpag tu byed pa dag kyam mthong par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las don dang tshig dang sa gi ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bu lang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam car
304a4(mdo): las kyad bar du 'phags pa yang ring byed pa'i dka' ba dang / chog tu dka' ba'i bar du 'og nas las kyi sgrib pa gyi dge ba yasas cad rnam par shes pa la ma la chos dang ldan pas mgo mnyam cu
304a5(mdo): 'gag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dz+nyA sa te skye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgya sa kye zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mtsho 'ang
304a6(mdo): bzhes la bzhugs te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs
304a7(mdo): pa'i sems can de dag dang 'grogs par 'gyur te/ ring por myi thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma rtogs par phyi nad chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga
304a8(mdo): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su nam yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa da ltar dang ma 'ongs par
304b1(mdo): dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed cing gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos
304b2(mdo): bcu po de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nye/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems
304b3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' saHlad pa/ kye grogs po dag sangs

304b5(mdo): cad yongs su spyand par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi pyod pa rab tu bstand pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstand pa dang / dkon
304b6(mdo): mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun myi 'chad par bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spangs pa dang / byang
304b7(mdo): chub kyi lam la gzud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir/ ngo mtsham che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos sngon ma thos pa gzungs
304b8(mdo): kyi tshig las sto rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa 'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'ashad de des chags pa byed pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzung ba dang / chus gcig pa'i thams cad
305a1(mdo): mkhyend pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul srung ba nas/ gling bzhi bsrung ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa bsrung ba dang / 'bru dang
305a2(mdo): smad dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i bar dag srung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas bcom

307a1(mdo): g.yos par gyur da / sprin 'dus pa chen po yang byung / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser pa chen po dang / sprin chen po las char pa yang bab par gyur da/ 'jug kyang di re re zer/ klog rnams kyang byung / 
307a2(mdo): phyogs bcu yang 'azhugs par gyur da to// mun pa mun nag chen po yang byung ste/ skad ma rnams kyang myi sdang / nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'od dang myi ldan te/ lhan ner ma yin/ lha nges ma yin zhadi 'od myigs la
307a3(mdo): bar gyur da te/ de nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsi byi kha cig gyi grong gzhan dang / grong khyer gang yin pa de dag gdon 'byung pos btab par gyurd/ 
307a4(mdo): grong kyi gzhon nu rnams dang / cis mkhan dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor na gnas pa dang / bran po dang / zan mo dang / las byed pa dang / mngag pa dang / g.yog kha cig
307a5(mdo): kyang gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur da te/ yul yangs pa can kun gyi da ge'i slong dang / dge' slong ma dang / dge la bsnyen dang / dge bsnye na ma rnams kyang 'jigs skrag sngangs te/ spyi bung zhes byed nas
307a6(mdo): gnam du bltas te 'bod cing / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par sa dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag kha cig
307a7(mdo): ni tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni brgya byin la/ kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / 'phrog ma dang / nyi ma dang
307a8(mdo): zla ba dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / r-i dang / nags tshogs dang / sman dang / shing ldod pa dang / klu dang / lteng ka dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / rdzing dang / mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag
307b1(mdo): 'tshal zhing / bdag cag ShAdrwa ba'i gnod pa 'jigs pa'i gnas nas ji ltar tha rad par 'gyur snyam sems shing 'khod pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis myi'i las 'phags pa'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs so// de nas
307b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyurd nas// lha dang mye dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
307b3(mdo): dad par 'gyur te/ 'udus par gyur da pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'udu mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byi na dang / 
307b4(mdo): sum bcu cha gsum gyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi li ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nya shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum bcu cha gnyi
307b5(mdo): dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nub mo 'das pa dang / dag pa lta bu bya dkod kyi phung po'i ri la bad ga gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ bcom
307b6(mdo): ldan 'das ga la ba deng dong nas phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshig gcig dbyangs gcig ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das lo tshigs su bcad de
307b7(mdo): mngon par bstod pa// shi nad tu 'bar ba gser dang 'dra// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin brtan// rin chen rnams kyi 'byung gnas lags// seng ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros// klang chen myos
307b8(mdo): ba bzhin du gnon// gser gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs// 'dzam bu gAng ga gser brgyan 'dra// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor ba 'i// nam mkha' zla ba tri myed bzhin// nyan thos dge 'dun rnams kyi dbus// mtshan rnams kyis
308a1(mdo): ni brgyan par gyur da// lha dpa bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// thub pa la ni skyabs su mchis// gyi rnams la ni sman srad du// bsrung ba dus su nye bar gnas// sangs rgyas snga mas bshad pa'i// stong chen ra 'a 'jan
308a2(mdo): sa mdo sde ni// 'khor 'kha yug mi mtha' ba pa// mtshams gcod pa'i dam pa lags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpal khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// 
308a3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sud tsam zhig cang myi gsung bar dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bkal sa sa pa/ rgyal ba chen po bzhi po dag gang khyed kyi 'khom nga'i 'khom la 'tshe bar sems dpa' de ni tshulas
308a4(mdo): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gyi'i 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung dang / chos legs par gsung ba dang / dgel 'dun legs par bsgrub pad la sa bon 'di btab nas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
308a5(mdo): rnams dang ga rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / nyan zos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i la ba bskyed nas lho'i ris sum bcu rtsa gnyis
308a6(mdo): las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa dang / gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos
308a7(mdo): kyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la yang bu dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa/ pha rold kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang
308a8(mdo): ldan pa stong 'brung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'jig rten 'di rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba khyed sti'i las chung ngu gnas pas gnas par gyis sheg// de nas rgyal po chen po nam pos kyi bu stan las langs
308b1(mdo): te/ thagos phrag pa gcig rtsub bar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lbabs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang logs su thal mo sbya da pa bcud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsoyad to// bcom
308b2(mdo): ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang / bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal myed khang dang / khang pa ba tshegs pa dang / bsil khang dang / sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / dar gyi ldi ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa
308b3(mdo): sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dril bu dang / mu tig gi tra bas yongs su bskor ba dang / pog phor nas bu dag pas bdwags pa dag dang / me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang / gnas dang / khang pa batshegs pa dang / bsal
308b4(mdo): khab dang / sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / dar gi lnga ldi ba za zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dI li bu dang mu tige gau tre bas yongs su bskor pa dang / pog phor nas
308b5(mdo): bdug pas gdugs pa dag dang / me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang gnas dang / khang pa chen po dag mchis te/ der bdag cag bud myed brgya phrag stong dag gis yongs su bskor cang / 'dod pa
308b6(mdo): yon tan lnga tshang bar longs spyod pa dang ldan par gyur da nas gnas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag myos pa dag ma mchis pa gnas pas gnas pa na/ 'khor zas dang skom tshol du phyogs bcur kun tu
308b7(mdo): 'byer zhing / skyes pa dang bud byed dang khye'u dab bu mo bcas ma thag pa dang / dud 'grol skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'che bar bgyid/ bgegs pagyid/ 'gums par bgyid// 
308b8(mdo): srog dang thal par 'byed de// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngang bdag cag gis 'ching bani 'om dun du bdag cag gi semad kyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o// gang gi 'khor zhi gdan byung ba de
309a1(mdo): chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po 'gyis te/ nad pas rgyal po chen po de'i mying nas dbyung zhing / tri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas 'dug par bgyi'o// dog sa la me tog sel/ 
309a2(mdo): ma bkram ste zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te// phyi phyir dgod cing 'dzi// 
309a3(mdo): bar 'gyur// smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni gnyid kyis ldog par 'gyur// yang na shi nad tu gro 'tshal 'gyur// rtag tu rkyen tu lta bar 'gyur// skar ma dag la snyegs par bgyid ka/ nub mo shi nad tu
309a4(mdo): dka' bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'dar zhing sgra 'byind te// de la sngags kyi tshi ga mchis kyis// 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la gson// s+ya ma ze dan/ sid b+he su sid b+he / a re a ra ne/ ba le ma hA ba / 
309a5(mdo): dzam b+he/ dza ti le/ a kha ne/ ma kha ne/ 2 ne/ kha rad Te/ !ri bing ka le/ ti ming gi le/ taM ming gi le/ ti mong gi la ni sA hA// bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par tshur de cig
309a6(mdo): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mying dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang byin gyis bdag 'de legs su gyurd cig swA hA// de nas rgyal po chen zo yul 'khor srung stan las langs te nazla gos 'phrag pa
309a7(mdo): gcig tu bzang nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mi sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dag
309a8(mdo): gi 'khor lnga 'i'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te// klu lan cing ni bro chung ste// byan rnams la yang dka' bar bgyid// rkam par ma mchis dam par smra// dgod par ba skyed can
309b1(mdo): khro bar 'gyur// skom par gyur da la dbyig dam te// rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par bgyid// myig kyang 'byed par myi 'gyid de// rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi cheg mchis kyis// 'jig rten
309b2(mdo): mgon po bdag la gson// s+yAd ya ze dan/ a khe ma khe / bi na khe/ bar de/ tsa pa le ba9/ pa ka ne/ ba hu le/ ba gan da le/ bshe ba sha pa ti swA hA// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gi myong dang stobs dang
309b3(mdo): dbang phyug dang byan gyis bdag gdon thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las tha rad par gyur do cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po stan las langs te/ bla gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gzar
309b4(mdo): nas ka pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan la das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan la das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom
309b5(mdo): ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor yi dgas grul bum byas zin pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'odi lta bu lags te/ shi nad tu skom pas 'debs par 'gyur// g.yeng bas btab cing lta bar 'gyur// bzhin yang
309b6(mdo): dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// skums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur// kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skye ma// sgra dang sen mo ring ba ste// dri ma can la dri myi gdal// rdzun dang kyal ba smra bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis
309b7(mdo): kyis/ 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la gson// s+yad ya the dan/ kha kha kha me/ kha lo nau/ kha ma ma/ kha ra laM/ khar le/ ka ra She/ ka shi na/ ka ra tre/ kA le kA mya ni/ bi le/ sI d+hi ya sha ba ti/ sha ma shem
309b8(mdo): ni// rgyal ba chen po 'phags skyes pa'i mying dang su bas dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gi gad na dang gan pa thams cad zhi bar gyur da cig swA hA// de nas rgyal po chen po rtsin myi bab stan las yangs te/ rdza
310a1(mdo): gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gso lad to// 
310a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu 'dab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te// skyegs bus 'debs shing dbugs kyang 'byin de// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur// dungul
310a3(mdo): zhing dgu pa kha chu 'byung // phyi phyir gnyid kyis ldog par 'gyur// kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste// de bzhin 'dir ni rgyug par 'gyur// sen mo dag kyang stond par bgyidade// dog sar mchis shing dra bar bgyid// de la
310a4(mdo): sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten 'gon po bdag la ga son// s+yada? ya the dan/ kra ga ye/ kra ga she/ kra ga se// kru sha mye/ kru ke/ krug ka me/ kru ke/ a ga le/ na ga le/ sa ma
310a5(mdo): ka le/ ku hu me/ a la ke/ ka la ke/ i ri mi ri d+hi re/ a r+ya ga pa ti// rgyal po chen po myag myi bzang gi mying dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang byin gyis bdag bde legs su gyurd cig swA hA
310a6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/ da ni stobs bcu dang ldan zhing myi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa myed pa ste/ 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra khyu mchog lta bu
310a7(mdo): rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'aza za ma ze skar ro// sde dang mthu'i dang gzhon bcas pa'o// bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul// sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// rig sngags thams
310a8(mdo): cad pa ma nyad// snod la bdon/ masang ge/ 'angag pa te/ ba la nang g+hi She/ shu re/ gyum nar/ 'dzag me/ 'adz+ra d+hir/ gas te// tre sa ma 'dzi/ ma ga se/ par gra prab ti/ a rid/ dang sa sug te/ thonapa
310b1(mdo): bi na// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mtshan dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang byin gyis bdag pade legs su gyu da cig swA hA// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung zos nas// 'jigs dang smag
310b2(mdo): dang sngangs kyu rang te// khal mo sbyar nas 'khod par gyurd// 'thung po'i tshogs ni lhag ma rnams// spangs 'khrugs rod rong por gyur da nas// phyogs bcu rab tu 'ber byed cing // spra bo tshe yang sgrog par byed// 
310b3(mdo): rgyal po chen pos deshes nas ka gsang ba gsum na yang dag smra// kye ma rigs sngags rigs sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'jom byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de// zos nas 'byung po skrag 'gyur te/ 
310b4(mdo): dper na rab tu 'bar me dang // ti la mar dang bta ral gyi bzhin// ko'u ta mas ni rab bshad pa'i// rigs sngags spu gri'i so dpa' dra// drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa// de la gang zhig
310b5(mdo): a dad na// de'i bu'i thu bo ni// tshangs pa'i zhags pas myed par 'byung // me ni rab tu 'bar byas la// bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhipa ya pa// sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te// nas dang yungs kar blangs/ 
310b6(mdo): pas su// mar kyi snying po dang sbyar nas// me'i nang du thugs par bya// legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas// gal te myur du myi gtong na// thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni// mapa dang yungs kar mer thugs
310b7(mdo): bzhin gnod sbyin med pas pa sdigs nas su// de dag bde la rgya ched de// dem tshabs logs g.yas par ni// 'bras can dag kyang 'thung bar 'byur // gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pas na// sha bkra na/ 
310b8(mdo): kyis btab par 'gyur// srang la can kyi maphreng du// gzhan yang 'gro bar gyi 'gyur ro// yum ngan po dang grags ldan pa'i// khyim yang mthong bar bya 'gyur ro// 'thu ba ma po chogs pa na// phun yang thon par
311a1(mdo): kyi gyur mo// nod spyod dag ni dkyil 'khong du// mas gom dang yang bral bar 'gyur// stong tshon rab 'joms mdo'i sde la// gnod sbyin gang dag myi phyogs pa// de la rdo rje la thos te// rgya mdag na
311a2(mdo): 'grems par 'gru// su rnaM ma na tshus thom sa// de'i sngon nad par 'gyur// mngon pazhind tu rnan ma mis// de'i rtswa dang na bgacad// 'a'ajas skye na mo 'dra bas// klad pa rab tu 'gas par byed// ma 'a sngags
311a3(mdo): kyis bkris pa da/ dem stob la 'jom par byed// nag dang khrag mi dran po dag/ de'i kha nas 'dag par 'gyur// rigs sngags zhags pa chad pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na// 'khor ba gnod sbyin kyi
311a4(mdo): 'khor du// de nyid tu ni'ikhor bar 'gyur// rgyal ma chen po dpal ldan pa// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyurd na// chos kyi nabagos gyur nga te// bzang po'i khri la 'jug pa ni// shar phyogs na
311a5(mdo): ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub bya gas na ni myig myi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// dngal dang gzil badzad 'bar ba li// rgyal po dag ni phyind pa dang / 
311a6(mdo): de tshe stond pa thams cad mkhye nad// bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags// tshangs pas srul pa'i gzhal myed khang // de na rdo rje'i bdan la bzhugs// de na tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar te 'khod
311a7(mdo): phyag 'tshal// dpal ldan gser ke ri bo 'dra// gser gi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs// me tog pad ma bzhin du rgyas// sa la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas// nyi ma dpa' dra zla nya la// skar ma rnams kyi si yongs
311a8(mdo): bskor zhin// thub sku gser bya khe dog la// mtshan rnams kyis naM yongs su bskor// 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten sgron la bstod byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i s+yan sngar ni// 'dzag
311b1(mdo): rten skyob la 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong ga'i khor rnams kyis// rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste// gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang // rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // 'di las nyan thos rnams
311b2(mdo): kyang skye// lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur// rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyind// bram ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur// drang srong bskal pa chen po dang // dge' sbyong bram ze 'di las skye// khyed cag snying las
311b3(mdo): chung byed pa// mya'i skye dgu gnod par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i ni tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong ka si tshig smras pa// tshangs pa chen po de bzhin no// thub pa chen po de bzhin no// bdag gis ri rab bskul byas shing
311b4(mdo): sa yang rnam par bzlog byas la// rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams// rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya// zhags pa dam po ma nyams pa sa// nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang // skar ma dag ni thams cad
311b5(mdo): kyang // bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya// gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing // 'jig rten la ni phan myi byed// de dag la ni thams cad du// phyogs kyang snang bar myi bya'o// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de// 
311b6(mdo): 'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de// 'byung po myi'o skye dku la// gnod pa byed cing 'tshe bar byed// gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rigs sngags las ni 'da' byed pa// 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol
311b7(mdo): gnond pa ldand par byed// rigs sngags las ni 'ol ba'i 'khor// kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te// 'jig rten 'gon po'i dbyan sngar ni// yang dag par yang mchod par bgyi'o// gang ka 'thung po'i dkyil 'khom
311b8(mdo): kun// 'di ba gad pas na gya nyan pa// de dag 'acan pa bshad bya ba// ngas pas sprul pa'i med sde'o// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// phan tshun du ni bsu byas na// khye du rtsa dang gser rdul dang // mu tig nam dang shes
312a1(mdo): dag dang // spug dang rdo'i snying po dang // rin chen bdun gyis brgyand pa'i// cibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i// shing rta nam pa bzhi byas pa// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la
312a2(mdo): 'gro// rgyal po dag ni de zhugs nas// 'thung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong // sa ni gser kyi phye ma dang // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul bar ltung dang spyad pa dang // nags pa dag kyang gdags byos la// khyo/ 
312a3(mdo): kyis ni ji snyed pa'i// 'byung po thams cad khrid shog ces// gnod sun rkyen dpon kun// phyogs pa'i dag tu bgyi ba byas// slong chen rab tu 'jom pa'i// mdal sde'i nodab pa nyid// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten par du 'byung // lha rnams
312a4(mdo): kun gyis rnam par bsams// stong chen po'i lus kyis su// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul// lus ngan po'i tshig thos nas// gnod sbyin kyi ni sde dpon dong // phyogs bzhi dag tu dong nas su// gas pal bo/ 
312a5(mdo): drag tu bsgo// grub pa 'thung ba nyi gu 'argyad// tri la lus 'byung gad kyi rnams// shar phyogs man 'khod pa dag/ mde sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bci pa la lnga yos bsdams pa'i// 'byung pom pa thong/ 
312a6(mdo): la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// grul bum las byung gdon gyi rnams// lho phyogs ma 'di pa 'a'od pa dag// mdo' sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing pa lngal yos bsdams pa la// 'byung po mang po pa la nyon// 
312a7(mdo): thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// klu las gdon tu gyurd pa rnams// nub phyogs cha 'di pa 'khod pa dag// mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yos bsdams po'i// 'byung po mang po pa la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu
312a8(mdo): brgyad// gnod sbyin los ni gdon byu da pa// byang phyogs ma 'dis 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcib ba lnga las bsdams pa'i// 'thung po mang po ngal nyon// lus ngan po'i bu thu ba// kun tu rgyal ba gyil
312b1(mdo): zhan// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu dag// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mad sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyin gyi gnyis pa// skyed pa po zhes nas grags pa// de'i drung na 'thod pa'i// gnang spyan
312b2(mdo): bye ba drug bcu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo'i sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa// de'i mying ni gnod po che// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu dag/ bcing pra rnam pa
312b3(mdo): lngas bsdams nas// mdol sde la zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi/ bu bzhi pa// de'i mying ni bum bu'i lto// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo'i sde'i
312b4(mdo): zhags pas kun tu drangs// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po// lag bzhi pa la stobs po che// de'i drung na 'khod pa'i// gnod sbyin bye ba drug panu rnams// bcing pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdol sngol
312b5(mdo): zhags pas kun tu drangs// 'byung po 'jom pa'i ra li ni// 'byung po thams cad lhags nas suH// rigs sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rigs sngags 'di ni kun tu bsams// chad pa myi bzad drag
312b6(mdo): ba ste// gang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// koSh+ya ta ma la gus par ni// thams cad 'di la skyabs su dong // g.yo myed par ni rjes bzhugs zhing // thams cad myed par gyur da ta re// de nas zang cig tsam gyis ni/ 
312b7(mdo): 'azung po mang po thams cad lhags// ma rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang // rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang // klung dnga' 'ab cu lum dang // dpa' klong dag na gapa' 'od dang // bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal byed khang // kun dang / 
312b8(mdo): dang ni nags rnams dang // mchad rten gnas dang klong ka gnas// shing ldan drung na gang gnas dang // grob khyer grong dem rdzongs rnams dang // rgyal po'i ba phreng sgo rnams dang // gnas byed 'ang na gang gnas dang // dkyis ma
313a1(mdo): dag dang dur khrod dang // de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni// mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang // khang stong dang ni gram sa dang // gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang // phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas// gnod sbyin
313a2(mdo): bye ba stong rnams ni// rigs sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams// rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su// la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs// pi pang gling pu kham pa'i ji// stobs chen rnams ni sgra 'byind te// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs
313a3(mdo): dang // klu dang gapa rnams byas nas su// dbang po zla bcu zla dang // b+har d+ha dza s+ye dgu'i bdag/ ma ldan pa dang kun tu lta// mngon shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang // tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul pa mdzes dang 'gul rjes
313a4(mdo): dang // skye dgu li bla mar gyur da pa dang // lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang // hri ba sna tshogs sde dang ni// myi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang // de bzhin phud pu lnga zhes bya// g.yer ma dang ni gnyi gzer dang // nya lcibs dang
313a5(mdo): ni ral gi bu// kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzi nad dang // 'brog gnas da nga ni yid bzangs dang // kha rna dang ni ri sul la// lnga 'dzi nad dang naM khab bzangs dag/ sde dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas// lha dang
313a6(mdo): klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/ nyin gsum pa'i smyo byed dang // de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang // 'jig rten 'che ba gang yin dang // gnod sbyin srin po me rlangs rnams// phyogs bzhi nas ni bkun
313a7(mdo): nas su// bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa rnams// 'jig rten 'gon po'i spyan sngar chu// thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpal khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal ma
313a8(mdo): sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa// 'byung po'i gnod sbyin lus pa tshe// lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa// rkang mangs dang ni rkang cig pa// rkang pa bsgribal gyi chun
313b1(mdo): dang // lus mang mgo bo gcig pa dang // lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang // myog mangs po la lus phyed dang // myig cig lto ni bcu gnyis dang // bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgol// lag pa bsgreng la mgo btud dang // mtshon ma
313b2(mdo): 'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag// mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams// rangs kyi sku dang 'angs kyi so// zangs kyi myog dang 'angs kyi lag/ zangs kyi tho ba rkang pa dang // 'angs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha// ka lag kun tu 'bar la
313b3(mdo): dang // s+ye'i lus su gnas pa rnams// skur zhar lA ba gsum yod pa// myo myi sdug la kha ral pa// chu srin stag kaM gzugs dang ni// gzugs myi sdug la kha ra lang po// mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po// rab tu gtum
313b4(mdo): po khro gnyir can// gsus po che dang bum rna po// rna 'phyangs po dang rna ba byed// lag rings dang ni rna ba ring // sna'i che dang lag che ring // lus skams lus na ring ba dang // sgra rengs rab tu brgya nad pa dang // 
313b5(mdo): rkang rings myed pa ring ba dang // tri ba la bum lto za// yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang // gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto// gnam lta po la na be tshe// rkyen tu brdzes skra rab tu dmar// mgo bo tsho la gzhu 'grin
313b6(mdo): po// skyes po sgur po bum lta po// ri rab mo bskul nas su// mi mdag gi ni che pa 'bebs// ljon shing 'i dang rdo ba dang // sprin gi tshogs kyi mdog 'dral// dung dbang chen rdza dza dang // grul bum bran rnams kyi sgra
313b7(mdo): 'dzegs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byan de// skyid po tsho la bang bu'i sgra// nag po sngon po ser po dang // dam pa sem me ltar dmar ser dang // khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gyi li sgra// dmar po'i zhag gis bskus pa rnams// myi ro dag ni kyer
313b8(mdo): nas su// ba gzhin tshu na rnam pa chug/ sanon lag pa dmam pa dang // brgya ni khrag gis bsdus pa dang // lus byed dag na mam pa dang // mtshol ma snyid dang dang ngos byos// khyim pazhin tu bkang pa dang // byid bde rdo
314a1(mdo): bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyi// ka lag rnams kyi stobs dang 'phrog// keng rus ki ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gis rab tu bkang ba'i// mya'i pags pa thogs nas su/ 
314a2(mdo): myi bzad dug gis kun bskus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug/ grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// rlung dang bad kan ma khrigs pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrugs par byed
314a3(mdo): de ltar de na rgyal po'o// gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po gnas// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rigs sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpal khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal
314a4(mdo): mo sbyang nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// grong byer grong dang yul 'khor dang // pho bra ba 'khor du rgyu ba ni// nod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa// snying rje byed cing 'khrag zung
314a5(mdo): ba// lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste// stobs po che la sgra yang che// ma srin bcu po la myig stong po// gdon chen myig ni dmar po rnam sa// 'khor na mang po rnams btang ste// lag na mtshon thogs rab
314a6(mdo): tu 'jigs// sbrul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang // lag pa ni lag na smon ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs// rdo rje mdung che lag thogs pas// rab tu drag po la dmag dgal nas// phyogs bcu kun tu
314a7(mdo): skrag par byed// snang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa'i// gsang pa po ni ding kun kyang // kye'i 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa bud byed gzhan yang 'dzinid// zhag rjon por bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrul cing 'das po
314a8(mdo): gzugs// seng gi dang na stag dang ta// ma ge la lang bo bu dang // gling po tsho gi zugs 'dra dang // des da gshin dang kyang ga dang // byed pa la dpang dag dang // rgya la rgya sa sde lu khyo'i gzugs// bas 'a dang phag dang khri mdza sa
314b1(mdo): nya dang d+ya sA la dag gi gzugs// kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs// khwa dang 'ug pa khu thug dang // bya rgod wa dpa nya myed bcas// rma bya dang pa thi ba dang // khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang // kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams
314b2(mdo): su// gnod sbyin nas ni myo'is mthong // 'dal bzangs bya'i tshul kyis kyang // skye bo mang po skrag par byed// kha cig myi'i mgo can la// lus no bye gag bong bu 'dra// kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu che// lus
314b3(mdo): dang bral ba dag tu snang // rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos// rgyu ma li 'phreng bas kun tu dkris// rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing // srog chags rnams la gnod par byed// myo ba zad pa'i dbugs
314b4(mdo): 'byond cing // skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed// srog chags rgyudanaji snyed pa// sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang // kha cig da/ ga ne ri yang zags// la la ral gyi 'khor lo thogs// grangs
314b5(mdo): ni brgya phrag stong rnams te// dbyug pas bsngags shing kha traka po// myig phyung ba la bzhin myi sUka/ srin po'i so no rno ba dang // sA dang rna ba bcad pa dang // lce bcad gdong ni gnyer ma can// rka lag
314b6(mdo): dag ni gtubs pa dang // mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams// skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed// sdig pa can rnams gza' byin 'phrog/ mya dag kyi ni lus rnams la// rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang // spu'i bar
314b7(mdo): dpa ga nad nams dang // de bzhin rma'i kha rnams su// lhags pa 'de dag thams cad kyang // rigs sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// 
314b8(mdo): mal ma sbya nas phyag 'tshal lo// chas rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal men/ de'i rgyal po rang ba dang / de bzhin nyam ma 'khor yug dang // rgya rgo dpung po bo zhal mdal 'dzin// spos dang ldang dang gangs kyi'o// 
315a1(mdo): thegs dang ba Da bA// na kha da'i rigs gnyis dang // dpal gyi ri'i che mo ni ki/ gang dag shi nad tu mthong 'phags dang // ri 'o de dag kun la yang // lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad myi dga'
315a2(mdo): zhing // 'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed// bye ba stong gi lha dag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang // lha'i bu bo skal chen dag/ thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed// zag bzangs ris dang sgra gcan dang // sim par byed
315a3(mdo): pa 'am der phya nid to// lha myin bye ba phrag stong dang // lha mya bye ba phrag brgya dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul chen pa// mang po kun dang zar mo spyod// rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang // klu'i rgyal po gzil can dang // klu'i rgyal po ma
315a4(mdo): dros dang // dga' ba nye dga' gnyis po dang // rdo rje blo gros pag shu dang // gang ga dga' bo sane tu mtshol// bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i 'khrug byed dang // stong phrag bye ba'i klu rnams dang // 
315a5(mdo): bye ba brgya'i klu dag dang // de dag bu mo skal chen rnams// thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed// nyi ma slab gnyi ka yang // skar ma'i 'khor gyis song su bskor// gser gi me tog yan lag na// ma ga d+ha na 'jigs byed
315a6(mdo): bka/ gso'i ba'i mtha' na gyi zod cad// ko sa lan rab tu dkar// babang po'i yul na la s+phu can// gyad kyi sul na grags pa 'dzind// lnga 'dzind pa na klag byed pa// rta skyes pa na dmyig dmar gnas// srung byed pa na ser skya
315a7(mdo): ste// sems pa na na myeg ser po// be lca la na bum pa'i lto// dga' ba'i yul na ring zo skyes// bakhang 'dzind na rab tu 'jom// tung yul na na nyi ma'i grogs// ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod spyan na// brjod pa bcu drug de
315a8(mdo): dag dang // lag na da dza gnod sbyin che// chos skying rab tu dka ba dang // ser sbyar ba mdzes khya'i 'dug dang // rdum lho gsum pa zlum po dang // rgya mod 'dan pa 'chang ba dang // lnga ldan rgyal ba rgya mchog dang // gnod sbyin ches
315b1(mdo): po dbang phyug che// lag pa bzhi can stobs po che// sde dpal rab tu 'dul ba ni// mthu bo cho la stobs po che// gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang // bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang // gnod sbyin bye ba g.yog 'chang ba// gnod sbyin
315b2(mdo): de mying 'phrog po ya ni// sha ri ta dang sde bcas dang // ri'i bu mo gnod sbyin ma// gzi'i brjid chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang // gdol pa mo na ge tum mo yang // bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor
315b3(mdo): ba dang // myi gtung nag po kar ka ti// pad ma dpa ni pad ma can// me tog so dang sa ka dang // srin mo thong bun can dang // can dan dang ni khyab 'dug len// seng ge ser skya dam ma sar po// glang po klu'i so can dang // ri 'a shes
315b4(mdo): grags po'i mchil ba can// srin po so bzangs yod pa dang // tshangs pa le nad dang khya ga mujuka len// gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang // gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag/ mdung dang mdal bzhu kun thogs
315b5(mdo): shing // myaM rta ba lang ri dgas rnams// za zhi pa 'tshe ba de dag ni// phyogs na mas kun tu rgyug cing 'dong // sa 'di la rab tu g.yol bar byed// nag/ sa tshal rnams kyang rab tu sdems// ri rnams kun nas g.yol bar byed// 
315b6(mdo): skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing // phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag// rigs sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpal khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyan
315b7(mdo): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'gon gyi spyan snga ru// de dag lhags par gyurd pa dang // de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus// 'jig rten 'gon la 'di skad gsol// bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su// rgyal po'i gnas su
315b8(mdo): sprul pa ni// lub lo ldan pa yid du mchil// de bas 'ad ni sa la'i bdag// rgyal po'i pho brang lung lo can// lha rnams kun kyis bsams par gyur // phyir shin su mthon po can// rin chen kun gyis brgyand pa lags// 'phang
316a1(mdo): tung kA bcu drug ste// gsang kyi rgyulas 'byim pa lags// byon pa man cig na re re la'ang // gnod sbyin de rje 'chang ba dag/ kun nas rab tu gnas par byung da// lag na mtshan ma legs par
316a2(mdo): da/ rgyam pa'i bzang da'i sgo// dpa da pa 'byas pa ni// gcigan gi b.las bgyis par no// nyis tshus las bgyis pa ste// gsum canas kyin lags/ pan pa gzed kyis nasas
316a3(mdo): gro kyi ni na// kyi rgyam tog kya // dgan byed pa / 'di can kun cu tshogs mchis// rin can 'a tshogs ldan shing can// bya bran sogs skad kyang 'byind/ ma tog su rdzogs legs pa
